    set gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 88.5, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 327.4, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1239.7, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, - 1492.5, 17668.3, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 194.2, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 336.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1996.5, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 9743.6, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, - 3151.2, 16960.7, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 41.2, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 320.1, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1024.5, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 9743.6, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, - 1296.8, 17423.8, 0.0)

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starting time
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starting_time_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_StartingTime=( udg_StartingTime + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starting_time takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starting_time=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Starting_time, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starting_time, function Trig_Starting_time_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Welcome Message
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func027Func005Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func027Func005Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func027Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func028001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_NumberOfPlayers == 12 )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func030C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unranked == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func031001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func032001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func033001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func034001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(8)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func035001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func036001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func037001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(5)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(20)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func040001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(9)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func041001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Func042001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Welcome_Message_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00R_0297)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(18), udg_Point, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_StartTimer, false, 20.00)
    set udg_StartTimer=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_StartTimer, "TRIGSTR_7887")
    set udg_StartTimerWindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_StartTimerWindow)
    call VolumeGroupResetBJ()
    call StopMusicBJ(false)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call FogEnableOff()
    call FogMaskEnableOff()
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_NewTournament)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_7207")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_7208")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_7253")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_7210")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cff00ff00cinematic votes:|r0" ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cff00ff00skip votes:|r" + I2S(udg_SKIP) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cff00ff00tuto votes:|r" + I2S(udg_TUTO) ))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Votes_Choice, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-cinematic", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Votes_Choice, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-tuto", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Votes_Choice, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-skip", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Votes_Choice, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -go", true)
        if ( Trig_Welcome_Message_Func027Func005C() ) then
            set udg_NumberOfPlayers=( udg_NumberOfPlayers + 1 )
            if ( (IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
                set udg_ActiveHumanPlayers=( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers + 1 )
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
                set udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers=( udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers + 1 )
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( (udg_NumberOfPlayers == 12) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_Unranked=false
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_WC3Stats_Init)
    if ( Trig_Welcome_Message_Func030C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_6013")
    else
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_6015")
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(0), "TRIGSTR_236")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(1), "TRIGSTR_483")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(2), "TRIGSTR_083")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(8)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(8), "TRIGSTR_3502")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(3), "TRIGSTR_1860")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(4), "TRIGSTR_736")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(5)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(5), "TRIGSTR_2808")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(6), "TRIGSTR_182")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(20)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(20), "TRIGSTR_3503")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(9)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(9), "TRIGSTR_1886")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(10), "TRIGSTR_1888")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerName(Player(11), "TRIGSTR_1889")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Welcome_Message takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Welcome_Message=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Welcome_Message, 0.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Welcome_Message, function Trig_Welcome_Message_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Votes Choice
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_FIRSTVOTE == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002Func003Func001Func005001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == " -go" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-skip" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-tuto" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-cinematic" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unranked == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votes_Choice_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_3641")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_3642")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_3643")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4208")
    if ( Trig_Votes_Choice_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_FIRSTVOTE=true
        set udg_CINEMATIC=0
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_MouseClick1)
        set udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
        set udg_CINEMATIC=( udg_CINEMATIC + 1 )
    else
        if ( Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002C() ) then
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_MouseClick1)
            set udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
            set udg_TUTO=( udg_TUTO + 1 )
        else
            if ( Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002Func003C() ) then
                call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_MouseClick1)
                set udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
                set udg_SKIP=( udg_SKIP + 1 )
            else
                if ( Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002Func003Func001C() ) then
                    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_MouseClick1)
                    set udg_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
                    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes)
                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Go)
                else
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Votes_Choice_Func007Func002Func003Func001Func005001001)), 2.50, "TRIGSTR_6151")
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cff00ff00cinematic votes:|r" + I2S(udg_CINEMATIC) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cff00ff00skip votes:|r" + I2S(udg_SKIP) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cff00ff00tuto votes:|r" + I2S(udg_TUTO) ))
    if ( Trig_Votes_Choice_Func011C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_6012")
    else
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_6016")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Votes_Choice takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Votes_Choice=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Votes_Choice, function Trig_Votes_Choice_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cinematic or Tuto or Skip votes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC > udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC > udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC == udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP == udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO < udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO < udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC == udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC == udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO == udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO == udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP == udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP == udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002Func003C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO > udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO > udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO == udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC == udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP < udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP < udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TUTO == udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP == udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC < udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CINEMATIC < udg_SKIP ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func021Func033C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func021Func034C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func025Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(7) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func026001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func027001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func028001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func034002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func035002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func037002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func038002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func040002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func041002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func062C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func063C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func064C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func065C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func066C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP > udg_CINEMATIC ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SKIP > udg_TUTO ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_StartTimerWindow)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Votes_Choice)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func006C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 3.00, "TRIGSTR_7211")
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call ClearSelection()
        call FogEnableOn()
        call FogMaskEnableOn()
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Starting_Cinematic)
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spiders_spawn)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func007C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 3.00, "TRIGSTR_7212")
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call ClearSelection()
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call SetUserControlForceOff(GetPlayersAll())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0)
            call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Red)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Blue)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Teal)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Purple)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Yellow)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Orange)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Grey)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Light_Blue)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Coal)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Green)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Dark_Green)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Tutorial_Brown)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Tutorials_End)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 3.00, "TRIGSTR_7249")
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call ClearSelection()
        call FogEnableOn()
        call FogMaskEnableOn()
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call ForceCinematicSubtitlesBJ(true)
        call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_n00J_1555)
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_n00J_1555, 0.00)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Starting_time)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer_Income, false, 180.00)
        call UseTimeOfDayBJ(true)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H00F_0286)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H01O_0359, "move", udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0)
            call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
            call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-give gold ", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-give soul ", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Share_Control, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-share ", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Unshare_Control, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-unshare ", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Clear_messages, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-clear", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Clear_messages, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-cl", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-take gold ", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-take soul ", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Help_Command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-help", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_VoteKick_Commands, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -greedisgood", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_01, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -warpten", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -reset cd", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -reset stat", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -level up", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Results, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -results", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Vision, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -iseedeadpeople", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Players_Group_Hints, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hint", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Players_Group_Hints, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-tip", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Hard_undead_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hard", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Hard_human_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hard", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Impossible_undead_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-impossible", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_01, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-add time ", false)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_02, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-yes", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_02, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-no", true)
            if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func021Func033C() ) then
                call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
                call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func021Func034C() ) then
                call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
                call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00R_0297)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(8), udg_Point, 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_UnitsKilled[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
            set udg_UnitsLost[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
            set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func025Func004C() ) then
                call ShareEverythingWithTeam(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        // Activate triggers after tutorials and cinematic
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Timer_Human_Victory)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Every_3min_humans_score)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities)
        // -----------------------------------------
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_01, Condition(function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func034002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func035002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_02, Condition(function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func037002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func038002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_03, Condition(function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func040002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func041002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        // -----------------------------------------
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set udg_RandomNumber=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
        call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, false)
        call RemoveWeatherEffectBJ(udg_WeatherMap)
        call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06U', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06U', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff106246" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06W', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06W', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff4a2a04" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06X', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06X', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff20c000" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06Z', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06Z', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff106246" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A070', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A070', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff4a2a04" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A071', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
        call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A071', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff20c000" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Starting_Info)
        call ResumeMusicBJ()
        if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func062C() ) then
            call DoNothing()
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func063C() ) then
            call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLhr')
            set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func064C() ) then
            call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'WOlw')
            set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func065C() ) then
            call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNls')
            set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Func008Func066C() ) then
            call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLlr')
            set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
        else
        endif
        call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, true)
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spiders_spawn)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes, 20.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes, function Trig_Cinematic_or_Tuto_or_Skip_votes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starting Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func017002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func027002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func037002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func081Func031C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func081Func032C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func085Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(7) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func086001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func087001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func088001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func097002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func098002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func100002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func101002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func103002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func104002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func125C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func126C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func127C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func128C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func129C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_SadMystery)
    set udg_SadMystery_Music=GetLastPlayedSound()
    call SetSkyModel("Environment\\Sky\\LordaeronFallSky\\LordaeronFallSky.mdl")
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call ForceCinematicSubtitlesBJ(true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00N_0006, "TRIGSTR_123", gg_snd_GeneralHector01, "TRIGSTR_124", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_13, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00N_0006, "TRIGSTR_125", gg_snd_GeneralHector02, "TRIGSTR_126", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_12, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00N_0006, "TRIGSTR_127", gg_snd_GeneralHector03, "TRIGSTR_128", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_01, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_01)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func017002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_h00G_0757, "TRIGSTR_129", gg_snd_SoldierOutpost, "TRIGSTR_130", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_02, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_h040_1345, "TRIGSTR_131", gg_snd_SoldierEncampment01, "TRIGSTR_253", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_03, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_02)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func027002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_h040_1345, "TRIGSTR_258", gg_snd_SoldierEncampment02, "TRIGSTR_290", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_04, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H01O_0359, "TRIGSTR_292", gg_snd_SirVandol01, "TRIGSTR_293", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_05, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_03)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func037002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitFacingTimed(gg_unit_H01O_0359, 140.00, 0.50)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_H01O_0359, "holdposition")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_h00G_0801, "TRIGSTR_437", gg_snd_SoldierVillage01, "TRIGSTR_514", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H00F_0286)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H01O_0359, "move", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_h00G_0801, "TRIGSTR_526", gg_snd_SoldierVillage02, "TRIGSTR_527", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_h00G_0801, "TRIGSTR_538", gg_snd_SoldierVillage03, "TRIGSTR_539", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_06, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H01O_0359, "TRIGSTR_528", gg_snd_SirVandol02, "TRIGSTR_529", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H01O_0359, "TRIGSTR_530", gg_snd_SirVandol03, "TRIGSTR_531", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_07, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.30)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H01O_0359, "TRIGSTR_532", gg_snd_SirVandol04, "TRIGSTR_533", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_08, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.50)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_09, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 3.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.30)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_10, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00N_0006, "TRIGSTR_534", gg_snd_GeneralHector04, "TRIGSTR_535", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Starting_Cinematic_11, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00N_0006, "TRIGSTR_536", gg_snd_GeneralHector05, "TRIGSTR_537", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_n00J_1555)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_n00J_1555, 0.00)
    call UseTimeOfDayBJ(true)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players)
    // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // END OF CINEMATIC
    // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Starting_time)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer_Income, false, 180.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0)
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-give gold ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-give soul ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Share_Control, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-share ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Unshare_Control, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-unshare ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Clear_messages, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-clear", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Clear_messages, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-cl", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-take gold ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-take soul ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Help_Command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-help", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_VoteKick_Commands, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -greedisgood", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_01, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -warpten", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -reset 1", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -reset 2", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -level up", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Results, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -results", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Vision, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -iseedeadpeople", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Hard_undead_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hard", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Hard_human_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hard", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Impossible_undead_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-impossible", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_01, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-add time ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_02, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-yes", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_02, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-no", true)
        if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func081Func031C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func081Func032C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00R_0297)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(8), udg_Point, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_UnitsKilled[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
        set udg_UnitsLost[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
        set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func085Func004C() ) then
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call SetSkyModel(null)
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_SadMystery_Music, false)
    call KillSoundWhenDoneBJ(udg_SadMystery_Music)
    // Activate triggers after tutorials and cinematic
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Timer_Human_Victory)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Every_3min_humans_score)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities)
    // -----------------------------------------
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_01, Condition(function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func097002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func098002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_02, Condition(function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func100002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func101002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_03, Condition(function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func103002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func104002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    // -----------------------------------------
    set udg_RandomNumber=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, false)
    call RemoveWeatherEffectBJ(udg_WeatherMap)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06U', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06U', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff106246" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06W', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06W', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff4a2a04" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06X', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06X', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff20c000" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06Z', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06Z', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff106246" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A070', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A070', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff4a2a04" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A071', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A071', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff20c000" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Starting_Info)
    call ResumeMusicBJ()
    if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func125C() ) then
        call DoNothing()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func126C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLhr')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func127C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'WOlw')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func128C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNls')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Func129C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLlr')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starting_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starting_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starting_Cinematic, function Trig_Starting_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starting Info
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starting_Info_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_HumanPlayers, 15.00, "TRIGSTR_8156")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 15.00, "TRIGSTR_8157")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starting_Info takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starting_Info=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starting_Info, function Trig_Starting_Info_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tutorials End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tutorials_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Red == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Blue == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Teal == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Purple == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Yellow == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Orange == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Grey == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_LightBlue == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Coal == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Green == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_DarkGreen == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Tutorial_Brown == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tutorials_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 5.00, "TRIGSTR_7230")
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call FogEnableOn()
    call FogMaskEnableOn()
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Starting_Cinematic)
    call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spiders_spawn)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tutorials_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tutorials_End=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Tutorials_End)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Tutorials_End, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Tutorials_End, Condition(function Trig_Tutorials_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tutorials_End, function Trig_Tutorials_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tutorial Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tutorial_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(0))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Point, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4195")
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0])
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h002_0461)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Point, 1.50)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4318")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h002_0461)
    call RotateCameraAroundLocBJ(360.00, udg_Point, Player(0), 4.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)

    set udg_Tutorial_Red=true
endfunction
