//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tutorial_Brown_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(11))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4207")
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_Uear_0537)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.50)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4330")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_Uear_0537)
    call RotateCameraAroundLocBJ(360.00, udg_Point, Player(11), 4.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4731")
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_Eill_0158)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.50)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4732")
    set udg_Point=GetDestructableLoc(gg_dest_LT06_2418)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4733")
    set udg_Point=GetDestructableLoc(gg_dest_FTtw_1385)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set udg_Point=GetDestructableLoc(gg_dest_DTg5_0129)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4734")
    set udg_Point=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(11))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4712")
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00H_0828)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00H_0826)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4736")
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_utom_0947)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    // -
    // -
    // -
    set udg_Point=GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(11))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(11), udg_Point, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11])
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[11], 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_4194")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    set udg_Tutorial_Brown=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tutorial_Brown takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tutorial_Brown=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tutorial_Brown, function Trig_Tutorial_Brown_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Settings Variables
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Settings_Variables_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Player[0]=Player(0)
    set udg_Player[1]=Player(1)
    set udg_Player[2]=Player(2)
    set udg_Player[3]=Player(3)
    set udg_Player[4]=Player(4)
    set udg_Player[5]=Player(5)
    set udg_Player[6]=Player(6)
    set udg_Player[7]=Player(7)
    set udg_Player[8]=Player(8)
    set udg_Player[9]=Player(9)
    set udg_Player[10]=Player(10)
    set udg_Player[11]=Player(11)
    set udg_Player[12]=Player(12)
    set udg_Player[13]=Player(13)
    set udg_Player[14]=Player(14)
    set udg_Player[20]=Player(20)
    set udg_Player[21]=Player(21)
    // -----------------------------
    set udg_PlayerColor[0]="red"
    set udg_PlayerColor[1]="blue"
    set udg_PlayerColor[2]="teal"
    set udg_PlayerColor[3]="purple"
    set udg_PlayerColor[4]="yellow"
    set udg_PlayerColor[5]="orange"
    set udg_PlayerColor[6]="green"
    set udg_PlayerColor[7]="white"
    set udg_PlayerColor[8]="grey"
    set udg_PlayerColor[9]="light blue"
    set udg_PlayerColor[10]="dark green"
    set udg_PlayerColor[11]="brown"
    set udg_PlayerColor[12]="maroon"
    set udg_PlayerColor[13]="navy"
    set udg_PlayerColor[14]="turquoise"
    set udg_PlayerColor[20]="coal"
    // -----------------------------
    set udg_EndOfTheGame=false
    set udg_Protector=gg_unit_H014_0206
    set udg_Protector_Ghost=null
    set udg_NumberOfPlayers=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_UnitsKilled[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
        set udg_UnitsLost[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
        set udg_HeroesKilled[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    // -----------------------------
    set udg_PromotedUnits=0
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=8
    // -----------------------------
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Settings)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Settings_Units_Limit_and_Available)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Settings_Decorations)
    call StopMusicBJ(false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Settings_Variables takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Settings_Variables=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Settings_Variables, function Trig_Settings_Variables_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Settings
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Settings_Func052Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Func052Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_Hashtable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_RE_Knocktable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_KnockbackTable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers)
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_PlayersGroup_Hints)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetPlayerColorBJ(Player(7), PLAYER_COLOR_SNOW, true)
    call SetPlayerColorBJ(Player(21), PLAYER_COLOR_PEACH, true)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(6), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(10), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(11), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(12), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(13), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(14), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call SetPlayerColorBJ(Player(12), PLAYER_COLOR_AQUA, true)
    call SetPlayerColorBJ(Player(13), PLAYER_COLOR_BROWN, true)
    call SetPlayerColorBJ(Player(14), PLAYER_COLOR_GREEN, true)
    call SetPlayerName(Player(12), GetPlayerName(Player(10)))
    call SetPlayerName(Player(13), GetPlayerName(Player(11)))
    call SetPlayerName(Player(14), GetPlayerName(Player(6)))
    call SetTimeOfDay(12)
    call UseTimeOfDayBJ(false)
    // Income Building
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A054', gg_unit_h00H_0659)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A054', gg_unit_h005_0761)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A054', gg_unit_h00X_1068)
    // ----------------------------------
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01J', 0, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01J', 0, Player(11))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01K', 0, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01K', 0, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01Q', 0, Player(11))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01Q', 0, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R011', 0, Player(11))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R011', 0, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h011', false, Player(4))
    // ----------------------------------
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(6), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(10), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(11), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(12), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(13), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(14), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(12), Player(10), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_ADVUNITS)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(13), Player(11), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_ADVUNITS)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(14), Player(6), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_ADVUNITS)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Settings_Func052Func001C() ) then
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_Starting_Undead_Players)
        else
            if ( Trig_Settings_Func052Func001Func003C() ) then
                call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_Starting_Human_Players)
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    // ----------------------------------
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Settings takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Settings=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Settings, function Trig_Settings_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Settings Units Limit and Available
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Settings_Units_Limit_and_Available_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('H014', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('H042', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('H014', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('H042', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hrif', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h03I', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00Z', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02R', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hsor', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02S', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h01M', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02T', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h04W', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h04V', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h05X', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h05Y', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h062', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h063', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('o00N', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('u007', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n00T', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n01G', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02X', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n01H', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02Y', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n01I', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02Z', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h03H', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call UnitShareVisionBJ(true, gg_unit_Uwar_0150, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call UnitShareVisionBJ(true, gg_unit_nhew_0302, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerFlagBJ(PLAYER_STATE_GIVES_BOUNTY, true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('hrif', 40, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h00Z', 40, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h05X', 40, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h062', 40, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h04W', 25, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('hsor', 25, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h01M', 20, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02H', 10, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e000', 6, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e003', 6, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('n01B', 4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('u009', 24, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02C', 30, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02A', 30, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h01W', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h04Y', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h064', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('hpea', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02O', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('nbee', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('o003', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('e008', 4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02P', 15, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h01G', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h03G', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h04S', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h032', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, 1500)
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R008', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A05V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A08T', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'S00F', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00Z', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('uaco', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02X', 1, Player(11))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02Y', 1, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02Z', 1, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('uaco', true, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('uaco', true, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('uaco', true, Player(11))
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A05V', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A06U', Player(10))
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A06W', Player(11))
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A06X', Player(6))
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A06Z', Player(10))
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A070', Player(11))
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A071', Player(6))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00Z', true, Player(8))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h03H', true, Player(1))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00S', false, Player(1))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00G', false, Player(4))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h011', false, Player(4))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00Z', false, Player(4))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hrif', false, Player(8))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02O', false, Player(9))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02O', false, Player(8))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hpea', false, Player(5))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h00Z', 40, Player(8))
    set udg_DawnfallAlive=4
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Settings_Units_Limit_and_Available takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Settings_Units_Limit_and_Available=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Settings_Units_Limit_and_Available, function Trig_Settings_Units_Limit_and_Available_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Settings Decorations
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func022002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(21) )
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func022002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func022002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(21)), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func023002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "holdposition")
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func050Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) == 'LTrc' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func050A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func050Func001C() ) then
        call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(GetEnumDestructable(), true)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // ----------------------------------
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00U_1496, "stand")
    set udg_CrystalGolem=gg_unit_n00V_1497
    call ShowUnitHide(udg_CrystalGolem)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_h01V_1500)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_h01V_1498)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_h01V_1501)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'XOmr', gg_rct_Crystal_Golem_Region)
    // ----------------------------------
    call WaygateActivateBJ(false, gg_unit_n00B_0665)
    call WaygateActivateBJ(false, gg_unit_n00B_0074)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00I_1254, true)
    call WaygateActivateBJ(false, gg_unit_n00H_0828)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00H_0828, "stand alternate")
    call WaygateActivateBJ(false, gg_unit_n00H_0826)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00H_0826, "stand alternate")
    // ----------------------------------
    call ShowDestructableBJ(false, gg_dest_LTrc_8266)
    call ShowDestructableBJ(false, gg_dest_LTrc_8265)
    call ShowDestructableBJ(false, gg_dest_LTrc_8252)
    call ShowDestructableBJ(false, gg_dest_LTrc_8255)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Human_Village, Condition(function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func022002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func023002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_LT04_13465)
    // ----------------------------------
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h038_0103, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h033_0536, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h025_0058, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h01X_0405, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h02F_0059, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h01X_0530, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h02G_0102, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h01X_0825, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h01X_0666, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h043_0901, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h028_0064, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h034_0508, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h061_1736, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h03E_0792, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h05A_1119, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h044_0232, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h04Z_0363, 0.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h053_0418, 0.00)
    // ----------------------------------
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South_East)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_North_East)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South_North_West)
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect(), function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Func050A)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("death", 'D02D', gg_rct_Destroyed_Orc_Shipyard)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0323, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_0255, PLAYER_COLOR_YELLOW)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_1829, PLAYER_COLOR_YELLOW)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_1830, PLAYER_COLOR_CYAN)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncp3_1493, PLAYER_COLOR_LIGHT_BLUE)
    // ----------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", gg_unit_H048_0717, "war3mapImported\\Simple Cape.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_H048_0717, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_H014_0206)))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", gg_unit_H067_0648, "war3mapImported\\Simple Cape.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_H067_0648, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_H014_0206)))
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D01I', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_Ulic_1139, true)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_n00P_0265)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_n00P_0288)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_n00N_0139)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_n00N_0145)
    call WaygateActivateBJ(false, gg_unit_n00N_0139)
    call WaygateActivateBJ(false, gg_unit_n00N_0145)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00G_0009, "stand alternate")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00G_0014, "stand alternate")
    // ----------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_H00N_0006, "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_H00N_0006, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_H00N_0006)))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_Hapm_0287, "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_Hapm_0287, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Hapm_0287)))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_H031_0915, "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_H031_0915, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_H031_0915)))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_Hpb1_0910, "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_Hpb1_0910, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Hpb1_0910)))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_Nplh_1034, "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_Nplh_1034, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034)))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_H055_1185, "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_H055_1185, GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_H055_1185)))
    // ----------------------------------
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(gg_rct_Uther_Statue, 'LRaa')
    set udg_RayOfLight=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_RayOfLight, true)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOtf', gg_rct_Human_Village)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h02Q_0226, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h00C_0231, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h00C_0570, true)
    call BlzSetUnitName(gg_unit_nshe_1001, "RedChampion")
    call BlzSetUnitName(gg_unit_nshe_0995, "Zabijak")
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_Hpal_1002, 100, 100, 100, 50.00)
    call SetUnitPathing(gg_unit_Hpal_1002, false)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_Hpal_1002)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_uubs_1023)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_uubs_1020)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_01)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_02)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_03)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_04)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_Ucrl_1330, true)
    set udg_CorruptedBookOfLight=GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(gg_unit_U00I_1254, 'I014')
    set udg_UndeadHeroBrown01=gg_unit_Uear_0537
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Revive_Agandur, udg_UndeadHeroBrown01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    set udg_UndeadHeroDarkGreen01=gg_unit_Opgh_0247
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Revive_Hellscreamer, udg_UndeadHeroDarkGreen01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    set udg_UndeadHeroGreen01=gg_unit_Nplh_1034
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Revive_Cargul, udg_UndeadHeroGreen01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    set udg_UndeadHeroGreen02=gg_unit_Ucrl_1330
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Revive_Crypt_Lord, udg_UndeadHeroGreen02, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_n00J_1555)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_n00J_1555, 0.00)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'NWsd', gg_rct_Human_Ships_at_Beach)
    call BlzSetUnitName(gg_unit_n01K_0667, "Zabijak's deer")
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0BK', gg_unit_n01K_0667)
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(0), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(0)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(1), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(1)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(2), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(2)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(3), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(3)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(4), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(4)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(5), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(5)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(6), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(6)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(8), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(8)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(9), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(9)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(10), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(10)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(11), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(11)))
    call SetCameraQuickPositionLocForPlayer(Player(20), GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(Player(20)))
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_20007)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_20009)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_20008)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_20011)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_20010)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_20024)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_20026)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_20025)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_20027)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'COla', gg_rct_Trees_block_Path_Purple)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_h04E_1019, 0.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_h04E_1019)
    call SetUnitPathing(gg_unit_h04E_1019, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Settings_Decorations takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Settings_Decorations=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Settings_Decorations, function Trig_Settings_Decorations_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hints
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hints_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_EndOfTheGame == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hints_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hints_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hints_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hints_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hints_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
    set udg_RandomNumber=GetRandomInt(1, 4)
    if ( Trig_Hints_Func004C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_PlayersGroup_Hints, 6.00, "TRIGSTR_6247")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hints_Func005C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_PlayersGroup_Hints, 6.00, "TRIGSTR_6793")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hints_Func006C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_PlayersGroup_Hints, 6.00, "TRIGSTR_6831")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hints_Func007C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_PlayersGroup_Hints, 6.00, "TRIGSTR_1627")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hints takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hints=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Hints, 800.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hints, Condition(function Trig_Hints_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hints, function Trig_Hints_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Information Quests Menue
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Information_Quests_Menue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Required
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_1445", "TRIGSTR_1446", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNZombie.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_1447", "TRIGSTR_1448", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNFootman.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_4964", "TRIGSTR_4965", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBigBadVoodooSpell.blp")
    // Optional
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_844", "TRIGSTR_845", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNEngineeringUpgrade.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_234", "TRIGSTR_644", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNTomeBrown.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_846", "TRIGSTR_847", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSelectHeroOn.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_1268", "TRIGSTR_1269", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNManual3.blp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Information_Quests_Menue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Information_Quests_Menue=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Information_Quests_Menue, function Trig_Information_Quests_Menue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Weather
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Weather_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Weather_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Weather_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Weather_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Weather_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Weather_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_RandomNumber=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, false)
    call RemoveWeatherEffectBJ(udg_WeatherMap)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    if ( Trig_Weather_Func005C() ) then
        call DoNothing()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Weather_Func006C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLhr')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Weather_Func007C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'WOlw')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Weather_Func008C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNls')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Weather_Func009C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLlr')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Weather takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Weather=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Weather, 600.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Weather, function Trig_Weather_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Buy zombies in ships
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_uubs_0552 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_uubs_0550 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_uubs_0551 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_uubs_1023 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_uubs_1020 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_3)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSoldUnit(), udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSoldUnit(), udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSoldUnit(), udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Blue_Seafront_1)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSoldUnit(), udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Blue_Seafront_2)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSoldUnit(), udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Buy_zombies_in_ships takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Buy_zombies_in_ships=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Buy_zombies_in_ships, gg_unit_uubs_0552, EVENT_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Buy_zombies_in_ships, gg_unit_uubs_0550, EVENT_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Buy_zombies_in_ships, gg_unit_uubs_0551, EVENT_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Buy_zombies_in_ships, gg_unit_uubs_1023, EVENT_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Buy_zombies_in_ships, gg_unit_uubs_1020, EVENT_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Buy_zombies_in_ships, function Trig_Buy_zombies_in_ships_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Researches for Defenders
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Researches_for_Defenders_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Researches_for_Defenders_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), Player(7)) < GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Researches_for_Defenders_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Researches_for_Defenders_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap(GetResearched(), ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple(GetResearched(), Player(7)) + 1 ), Player(7))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Researches_for_Defenders takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Researches_for_Defenders=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Researches_for_Defenders, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Researches_for_Defenders, Condition(function Trig_Researches_for_Defenders_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Researches_for_Defenders, function Trig_Researches_for_Defenders_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Players Tips Unit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Players_Tips_Unit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetSoldUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Players_Tips_Unit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Players_Tips_Unit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Players_Tips_Unit, gg_unit_nhew_0302, EVENT_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Players_Tips_Unit, function Trig_Players_Tips_Unit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player Leave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_Leave_Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func019Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func019Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func019Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func019Func001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11)), (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11)), (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Undead_command) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func020001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func021001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func022001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Func024C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_EndOfTheGame == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Leave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetTriggerPlayer())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + " left the game!" ))
    set udg_NumberOfPlayers=( udg_NumberOfPlayers - 1 )
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_ActiveHumanPlayers=( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers - 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers=( udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers - 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( Trig_Player_Leave_Func019C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Command_Activation)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_command)
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_115")
    else
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_Player_Leave_Func024C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Civil_War_Activation)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_Leave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_Leave=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(0))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(1))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(2))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(3))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(4))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(5))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(6))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(8))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(9))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(10))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(11))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_Leave, Player(20))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Player_Leave, function Trig_Player_Leave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Income Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, 1500)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func003002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Income_Init_Func001Func004A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Income_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Income_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Income_Init, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Income_Init, function Trig_Income_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Income
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Income_Func002Func001Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_ReceiveGold)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Income_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED), udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Income_Func002Func001Func002001001)), "TRIGSTR_7427")
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer_Income, false, 180.00)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Regular)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Income takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Income=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Income, udg_Timer_Income)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Income, function Trig_Income_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No units in Harbor 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Harbor_01_bis)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_units_in_Harbor_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_01, gg_rct_Harbor_01)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_01, Condition(function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_01, function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No units in Harbor 02
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No units in Harbor 03
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Integer=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Harbor_01_bis)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Harbor_02_bis)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_units_in_Harbor_03 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_03=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_03, gg_rct_Harbor_03)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_03, Condition(function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_units_in_Harbor_03, function Trig_No_units_in_Harbor_03_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warning Units limit P7
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P7_Func007001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P7_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(6), Condition(function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P7_Func007001001002))) >= 200 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P7_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[6], 10.00, "TRIGSTR_2256")
    call TriggerSleepAction(40.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Warning_Units_limit_P7 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Warning_Units_limit_P7=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Warning_Units_limit_P7, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Warning_Units_limit_P7, Condition(function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P7_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Warning_Units_limit_P7, function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P7_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warning Units limit P11
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P11_Func007001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(10), Condition(function Trig_Warning_Units_limit_P11_Func007001001002))) >= 200 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[10], 10.00, "TRIGSTR_2254")

    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wildings Limit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wildings_Limit_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h05F_1464 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h05F_1404 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Wildings_Limit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Wildings_Limit_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wildings_Limit_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h05F_1464 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wildings_Limit_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h05F_1404 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wildings_Limit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Wildings_Limit_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Wilding_Guard_01)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Wildings_Limit_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Wilding_Guard_02)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wildings_Limit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wildings_Limit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Wildings_Limit, gg_rct_Wilding_Limit_Access)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wildings_Limit, Condition(function Trig_Wildings_Limit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wildings_Limit, function Trig_Wildings_Limit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Items not for Undeads
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Items_not_for_Undeads_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I00M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'ofir' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I01H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I01M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I01N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I01L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I01K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_Undeads_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'ofir' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'U008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_Undeads_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetItemLoc(GetManipulatedItem())
    call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetItemPositionLoc(GetManipulatedItem(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig_Items_not_for_Undeads_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetItemLoc(GetManipulatedItem())
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
        call SetItemPositionLoc(GetManipulatedItem(), udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Items_not_for_Undeads takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Items_not_for_Undeads=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Items_not_for_Undeads, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Items_not_for_Undeads, Condition(function Trig_Items_not_for_Undeads_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Items_not_for_Undeads, function Trig_Items_not_for_Undeads_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Items not for Humans
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01H' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetItemLoc(GetManipulatedItem())
    call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetItemPositionLoc(GetManipulatedItem(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Items_not_for_Humans takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Items_not_for_Humans=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Items_not_for_Humans, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Items_not_for_Humans, Condition(function Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Items_not_for_Humans, function Trig_Items_not_for_Humans_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Corrupted Book of Light used by Humans
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_CorruptedBookOfLight ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 200.00 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_USE_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans, Condition(function Trig_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans, function Trig_Corrupted_Book_of_Light_used_by_Humans_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'H014' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I000' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    endif
    if ( not Trig_Items_not_for_Protector_Func006C() ) then

    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Sword_Region_back_up)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

endfunction

    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hpb1' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hkal' ) ) then

    endif

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hant' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hjnd' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H055' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00T' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H048' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H05N' ) ) then
        return true
    endif

        return true
    endif

        return true
    endif

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H03J' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H03R' ) ) then
        return true

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Items not for SiNil or Wreystern 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hlgr' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hant' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H055' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'ofir' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I000' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00D' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func006Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func006Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hlgr' )
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hant' )
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00F' )
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H055' )
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hlgr') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'AEbl', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hant') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'AHmt', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00F') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H055') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=8
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A028', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01, Condition(function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01, function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_01_Actions)
endfunction
