function Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hlgr') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'AEbl', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hant') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'AHmt', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00F') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H055') ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A07T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=8
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Items_not_for_SiNil_or_Wreystern_02_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A028', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Items heavy for humans heroes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I000' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes_Func012C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('B00B', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('BOwk', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02N', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02P', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "slow", GetTriggerUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "silence", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes, Condition(function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes, function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_heroes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Items heavy for humans drop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I000' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00M') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I000') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    if ( Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A035', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "disenchant", udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('B00U', GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('B00U', GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('B00U', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DROP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop, Condition(function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop, function Trig_Items_heavy_for_humans_drop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No Orb of fire for Range Undead Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Ulic' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H04J' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H04I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'ofir' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetItemLoc(GetManipulatedItem())
    call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetItemPositionLoc(GetManipulatedItem(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero, Condition(function Trig_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero, function Trig_No_Orb_of_fire_for_Range_Undead_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Buying items in Green Zombie Tower
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Buying_items_in_Green_Zombie_Tower_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Item_Green_Tower)
    call SetItemPositionLoc(GetSoldItem(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Buying_items_in_Green_Zombie_Tower takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Buying_items_in_Green_Zombie_Tower=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Buying_items_in_Green_Zombie_Tower, gg_unit_uzg2_0175, EVENT_UNIT_SELL_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Buying_items_in_Green_Zombie_Tower, function Trig_Buying_items_in_Green_Zombie_Tower_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: One item type per hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_One_item_type_per_hero_Func001Func001Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_One_item_type_per_hero_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetForLoopIndexA()) != GetManipulatedItem() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetForLoopIndexA())) == GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'phea' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'pman' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_One_item_type_per_hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_One_item_type_per_hero_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_One_item_type_per_hero_Func001Func001Func002001001)), 5.00, ( "|cffff0000The hero already have " + ( GetItemName(GetManipulatedItem()) + "!|r" ) ))
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_One_item_type_per_hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_One_item_type_per_hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_One_item_type_per_hero, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_One_item_type_per_hero, function Trig_One_item_type_per_hero_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Invulnerable_items_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemInvulnerable(GetManipulatedItem()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Invulnerable_items_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Invulnerable_items_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetItemInvulnerableBJ(GetManipulatedItem(), true)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Invulnerable_items=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Invulnerable_items, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DROP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Invulnerable_items, Condition(function Trig_Invulnerable_items_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Invulnerable_items, function Trig_Invulnerable_items_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No friendly attacks on Buildings
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetAttacker(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != gg_unit_h01V_1500 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != gg_unit_h01V_1498 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != gg_unit_h01V_1501 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != gg_unit_ntn2_0209 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitInterruptAttack(GetAttacker())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings, Condition(function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings, function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_on_Buildings_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No friendly attacks Commands Humans
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-troll on" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_AntiTrollHuman == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-troll off" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_AntiTrollHuman == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Humans)
            set udg_AntiTrollHuman=true
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
            call DisplayTextToForce(udg_HumanPlayers, "TRIGSTR_7920")
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Humans)
            set udg_AntiTrollHuman=false
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
            call DisplayTextToForce(udg_HumanPlayers, "TRIGSTR_7921")
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans, function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No friendly attacks Commands Undeads
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-troll on" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_AntiTrollUndead == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-troll off" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_AntiTrollUndead == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads)
            set udg_AntiTrollUndead=true
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
            call DisplayTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, "TRIGSTR_273")
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads)
            set udg_AntiTrollUndead=false
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
            call DisplayTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, "TRIGSTR_855")
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No friendly attacks Humans
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Humans_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'necr' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nder' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nech' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nrac' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h05K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h05L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h05J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h01V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Humans_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitInterruptAttack(GetAttacker())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_friendly_attacks_Humans takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Humans=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Humans, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Humans, Condition(function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Humans_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Humans, function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Humans_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No friendly attacks Undeads
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'necr' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nder' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nech' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nrac' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h05K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h05L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h05J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h01V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitInterruptAttack(GetAttacker())
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads, Condition(function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads, function Trig_No_friendly_attacks_Undeads_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Command Activation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Command_Activation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_command)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_227")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Command_Activation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Command_Activation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Undead_Command_Activation, 1800.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Command_Activation, function Trig_Undead_Command_Activation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead command
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_command_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(0) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(1) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(2) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(3) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(4) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(5) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_command_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UndeadCommandBoolean[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + " typed \"-undead\"! Control of his units was given to other human players." ))
    set udg_UndeadCommand[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(0)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg__Undead_Red)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(1)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg__Undead_Blue)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(2)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg__Undead_Teal)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(3)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg__Undead_Purple)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(4)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg__Undead_Yellow)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(5)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Undead_Orange)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(8)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg__Undead_Grey)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(9)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg__Undead_Light_blue)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Undead_command_Func013Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_command takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_command=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_command)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(0), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(1), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(2), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(3), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(4), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(5), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(8), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Undead_command, Player(9), "-undead", true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_command, Condition(function Trig_Undead_command_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_command, function Trig_Undead_command_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hard undead command
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(3500, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount == ( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HardUndead_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HardUndeadOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_HardUndeadOn=true
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_QuestActivateWhat1)
        set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
        set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount=( udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount + 1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000requested a \"Hard Bonus\" for Undead players.|r " + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 )) + " Human players |cffff0000must type \"-hard\" before 30 seconds to activate it.|r |cffff0000The game will be unranked.|r" ) ) ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( "\"Hard Bonus\" for undeads votes:" + ( I2S(udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount) + ( "/" + I2S(udg_ActiveHumanPlayers) ) ) ))
        call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
        call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
        set udg_HardUndeadOn=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount=0
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
            set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount=( udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount + 1 )
            call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000requested a \"Hard Bonus\" for Undead players.|r " + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 )) + " Human players |cffff0000must type \"-hard\" before 30 seconds to activate it.|r |cffff0000The game will be unranked.|r" ) ) ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( "\"Hard Bonus\" for undeads votes:" + ( I2S(udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount) + ( "/" + I2S(udg_ActiveHumanPlayers) ) ) ))
            if ( Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006C() ) then
                call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
                call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_7902")
                call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006Func005A)
                set udg_Unranked=true
                set udg_HardUndeadOn=false
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
                    set udg_HardUndead_PlayerVoteCount=0
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hard_undead_command takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hard_undead_command=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hard_undead_command, Condition(function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hard_undead_command, function Trig_Hard_undead_command_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Impossible undead command
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(100000, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount == ( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ImpossibleUndead_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ImpossibleUndeadOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ImpossibleUndeadOn=true
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_QuestActivateWhat1)
        set udg_ImpossibleUndead_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
        set udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount=( udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount + 1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000requested an \"Impossible Bonus\" for Undead players.|r " + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 )) + " Human players |cffff0000must type \"-impossible\" before 30 seconds to activate it.|r |cffff0000The game will be unranked.|r" ) ) ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( "\"Impossible Bonus\" for undeads votes:" + ( I2S(udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount) + ( "/" + I2S(udg_ActiveHumanPlayers) ) ) ))
        call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
        call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
        set udg_ImpossibleUndeadOn=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_ImpossibleUndead_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            set udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount=0
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_ImpossibleUndead_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
            set udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount=( udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount + 1 )
            call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000requested an \"Impossible Bonus\" for Undead players.|r " + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 )) + " Human players |cffff0000must type \"-impossible\" before 30 seconds to activate it.|r |cffff0000The game will be unranked.|r" ) ) ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( "\"Impossible Bonus\" for undeads votes:" + ( I2S(udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount) + ( "/" + I2S(udg_ActiveHumanPlayers) ) ) ))
            if ( Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006C() ) then
                call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
                call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2343")
                call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Func001Func001Func006Func005A)
                set udg_Unranked=true
                set udg_ImpossibleUndeadOn=false
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    set udg_ImpossibleUndead_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
                    set udg_ImpossibUndead_PlayerVoteCount=0
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Impossible_undead_command, function Trig_Impossible_undead_command_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hard human command
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hard_human_command_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001Func001Func006Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(2000, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount == ( udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HardHuman_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HardHumanOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hard_human_command_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_HardHumanOn=true
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_QuestActivateWhat1)
        set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
        set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount=( udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount + 1 )
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000requested a \"Hard Bonus\" for Human players.|r " + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers / 2 )) + " Undead players |cffff0000must type \"-hard\" before 30 seconds to activate it.|r |cffff0000The game will be unranked.|r" ) ) ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( "\"Hard Bonus\" for humans votes:" + ( I2S(udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount) + ( "/" + I2S(udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers) ) ) ))
        call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
        call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
        set udg_HardHumanOn=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount=0
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
            set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount=( udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount + 1 )
            call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000requested a \"Hard Bonus\" for Human players.|r " + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers / 2 )) + " Undead players |cffff0000must type \"-hard\" before 30 seconds to activate it.|r |cffff0000The game will be unranked.|r" ) ) ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 30, ( "\"Hard Bonus\" for humans votes:" + ( I2S(udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount) + ( "/" + I2S(udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers) ) ) ))
            if ( Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001Func001Func006C() ) then
                call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
                call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2826")
                call ForForce(udg_HumanPlayers, function Trig_Hard_human_command_Func001Func001Func006Func005A)
                set udg_Unranked=true
                set udg_HardHumanOn=false
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
                    set udg_HardHuman_PlayerVoteCount=0
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction
