    set gg_trg_Hard_human_command=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hard_human_command, Condition(function Trig_Hard_human_command_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hard_human_command, function Trig_Hard_human_command_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Camera command
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Camera_command_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 5) == "-cam " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Camera_command_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, S2R(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 6, StringLength(GetEventPlayerChatString()))), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Camera_command takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Camera_command=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(0), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(1), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(2), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(3), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(4), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(5), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(6), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(7), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(8), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(9), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(10), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(11), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(18), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_command, Player(20), "-cam ", false)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Camera_command, Condition(function Trig_Camera_command_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Camera_command, function Trig_Camera_command_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Zoom command
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Zoom_command_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 6) == "-zoom " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Zoom_command_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, S2R(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, StringLength(GetEventPlayerChatString()))), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Zoom_command takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Zoom_command=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(0), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(1), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(2), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(3), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(4), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(5), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(6), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(7), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(8), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(9), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(10), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(11), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(18), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Player(20), "-zoom ", false)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Zoom_command, Condition(function Trig_Zoom_command_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Zoom_command, function Trig_Zoom_command_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Camera Angle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Camera_Angle_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 7) == "-angle " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Camera_Angle_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Reel >= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Reel <= 360.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Camera_Angle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Reel=S2R(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, StringLength(GetEventPlayerChatString())))
    if ( Trig_Camera_Angle_Func002C() ) then
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, udg_Reel, 0)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Camera_Angle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Camera_Angle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(0), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(1), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(2), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(3), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(4), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(5), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(6), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(7), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(8), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(9), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(10), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(11), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(18), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Player(20), "-angle ", false)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, Condition(function Trig_Camera_Angle_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Camera_Angle, function Trig_Camera_Angle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Give Ressources
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Give_Ressources_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 6) == "-give " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerAlly(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], GetTriggerPlayer()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13) != "22" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )] != GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Ressources_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, 11) == "gold " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= udg_Integer ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Integer > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Ressources_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, 11) == "soul " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) >= udg_Integer ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Integer > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Ressources_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Integer=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 15, 30))
    if ( Trig_Give_Ressources_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - udg_Integer ))
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_Integer, udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAllies(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " gave |cffffff00" + ( I2S(udg_Integer) + ( " gold|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]) + "!" ) ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Give_Ressources_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) - udg_Integer ))
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_Integer, udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAllies(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " gave |cff8080ff" + ( I2S(udg_Integer) + ( " souls|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]) + "!" ) ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Give_Ressources takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Give_Ressources=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, Condition(function Trig_Give_Ressources_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, function Trig_Give_Ressources_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Take Ressources
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Take_Ressources_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )] == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerController(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Ressources_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 6) == "-take " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerAlly(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], GetTriggerPlayer()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13) != "22" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )] != GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Take_Ressources_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Ressources_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, 11) == "gold " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= udg_Integer ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Integer > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Ressources_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, 11) == "soul " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) >= udg_Integer ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Integer > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Ressources_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Integer=S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 15, 30))
    set udg_PlayerCommand=udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]
    if ( Trig_Take_Ressources_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 15, 30)) ))
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_Integer, GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAllies(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " took |cffffff00" + ( I2S(udg_Integer) + ( " gold|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]) + "!" ) ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Take_Ressources_Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) - S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 15, 30)) ))
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_Integer, GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAllies(GetTriggerPlayer()), ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " took |cff8080ff" + ( I2S(udg_Integer) + ( " souls|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 12, 13)) - 1 )]) + "!" ) ) ) ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Take_Ressources takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Take_Ressources=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, Condition(function Trig_Take_Ressources_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, function Trig_Take_Ressources_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Share Control
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Share_Control_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 7) == "-share " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 9) != "22" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 9) != "08" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 9)) - 1 )] != GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Share_Control_Func002Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Share_Control_Func002Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Share_Control_Func002Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Share_Control_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerAlly(udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], GetTriggerPlayer()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Share_Control_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_String=SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 9)
    if ( Trig_Share_Control_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAllies(GetTriggerPlayer()), 8.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000shared his full control with|r " + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )]) + "|cffff0000!|r" ) ) ))
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_ADVUNITS)
        if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10)) ) then // INLINED!!
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(12), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_ADVUNITS)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11)) ) then // INLINED!!
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(13), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_ADVUNITS)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6)) ) then // INLINED!!
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(14), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_ADVUNITS)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Share_Control takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Share_Control=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Share_Control, Condition(function Trig_Share_Control_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Share_Control, function Trig_Share_Control_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unshare Control
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unshare_Control_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 9) == "-unshare " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 9) != "22" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 9) != "08" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[( S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 9)) - 1 )] != GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unshare_Control_Func002Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Unshare_Control_Func002Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Unshare_Control_Func002Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Unshare_Control_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerAlly(udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], GetTriggerPlayer()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unshare_Control_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_String=SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 10, 11)
    if ( Trig_Unshare_Control_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAllies(GetTriggerPlayer()), 8.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + ( " |cffff0000took away his control from|r " + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )]) + "|cffff0000!|r" ) ) ))
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(10)) ) then // INLINED!!
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(12), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(11)) ) then // INLINED!!
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(13), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(6)) ) then // INLINED!!
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(14), udg_Player[( S2I(udg_String) - 1 )], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unshare_Control takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unshare_Control=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unshare_Control, Condition(function Trig_Unshare_Control_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unshare_Control, function Trig_Unshare_Control_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Clear messages
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Clear_messages_Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Clear_messages_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Clear_messages_Func001001001)))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Clear_messages takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Clear_messages=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Clear_messages, function Trig_Clear_messages_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Help Command
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Help_Command_Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Help_Command_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupPlayers=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Help_Command_Func001002001))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_GroupPlayers, 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1328")
    call DestroyForce(udg_GroupPlayers)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Help_Command takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Help_Command=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Help_Command, function Trig_Help_Command_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Players Group Hints
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Func001Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Func001Func004001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_PlayersGroup_Hints) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Func001C() ) then
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_PlayersGroup_Hints)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Func001Func004001001)), 3.00, "TRIGSTR_4459")
    else
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_PlayersGroup_Hints)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Func001Func002001001)), 3.00, "TRIGSTR_4460")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Players_Group_Hints takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Players_Group_Hints=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Players_Group_Hints, function Trig_Players_Group_Hints_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Add time 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Add_time_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 10) == "-add time " ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_time_01_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Real_Timer >= 1.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_time_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Real_Timer=S2R(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 11, 12))
    if ( Trig_Add_time_01_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Timer_Player=GetTriggerPlayer()
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 29.00, ( GetPlayerName(udg_Timer_Player) + ( " wants to add " + ( R2S(udg_Real_Timer) + " minutes to the timer! Type |cff00ff00-yes|r or nothing. Only human players can use this command and vote. |cffff0000The game will be unranked.|r" ) ) ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 29.00, ( I2S(udg_Timer_PlayersVotes) + ( "/" + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 )) + " |cff00ff00yes|r." ) ) ))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Add_time_02)
        call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Add_time_02)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_Timer_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Timer_PlayersVotes=0
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Add_time_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Add_time_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Add_time_01, Condition(function Trig_Add_time_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Add_time_01, function Trig_Add_time_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Add time 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Add_time_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 4) == "-yes" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_time_02_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Timer_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_time_02_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Timer_PlayersVotes >= ( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_time_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Add_time_02_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Timer_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=true
            set udg_Timer_PlayersVotes=( udg_Timer_PlayersVotes + 1 )
            call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 29.00, ( GetPlayerName(udg_Timer_Player) + ( " wants to add " + ( R2S(udg_Real_Timer) + " minutes to the timer! Type |cff00ff00-yes|r or nothing. Only human players can use this command and vote." ) ) ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 29.00, ( I2S(udg_Timer_PlayersVotes) + ( "/" + ( I2S(( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers / 2 )) + " |cff00ff00yes|r." ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Add_time_02_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Real_Timer=( udg_Real_Timer * 60.00 )
        call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_HumansWin)
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_HumansWinwindow)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_HumansWin, false, ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_HumansWin) + udg_Real_Timer ))
        set udg_HumansWin=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_HumansWin, "TRIGSTR_4534")
        set udg_HumansWinwindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_HumansWinwindow)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|cffff0000" + ( R2S(( udg_Real_Timer / 60.00 )) + ( "|r minutes have been added to the Timer!" ) ) ))
        set udg_Unranked=true
        // ---------------------------------------
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_DarkGuards_Timer)
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_DarkGuards_Timer, false, ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_DarkGuards_Timer) + udg_Real_Timer ))
        set udg_DarkGuards_Timer=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_DarkGuards_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4535")
        set udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_Timer_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Timer_PlayersVotes=0
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Add_time_01)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Add_time_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Add_time_02=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Add_time_02)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Add_time_02, Condition(function Trig_Add_time_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Add_time_02, function Trig_Add_time_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Civil War Activation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Civil_War_Activation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Activation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_2483")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "Someone have to type |cffffcc00\"-undead\"|r to join the Zombie Forces and continue the game or " + ( I2S(( udg_NumberOfPlayers / ( 2 + 1 ) )) + "must type |cffffcc00\"-civil war\"|r to start a civil war." ) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_3209")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cffffcc00Votes:|r" + ( I2S(udg_CivilWarVotes) + ( "/" + I2S(( ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) + 1 )) ) ) ))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventDefeat(gg_trg_Civil_War_Update, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Civil_War_Update, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_Votes, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-civil war", true)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Civil_War_Activation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Civil_War_Activation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Civil_War_Activation, Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_Activation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Civil_War_Activation, function Trig_Civil_War_Activation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Civil War Update
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Civil_War_Update_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Update_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_2500")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "Someone have to type |cffffcc00\"-undead\"|r to join the Zombie Forces and continue the game or " + ( I2S(( udg_NumberOfPlayers / ( 2 + 1 ) )) + "must type |cffffcc00\"-civil war\"|r to start a civil war." ) ))
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_3224")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cffffcc00Votes:|r" + ( I2S(udg_CivilWarVotes) + ( "/" + I2S(( ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) + 1 )) ) ) ))
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Civil_War_Votes)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Civil_War_Update takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Civil_War_Update=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Civil_War_Update, Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_Update_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Civil_War_Update, function Trig_Civil_War_Update_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Civil War Votes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerPlayer() == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOK[GetForLoopIndexA()] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarVotes == ( ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) + 1 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_CivilWarOK[GetForLoopIndexA()]=true
            set udg_CivilWarVotes=( udg_CivilWarVotes + 1 )
            call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_2981")
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "Someone have to type |cffffcc00\"-undead\"|r to join the Zombie Forces and continue the game or " + ( I2S(( udg_NumberOfPlayers / ( 2 + 1 ) )) + "must type |cffffcc00\"-civil war\"|r to start a civil war." ) ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_3225")
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "|cffffcc00Votes:|r" + ( I2S(udg_CivilWarVotes) + ( "/" + I2S(( ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) + 1 )) ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Civil_War_Launch)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Civil_War_Votes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Civil_War_Votes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Civil_War_Votes, Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Civil_War_Votes, function Trig_Civil_War_Votes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Civil War Launch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h002_0461) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00P_0294) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h008_0223) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h009_0538) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h007_0211) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func092002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func095002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unranked=true
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=0
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( I2S(( ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) + 1 )) + " players voted for a civil war! The civil war will starts in 60 seconds! Prepare yourself!" ))
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h002_0461) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00P_0294) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h008_0223) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h009_0538) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h007_0211) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h01I_1483) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h015_0207) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h004_0354) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00B_0976) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger + 1 )
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_HumansWin)
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_HumansWinwindow)
    set udg_CivilWarOn=true
    call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(udg_Durball_Armour, udg_Protector)
    call RemoveItem(udg_Durball_Armour)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Civil_War_End)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_for_undead)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Protector_dies)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg__Undead_Red)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg__Undead_Blue)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg__Undead_Purple)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg__Undead_Yellow)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Orange)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg__Undead_Light_blue)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg__Undead_Grey)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Day)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Night)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Teredar_Fortress)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Leonar_Citadel)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Stormfury_Citadel)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hammerfell_Castle)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ganch_Keep)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('hgtw')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func041002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('hctw')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func044002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('hatw')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func047002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h00S')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func050002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h01F')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func053002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h01G')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func056002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h01E')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func059002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h00C')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func062002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h047')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func065002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h032')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func068002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h03H')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func071002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h03V')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func074002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h03F')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func077002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h03G')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func080002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h04P')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func083002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h04R')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func086002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h04Q')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func089002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h04S')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func092002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h03B')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Func095002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 2000)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(50.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 4.00, "TRIGSTR_3227")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3229")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3230")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3231")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3232")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3233")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3234")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3235")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3236")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 2.00, "TRIGSTR_3237")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_GameFound)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3226")
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Civil_War_Launch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Civil_War_Launch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Civil_War_Launch, function Trig_Civil_War_Launch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Civil War End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )

endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean

endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func006Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func006Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetEnumUnit(), "stand victory")
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h002_0461) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func007Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

    call SetUnitAnimation(GetEnumUnit(), "stand victory")

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h015_0207) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Civil_War_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func003Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004C() ) then
        call FogEnableOff()
        call FogMaskEnableOff()
        set udg_EndOfTheGame=true
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities)
        call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func006C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(0), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func006Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func006Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cffff0303" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func007C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(1), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func007Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func007Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cff0042ff" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func008C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(2), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func008Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func008Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cff1ce6b9" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(2)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func009C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(3), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func009Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func009Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cff540081" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(3)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func010C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(4), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func010Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func010Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cfffffc00" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(4)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func011C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(5), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func011Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func011Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cfffe8a0e" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(5)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func012C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func012Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func012Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cff959697" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(8)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func013C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func013Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func013Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cff7ebff1" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(9)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func014C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(18), Condition(function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func014Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Func004Func014Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, ( "The capital of " + ( "|cff282828" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(20)) + "|r is the last one standing! He won the civil war!" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        call ClearMapMusicBJ()
        call StopMusicBJ(false)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Ending_music)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Multi_Board_Game_Results)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Civil_War_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Civil_War_End=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Civil_War_End)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h002_0461, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h00P_0294, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h008_0223, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h009_0538, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h007_0211, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h01I_1483, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h015_0207, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h004_0354, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, gg_unit_h00B_0976, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Civil_War_End, function Trig_Civil_War_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Ressources
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Ressources_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(100000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(100000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_SecretFound)
    set udg_Unranked=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Ressources takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Ressources=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Ressources, function Trig_Cheat_code_Ressources_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Speed 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_01_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CheatSpeed_ON == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_01_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_CheatSpeed_ON=true
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_SecretFound)
        set udg_Unranked=true
    else
        set udg_CheatSpeed_ON=false
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Speed_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_01, function Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Speed 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CheatSpeed_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
    call UnitSetConstructionProgress(GetTriggerUnit(), 90)
    call UnitSetConstructionProgress(GetConstructingStructure(), 90)
    call UnitSetUpgradeProgress(GetTriggerUnit(), 90)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Speed_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_START)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_CONSTRUCT_START)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_REVIVE_START)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_UPGRADE_START)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02, Condition(function Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_02, function Trig_Cheat_code_Speed_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Reset Abilities Cooldowns
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitResetCooldown(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Unranked=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns, function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Reset Life And Mana
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Unranked=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
