    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana, function Trig_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Level Up Heroes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 20, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes_Func001002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Unranked=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes, function Trig_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Results
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Results_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Cheat_Results == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Results_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Results_Func001C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Multi_Board_Game_Results)
        set udg_Cheat_Results=true
    else
        call MultiboardClear(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores)
        call DestroyMultiboardBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores)
        set udg_Cheat_Results=false
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Results takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Results=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Results, function Trig_Cheat_code_Results_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Vision
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Vision_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Cheat_Vision == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Vision_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Vision_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, GetPlayableMapRect())
            set udg_CheatCode_Vision[GetForLoopIndexA()]=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Cheat_Vision=true
    else
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call DestroyFogModifier(udg_CheatCode_Vision[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Cheat_Vision=false
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Vision takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Vision=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Vision, function Trig_Cheat_code_Vision_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cheat code Go
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func019Func030C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func019Func031C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func023Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(7) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func024001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func026001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func032002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func033002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func035002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func036002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func038002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func039002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 30.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func060C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func061C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func062C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func063C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func064C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_StartTimerWindow)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Votes_Choice)
    call ClearTextMessagesBJ(GetPlayersAll())
    call ClearSelection()
    call FogEnableOn()
    call FogMaskEnableOn()
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call ForceCinematicSubtitlesBJ(true)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_n00J_1555)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_n00J_1555, 0.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Starting_time)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer_Income, false, 180.00)
    call UseTimeOfDayBJ(true)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H00F_0286)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H01O_0359, "move", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]), 0)
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-give gold ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Give_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-give soul ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Share_Control, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-share ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Unshare_Control, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-unshare ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Clear_messages, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-clear", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Clear_messages, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-cl", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-take gold ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Take_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-take soul ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Help_Command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-help", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_VoteKick_Commands, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Ressources, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -greedisgood", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Speed_01, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -warpten", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Abilities_Cooldowns, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -reset cd", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Reset_Life_And_Mana, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -reset stat", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Level_Up_Heroes, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -level up", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Results, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -results", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Vision, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], " -iseedeadpeople", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Players_Group_Hints, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hint", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Players_Group_Hints, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-tip", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Hard_undead_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hard", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Hard_human_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-hard", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Impossible_undead_command, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-impossible", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_01, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-add time ", false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_02, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-yes", true)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Add_time_02, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-no", true)
        if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func019Func030C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Humans, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func019Func031C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00R_0297)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(8), udg_Point, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_UnitsKilled[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
        set udg_UnitsLost[GetForLoopIndexA()]=0
        set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func023Func004C() ) then
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    // Activate triggers after tutorials and cinematic
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Timer_Human_Victory)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Every_3min_humans_score)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities)
    // -----------------------------------------
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_01, Condition(function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func032002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func033002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_02, Condition(function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func035002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func036002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Starting_Cinematic_03, Condition(function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func038002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func039002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    // -----------------------------------------
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set udg_RandomNumber=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, false)
    call RemoveWeatherEffectBJ(udg_WeatherMap)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06U', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06U', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff106246" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06W', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06W', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff4a2a04" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06X', ( "|cffffcc00Give Gold to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06X', ( "Give |cffffff001000 gold|r to |cff20c000" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A06Z', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A06Z', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff106246" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A070', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A070', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff4a2a04" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityTooltip('A071', ( "|cffffcc00Give Soul to" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r" ) ), 1)
    call BlzSetAbilityExtendedTooltip('A071', ( "Give |cff8080ff1 soul|r to |cff20c000" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "|r." ) ), 1)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Starting_Info)
    call ResumeMusicBJ()
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func060C() ) then
        call DoNothing()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func061C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLhr')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func062C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'WOlw')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func063C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNls')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Func064C() ) then
        call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLlr')
        set udg_WeatherMap=GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect()
    else
    endif
    call EnableWeatherEffect(udg_WeatherMap, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spiders_spawn)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cheat_code_Go takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cheat_code_Go=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Go, function Trig_Cheat_code_Go_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter egg Toby Skeleton
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_H01S_0043 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6444", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6445", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6446", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6447", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6448", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, Condition(function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton, function Trig_Easter_egg_Toby_Skeleton_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter egg Arathorn Archimonde
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_Uwar_0150 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6947", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6948", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6949", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6950", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6951", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, Condition(function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde, function Trig_Easter_egg_Arathorn_Archimonde_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter egg Tent 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_ntn2_0209 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\Fallinlove.mdx")
    set udg_LoveSpecialEffect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(udg_LoveSpecialEffect, 1.50)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(udg_LoveSpecialEffect, 100.00)
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_8201", udg_Point, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func009C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_8202", udg_Point, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func010C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_8203", udg_Point, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func011C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_8204", udg_Point, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Func012C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_8205", udg_Point, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LoveSpecialEffect)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_egg_Tent_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, Condition(function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_01, function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter egg Tent 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Easter_egg_Tent_Woman)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nvlw', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Point, 300.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
    set udg_EasterEggTentWoman=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Easter_egg_Tent_Man)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nvil', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Point, 120.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
    set udg_EasterEggTentMan=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_8196", udg_EasterEggTentMan, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_8197", udg_EasterEggTentWoman, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_8198", udg_EasterEggTentMan, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_8199", udg_EasterEggTentWoman, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_EasterEggTentMan)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_EasterEggTentWoman)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_EasterEggTentMan, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_EasterEggTentWoman, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_egg_Tent_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_02, gg_unit_ntn2_0209, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_egg_Tent_02, function Trig_Easter_egg_Tent_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg RedChampion 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_nshe_1001 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IntegerRedChampion == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IntegerRedChampion >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Func016C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_TimerRedChampion, false, 10.00)
        set udg_IntegerRedChampion=( udg_IntegerRedChampion + 1 )
    else
        set udg_IntegerRedChampion=( udg_IntegerRedChampion + 1 )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Func017C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'n00X', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "RedChampion")
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspiritdone.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\WarStomp\\WarStompCaster.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01, function Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg RedChampion 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_RedChampion_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_IntegerRedChampion=0
endfunction

endfunction

// Trigger: Easter Egg Zabijak 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_nshe_0995 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IntegerZabijak == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IntegerZabijak >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Func001C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_TimerZabijak, false, 10.00)
        set udg_IntegerZabijak=( udg_IntegerZabijak + 1 )
    else
        set udg_IntegerZabijak=( udg_IntegerZabijak + 1 )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Func002C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'n00Y', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "Zabijak")
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspiritdone.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\WarStomp\\WarStompCaster.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

endfunction

    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Zabijak_02=CreateTrigger()

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Golden Eagle Father Activated
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Father_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Order, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D038', gg_rct_Father_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Order)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_Hpal_1002)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_Hpal_1002, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2202", gg_unit_Hpal_1002, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Father_Activated_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Golden Eagle Order Father
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_Hpal_1002 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif

    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Hpal_1002, "attack")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2024", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Func004C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Hpal_1002, "victory")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2025", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Func005C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Hpal_1002, "spell")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2037", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Func006C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Hpal_1002, "attack")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2038", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Func007C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Hpal_1002, "spell")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2126", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Golden_Eagle_Order_Father_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell throw")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01_Func004C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "walk fast")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2505", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01_Func005C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "death")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2506", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01_Func006C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack - 1")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2507", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01_Func007C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack - 2")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2508", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_01_Conditions))

endfunction

    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_H04A_1004 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Toon_Orc_Explorer_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell channel")
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2503", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
endfunction
