endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Noob Slayer 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_H04B_1005 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "stand victory")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2527", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func004C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2523", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Practice_Target)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\MLG_Hitmarker.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func005C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell two")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2524", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func006C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "death")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2525", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.50)
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "dissipate")
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Func007C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", PolarProjectionBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 250.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit())))
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2526", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.20)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Noob_Slayer_Position))
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2516", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.20)
        call SetUnitFacingTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), 310.00, 0.50)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Noob Slayer 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_H04B_1005 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call BlzUnitInterruptAttack(GetAttacker())
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "stand ready -2")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetAttacker(), 0.50)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack")
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2528", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("head", GetAttacker(), "war3mapImported\\MLG_Hitmarker.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitFacingTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), 310.00, 0.50)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Noob Slayer 03
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Noob_Slayer_Camp)) >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", gg_unit_H04B_1005, "war3mapImported\\SaltBuff_2.mdx")
    set udg_Salt_Effect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2520", gg_unit_H04B_1005, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2521", gg_unit_H04B_1005, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2522", gg_unit_H04B_1005, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func009C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2529", gg_unit_H04B_1005, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Func010C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2530", gg_unit_H04B_1005, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Salt_Effect)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_01)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_02)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Noob_Slayer_03_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Hotdog Stand
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h04D_0953 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2554", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2555", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2560", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2561", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2565", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Hotdog_Stand_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Panda WuKong 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_H04C_1009 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell channel")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2579", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func004C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell transformation")
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell two transformation")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2589", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func005C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "birth")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2581", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func006C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "death")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2582", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "dissipate")
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Func007C() ) then
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "stand victory")
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2586", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Panda WuKong 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_H04C_1009 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call BlzUnitInterruptAttack(GetAttacker())
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetAttacker(), 0.10)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell slam")
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2585", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitFacingTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), 65.00, 0.50)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Panda_WuKong_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Animals dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'necr' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n00I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n01K' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h05K' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h05L' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h05J' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_4181", udg_Point, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Animals_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Timmy Movement
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_nvlk_0007) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Integer=GetRandomInt(1, 6)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Timmy_01)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_nvlk_0007, "move", udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Timmy_02)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_nvlk_0007, "move", udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Timmy_03)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_nvlk_0007, "move", udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Timmy_04)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_nvlk_0007, "move", udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Timmy_05)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_nvlk_0007, "move", udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Timmy_06)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_nvlk_0007, "move", udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement, 20.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Timmy protected from humans
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzUnitInterruptAttack(GetAttacker())
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1299", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans, gg_unit_nvlk_0007, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_protected_from_humans_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Timmy voice lines
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_nvlk_0007 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1301", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1302", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1305", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1312", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1325", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_voice_lines_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Timmy dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Func001Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Func001Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Func001Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Func001Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Func001Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_Movement)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Timmy")
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\InnerFire\\InnerFireTarget.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 8.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + " killed Timmy! It makes you think about who the horrors in this world really are..." ))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies, gg_unit_nvlk_0007, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Timmy_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Villagers Players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(Player(0)) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(Player(1)) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(20)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_01)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(0)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_02)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(1)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_03)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(2)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_04)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(3)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_05)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(4)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_06)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(5)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_07)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(8)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_08)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(9)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Villager_Player_09)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n01C', Player(21), udg_Point2, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerName(Player(20)))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Villagers_Players_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter  Egg Villagers Players Contain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n01C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "stop")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain, gg_rct_Villagers_Players_Contain_01)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain, gg_rct_Villagers_Players_Contain_02)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain, gg_rct_Villagers_Players_Contain_01)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain, gg_rct_Villagers_Players_Contain_02)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain, Condition(function Trig_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain, function Trig_Easter__Egg_Villagers_Players_Contain_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Sailor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n01D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TempInteger == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempInteger=GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_735", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1264", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1367", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_1629", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_4422", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Sailor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sailor, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sailor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Sheeps Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Sheep_Unit[1]=gg_unit_n01E_0331
    set udg_Sheep_Unit[2]=gg_unit_n01E_1188
    set udg_Sheep_Unit[3]=gg_unit_n01E_1595
    set udg_Sheep_Unit[4]=gg_unit_n01E_1169
    set udg_Sheep_Unit[5]=gg_unit_n01E_1668
    set udg_Sheep_Unit[6]=gg_unit_n01E_1670
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_Init, 5)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_Init, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Easter Egg Sheeps 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Sheep_Integer[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Sheep_Unit[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Sheep_Unit[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Sheep_Integer[GetForLoopIndexA()] >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                call StartTimerBJ(udg_Sheep_Timer[GetForLoopIndexA()], false, 8.00)
                set udg_Sheep_Integer[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( udg_Sheep_Integer[GetForLoopIndexA()] + 1 )
            else
                set udg_Sheep_Integer[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( udg_Sheep_Integer[GetForLoopIndexA()] + 1 )
            endif
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            call ExplodeUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Weapons\\Mortar\\MortarMissile.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(0), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(1), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(2), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(3), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(4), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(5), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(6), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(7), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(8), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(9), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(10), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(11), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(18), true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Player(20), true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, Condition(function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01, function Trig_Easter_Egg_Sheeps_01_Actions)
endfunction
