//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gate Sytem Settings
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Settings_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    //  
    set udg_Gate[0]=gg_dest_DTg7_5918
    set udg_Gate[1]=gg_dest_LTe1_5915
    set udg_Gate[2]=gg_dest_B000_0141
    set udg_Gate[3]=gg_dest_DTg7_0152
    set udg_Gate[4]=gg_dest_DTg5_5927
    set udg_Gate[5]=gg_dest_B00B_0260
    set udg_Gate[6]=gg_dest_DTg5_5924
    set udg_Gate[7]=gg_dest_DTg7_0041
    set udg_Gate[8]=gg_dest_DTg6_5779
    set udg_Gate[9]=gg_dest_LTg1_5921
    set udg_Gate[10]=gg_dest_LTg3_12703
    set udg_Gate[11]=gg_dest_LTe1_0288
    set udg_Gate[12]=gg_dest_DTg5_0129
    set udg_Gate[13]=gg_dest_LTg2_4438
    set udg_Gate[14]=gg_dest_B00A_4020
    set udg_Gate[15]=gg_dest_LTg1_11702
    set udg_Gate[16]=gg_dest_LTg1_8630
    set udg_Gate[17]=gg_dest_LTe2_0123
    set udg_Gate[18]=gg_dest_LTg1_18198
    set udg_Gate[19]=gg_dest_LTg4_1797
    //  
    set udg_Lever[0]=gg_unit_n007_1836
    set udg_Lever[1]=gg_unit_n007_1834
    set udg_Lever[2]=gg_unit_n007_1835
    set udg_Lever[3]=gg_unit_n007_1843
    set udg_Lever[4]=gg_unit_n007_0017
    set udg_Lever[5]=gg_unit_n007_0602
    set udg_Lever[6]=gg_unit_n007_1838
    set udg_Lever[7]=gg_unit_n007_0972
    set udg_Lever[8]=gg_unit_n007_0344
    set udg_Lever[9]=gg_unit_n007_1840
    set udg_Lever[10]=gg_unit_n007_0443
    set udg_Lever[11]=gg_unit_n007_1839
    set udg_Lever[12]=gg_unit_n007_1844
    set udg_Lever[13]=gg_unit_n007_0645
    set udg_Lever[14]=gg_unit_n007_0030
    set udg_Lever[15]=gg_unit_n007_0695
    set udg_Lever[16]=gg_unit_n007_0574
    set udg_Lever[17]=gg_unit_n007_0420
    set udg_Lever[18]=gg_unit_n007_0192
    set udg_Lever[19]=gg_unit_n007_0311
    //  
    set udg_HpGate[0]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_DTg7_5918)
    set udg_HpGate[1]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTe1_5915)
    set udg_HpGate[2]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_B000_0141)
    set udg_HpGate[3]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_DTg7_0152)
    set udg_HpGate[4]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_DTg5_5927)
    set udg_HpGate[5]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_B00B_0260)
    set udg_HpGate[6]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_DTg5_5924)
    set udg_HpGate[7]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_DTg7_0041)
    set udg_HpGate[8]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_DTg6_5779)
    set udg_HpGate[9]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTg1_5921)
    set udg_HpGate[10]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTg3_12703)
    set udg_HpGate[11]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTe1_0288)
    set udg_HpGate[12]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_DTg5_0129)
    set udg_HpGate[13]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTg2_4438)
    set udg_HpGate[14]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_B00A_4020)
    set udg_HpGate[15]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTg1_11702)
    set udg_HpGate[16]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTg1_8630)
    set udg_HpGate[17]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTe2_0123)
    set udg_HpGate[18]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTg1_18198)
    set udg_HpGate[19]=GetDestructableLife(gg_dest_LTg4_1797)
    //  
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gate_Sytem_Settings takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gate_Sytem_Settings=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Gate_Sytem_Settings, 0.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gate_Sytem_Settings, function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Settings_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gate Sytem Open Close
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()] > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()] > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()] <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()] <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=19
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A00H', udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call KillDestructable(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call SetDestructableAnimationBJ(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()], "death")
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A00H', udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R008', 100, GetOwningPlayer(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
            else
                if ( Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()]=GetDestructableLife(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                        call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                        call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R008', 100, GetOwningPlayer(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
                    else
                    endif
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                        call SetDestructableLife(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                        set udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()]=GetDestructableLife(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                        call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R008', 0, GetOwningPlayer(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
                    else
                    endif
                else
                endif
                if ( Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Func001Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A00H', udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                    call KillDestructable(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                    call SetDestructableAnimationBJ(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()], "death")
                    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A00H', udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                    call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R008', 100, GetOwningPlayer(udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
                else
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close, Condition(function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close, function Trig_Gate_Sytem_Open_Close_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gate System Repair
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gate_System_Repair_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_System_Repair_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Lever[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gate_System_Repair_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=19
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Gate_System_Repair_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( udg_HpGate[GetForLoopIndexA()] + 1000.00 )
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gate_System_Repair takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gate_System_Repair=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gate_System_Repair, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Gate_System_Repair, Condition(function Trig_Gate_System_Repair_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gate_System_Repair, function Trig_Gate_System_Repair_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: VoteKick Commands
//===========================================================================
function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(udg_VoteKickVictim) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(udg_VoteKickVictim) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickVictim != GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, StringLength(GetEventPlayerChatString())) == udg_PlayerColor[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, StringLength(GetEventPlayerChatString())) == I2S(GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 7, StringLength(GetEventPlayerChatString())) == GetPlayerName(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 2, 5) == "kick" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickActivate == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func002Func001Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickPlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 2, 4) == "yes" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickActivate == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func003Func001Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetTriggerPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickPlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 2, 4) == "no" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickActivate == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_VoteKickPlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
            if ( Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                set udg_VoteKickVictim=udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]
                if ( Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                    set udg_VoteKickActivate=true
                    set udg_VoteKickYes=0
                    set udg_VoteKickNo=0
                    set udg_VoteKickTotalVotes=0
                    call CreateLeaderboardBJ(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1517")
                    set udg_VoteKickBoard=GetLastCreatedLeaderboard()
                    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(udg_VoteKickVictim, udg_VoteKickBoard, ( GetPlayerName(udg_VoteKickVictim) + " is being kicked!" ), 0)
                    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemStyleBJ(udg_VoteKickVictim, udg_VoteKickBoard, true, false, false)
                    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemLabelColorBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_VoteKickBoard, 92.16, 94.12, 100.00, 0)
                    call LeaderboardDisplayBJ(true, udg_VoteKickBoard)
                    call StartTimerBJ(udg_VoteKickTimer, false, 45.00)
                    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_VoteKickTimer, "TRIGSTR_1518")
                    set udg_VoteKickTimerWindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
                    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_VoteKickTimerWindow)
                    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( "A Vote Kick against |cffffcc00" + ( GetPlayerName(udg_VoteKickVictim) + "|r has been intiated! Vote with \"|cff00ff00-yes|r\" or \"|cffff0000-no|r\"." ) ))
                else
                    set udg_GroupPlayers=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001002001))
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_GroupPlayers, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_1516")
                    call DestroyForce(udg_GroupPlayers)
                endif
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_VoteKickPlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
            set udg_VoteKickYes=( udg_VoteKickYes + 1 )
            set udg_VoteKickTotalVotes=( udg_VoteKickTotalVotes + 1 )
            call LeaderboardSetLabelBJ(udg_VoteKickBoard, ( "Vote Kick - " + ( "Yes:" + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickYes) + ( " / " + ( "No:" + I2S(udg_VoteKickNo) ) ) ) ) ))
        else
            set udg_GroupPlayers=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func002Func001Func001002001))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_GroupPlayers, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_1519")
            call DestroyForce(udg_GroupPlayers)
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_VoteKickPlayerVote[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer()) - 1 )]=true
            set udg_VoteKickNo=( udg_VoteKickNo + 1 )
            set udg_VoteKickTotalVotes=( udg_VoteKickTotalVotes + 1 )
            call LeaderboardSetLabelBJ(udg_VoteKickBoard, ( "Vote Kick - " + ( "Yes:" + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickYes) + ( " / " + ( "No:" + I2S(udg_VoteKickNo) ) ) ) ) ))
        else
            set udg_GroupPlayers=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Func003Func001Func001002001))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_GroupPlayers, 5.00, "TRIGSTR_1520")
            call DestroyForce(udg_GroupPlayers)
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_VoteKick_Commands takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_VoteKick_Commands=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_VoteKick_Commands, function Trig_VoteKick_Commands_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: VoteKick Ends
//===========================================================================
function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickYes <= udg_VoteKickNo ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickYes == ( udg_VoteKickNo + 1 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_VoteKickVictim, udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func003Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_VoteKickVictim, udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickYes >= ( udg_VoteKickNo + 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VoteKickTotalVotes <= ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func009Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func009Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func009Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func009Func001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(11)), (udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(6))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(11)), (udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Undead_command) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_EndOfTheGame == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_VoteKickTimerWindow)
    call DestroyLeaderboardBJ(udg_VoteKickBoard)
    set udg_VoteKickActivate=false
    if ( Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, ( "|cffff0000More than half of the players must vote!|r" + ( " Only " + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickTotalVotes) + ( " players voted while " + ( I2S(udg_NumberOfPlayers) + " are playing!" ) ) ) ) ))
    else
        if ( Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func001C() ) then
            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, ( ( "|cffffcc00" + ( GetPlayerName(udg_VoteKickVictim) + "|r" ) ) + ( " has not been kicked! " + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickYes) + ( " \"|cff00ff00Yes|r\" and " + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickNo) + " \"|cffff0000No|r\"." ) ) ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func002C() ) then
            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, ( ( "|cffffcc00" + ( GetPlayerName(udg_VoteKickVictim) + "|r" ) ) + ( " has not been kicked! " + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickYes) + ( " \"|cff00ff00Yes|r\" and " + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickNo) + " \"|cffff0000No|r\". You must have +2 \"|cff00ff00Yes|r\" votes than \"|cffff0000No|r\" votes." ) ) ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func004Func003C() ) then
            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( "|cffffcc00" + ( GetPlayerName(udg_VoteKickVictim) + ( "|r has been kicked! " + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickYes) + ( " \"|cff00ff00Yes|r\" and " + ( I2S(udg_VoteKickNo) + " \"|cffff0000No|r\"." ) ) ) ) ) ))
            call CustomDefeatBJ(udg_VoteKickVictim, "TRIGSTR_1515")
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(udg_VoteKickVictim)
            set udg_NumberOfPlayers=( udg_NumberOfPlayers - 1 )
            if ( (IsPlayerInForce(udg_VoteKickVictim, udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
                set udg_ActiveHumanPlayers=( udg_ActiveHumanPlayers - 1 )
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (IsPlayerInForce(udg_VoteKickVictim, udg_UndeadPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
                set udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers=( udg_ActiveUndeadPlayers - 1 )
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_VoteKickPlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_VoteKickYes=0
    set udg_VoteKickNo=0
    set udg_VoteKickTotalVotes=0
    if ( Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func009C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Command_Activation)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_command)
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4593")
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(10)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(11)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_VoteKickVictim == Player(6)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Func014C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Civil_War_Activation)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_VoteKick_Ends takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_VoteKick_Ends=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_VoteKick_Ends, udg_VoteKickTimer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_VoteKick_Ends, function Trig_VoteKick_Ends_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Custom XP System
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Distance_Units_XP > 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Distance_Units_XP < 1200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Distance_Units_XP <= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) < 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point_XP_2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Distance_Units_XP=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point_XP_2, udg_Point_XP)
        if ( Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001Func003C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range)
        else
            if ( Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GroupUnits_XP_1200_Range)
            else
                if ( Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003Func001Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GroupUnits_XP_PlayableMapArea)
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_XP_2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddHeroXPSwapped(( ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) * 25 ) / CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range) ), GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddHeroXPSwapped(( ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) * 10 ) / CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GroupUnits_XP_1200_Range) ), GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddHeroXPSwapped(GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()), GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point_XP=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_GroupUnits_XP=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func002002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_XP, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func003A)
    if ( (IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetKillingUnitBJ(), udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func005002)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_XP_1200_Range, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func006002)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_XP_PlayableMapArea, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Func007002)
    call GroupClear(udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range)
    call GroupClear(udg_GroupUnits_XP_1200_Range)
    call GroupClear(udg_GroupUnits_XP_PlayableMapArea)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_XP)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_XP)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Custom_XP_System takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Custom_XP_System=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Custom_XP_System, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Custom_XP_System, Condition(function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Custom_XP_System, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Custom XP System UD
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Distance_Units_XP_UD > 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Distance_Units_XP_UD < 1500.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Distance_Units_XP_UD <= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) < 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point_XP_2_UD=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Distance_Units_XP_UD=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Point_XP_2_UD, udg_Point_XP_UD)
        if ( Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003Func001Func003C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range_UD)
        else
            if ( Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GroupUnits_XP_1500_Range_UD)
            else
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GroupUnitsXP_PlayableMapAreaUD)
            endif
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_XP_2_UD)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddHeroXPSwapped(( ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) * 30 ) / CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range_UD) ), GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddHeroXPSwapped(( ( GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) * 15 ) / CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GroupUnits_XP_1500_Range_UD) ), GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddHeroXPSwapped(GetUnitLevel(GetTriggerUnit()), GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point_XP_UD=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_GroupUnits_XP_UD=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func002002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_XP_UD, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func003A)
    if ( (IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetKillingUnitBJ(), udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range_UD)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range_UD, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func005002)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_XP_1500_Range_UD, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func006002)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnitsXP_PlayableMapAreaUD, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Func007002)
    call GroupClear(udg_GroupUnits_XP_600_Range_UD)
    call GroupClear(udg_GroupUnits_XP_1500_Range_UD)
    call GroupClear(udg_GroupUnitsXP_PlayableMapAreaUD)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_XP_UD)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_XP_UD)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Custom_XP_System_UD takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Custom_XP_System_UD=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Custom_XP_System_UD, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Custom_XP_System_UD, Condition(function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Custom_XP_System_UD, function Trig_Custom_XP_System_UD_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Timer Human Victory
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Timer_Human_Victory_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_HumansWin, false, 3600.00)
    set udg_HumansWin=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_HumansWin, "TRIGSTR_4421")
    set udg_HumansWinwindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_HumansWinwindow)
    // -----------------------------------------
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_DarkGuards_Timer, false, 3300.00)
    set udg_DarkGuards_Timer=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_DarkGuards_Timer, "TRIGSTR_1856")
    set udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Timer_Human_Victory takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Timer_Human_Victory=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Timer_Human_Victory, function Trig_Timer_Human_Victory_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h002_0461) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    endif

    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00B_0976) == true ) ) then

    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func009Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00R_0297) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func009Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00I_0975) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h002_0461)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00P_0294)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h008_0223)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h009_0538)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h007_0211)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h01I_1483)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h004_0354)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00B_0976)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func009C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func009Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00R_0297)
            call PingMinimapLocForForceEx(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_Point, 3.00, bj_MINIMAPPINGSTYLE_ATTACK, 100, 100, 100)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Func009Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00I_0975)
            call PingMinimapLocForForceEx(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_Point, 3.00, bj_MINIMAPPINGSTYLE_ATTACK, 100, 100, 100)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ping_mains_cities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities, 20.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities, function Trig_Ping_mains_cities_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Defeat for undead
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetEnumUnit(), "stand victory")
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func008Func003Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func008Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unranked == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call FogEnableOff()
    set udg_EndOfTheGame=true
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_HumansWinwindow)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001Func002002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001Func003002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            set udg_Score_Total[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( ( ( udg_Score_Kills_Units[GetForLoopIndexA()] + ( udg_Score_Kills_Buildings[GetForLoopIndexA()] + udg_Score_Kills_Heroes[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) + udg_Score_Events[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) + 100.00 )
        else
            if ( Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Score_Total[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( ( udg_Score_Kills_Units[GetForLoopIndexA()] + ( udg_Score_Kills_Buildings[GetForLoopIndexA()] + udg_Score_Kills_Heroes[0] ) ) + udg_Score_Events[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func008C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 6.00, "TRIGSTR_5876")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func008Func003Func001C() ) then
                call MMD_FlagPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] , MMD_FLAG_WINNER)
            else
                if ( Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Func008Func003Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call MMD_FlagPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] , MMD_FLAG_LOSER)
                else
                endif
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_6243")
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED_VISION)
    call ClearMapMusicBJ()
    call StopMusicBJ(false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Ending_music)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Multi_Board_Game_Results)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Results)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Defeat_for_undead takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Defeat_for_undead=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Defeat_for_undead, udg_HumansWin)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Defeat_for_undead, function Trig_Defeat_for_undead_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Defeat for humans
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h002', Player(0)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h002', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h00P', Player(1)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h00P', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h008', Player(2)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h008', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h009', Player(3)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h009', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h01I', Player(5)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h01I', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h007', Player(4)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h007', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h00B', Player(8)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h00B', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h004', Player(9)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h004', Player(7)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func001Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func001Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetEnumUnit(), "stand victory")
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unranked == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unranked == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_Starting_Human_Players) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_Starting_Undead_Players) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unranked == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call FogEnableOff()
    set udg_EndOfTheGame=true
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_HumansWin)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_mains_cities)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func001Func001002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func001Func002002)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Score_Total[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( ( ( udg_Score_Kills_Units[GetForLoopIndexA()] + ( udg_Score_Kills_Buildings[GetForLoopIndexA()] + udg_Score_Kills_Heroes[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) + udg_Score_Events[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) + 100.00 )
            if ( Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002Func002C() ) then
                call MMD_FlagPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] , MMD_FLAG_WINNER)
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002Func003C() ) then
                set udg_Score_Total[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( ( udg_Score_Kills_Units[GetForLoopIndexA()] + ( udg_Score_Kills_Buildings[GetForLoopIndexA()] + udg_Score_Kills_Heroes[0] ) ) + udg_Score_Events[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
                if ( Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func007Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
                    call MMD_FlagPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] , MMD_FLAG_LOSER)
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Func008C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 6.00, "TRIGSTR_6011")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer)
    else
    endif
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 1000000000.00, "TRIGSTR_6244")
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED_VISION)
    call ClearMapMusicBJ()
    call StopMusicBJ(false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Ending_music)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Multi_Board_Game_Results)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Cheat_code_Results)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Defeat_for_humans takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h002_0461, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h00P_0294, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h008_0223, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h009_0538, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h01I_1483, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h007_0211, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h00B_0976, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, gg_unit_h004_0354, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, Condition(function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Defeat_for_humans, function Trig_Defeat_for_humans_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ending music
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ending_music_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_Arthas_My_Son)
    set udg_MusicTime=GetSoundFileDurationBJ(GetLastPlayedMusic())
    call TriggerSleepAction(( udg_MusicTime + 2.00 ))
    call ClearMapMusicBJ()
    call StopMusicBJ(false)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ending_music takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ending_music=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ending_music, function Trig_Ending_music_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Multi Board Game Results
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func026001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func027001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func028001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func029001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func030001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func031001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(5)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func032001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func033001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(7)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func034001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(8)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func035001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(9)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func036001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func037001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(20)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY )
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call MultiboardAllowDisplayBJ(false)
    call MultiboardAllowDisplayBJ(true)
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(6, 14, "TRIGSTR_240")
    set udg_MultiBoard_GameScores=GetLastCreatedMultiboard()
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNInvisibility.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 1, "TRIGSTR_337")
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 2, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNTransmute.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 2, 1, "TRIGSTR_604")
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 3, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNAnkh.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 3, 1, "TRIGSTR_605")
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 4, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNIncome.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 4, 1, "TRIGSTR_685")
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 5, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHeroHelmet.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 5, 1, "TRIGSTR_686")
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 6, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNEliteSeal.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 6, 1, "TRIGSTR_6014")
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 0, true, false)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 1, true, true)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, ( GetForLoopIndexA() + 2 ), GetPlayerName(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 2, ( GetForLoopIndexA() + 2 ), I2S(udg_UnitsKilled[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 3, ( GetForLoopIndexA() + 2 ), I2S(udg_UnitsLost[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 4, ( GetForLoopIndexA() + 2 ), I2S(GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)))
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 5, ( GetForLoopIndexA() + 2 ), I2S(udg_HeroesKilled[GetForLoopIndexA()]))
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 6, ( GetForLoopIndexA() + 2 ), I2S(R2I(udg_Score_Total[GetForLoopIndexA()])))
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 14, GetPlayerName(Player(20)))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 2, 14, I2S(udg_UnitsKilled[20]))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 3, 14, I2S(udg_UnitsLost[20]))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 4, 14, I2S(GetPlayerState(udg_Player[20], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 5, 14, I2S(udg_HeroesKilled[20]))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 6, 14, I2S(R2I(udg_Score_Total[20])))
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 2, "TRIGSTR_727")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 3, "TRIGSTR_259")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 4, "TRIGSTR_086")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 5, "TRIGSTR_087")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 6, "TRIGSTR_088")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(5)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 7, "TRIGSTR_089")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 8, "TRIGSTR_183")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(7)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 9, "TRIGSTR_091")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(8)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 10, "TRIGSTR_092")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(9)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 11, "TRIGSTR_093")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 12, "TRIGSTR_094")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 13, "TRIGSTR_095")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(20)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY) ) then // INLINED!!
        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 14, "TRIGSTR_096")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    // red
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 2, 100, 1.18, 1.18, 0)
    // blue
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 3, 0.00, 25.88, 100.00, 0)
    // teal
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 4, 10.98, 90.20, 72.55, 0)
    // purple
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 5, 32.94, 0.00, 50.59, 0)
    // yellow
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 6, 100.00, 98.82, 0.00, 0)
    // orange
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 7, 99.61, 54.12, 5.49, 0)
    // green
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 8, 12.55, 75.29, 0.00, 0)
    // white
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 9, 92.16, 94.12, 100.00, 0)
    // grey
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 10, 58.43, 58.82, 59.22, 0)
    // light blue
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 11, 49.41, 74.90, 94.51, 0)
    // dark green
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 12, 6.27, 38.43, 27.45, 0)
    // brown
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 13, 29.02, 16.47, 1.57, 0)
    // coal
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 14, 15.69, 15.69, 15.69, 0)
    // ------------
    call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 0, 1, 100.00, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(true, udg_MultiBoard_GameScores)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 1, 0, 25.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 2, 0, 10.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 3, 0, 10.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 4, 0, 10.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 5, 0, 10.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_MultiBoard_GameScores, 6, 0, 10.00)
    call MultiboardMinimizeBJ(false, udg_MultiBoard_GameScores)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Multi_Board_Game_Results takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Multi_Board_Game_Results=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Multi_Board_Game_Results, function Trig_Multi_Board_Game_Results_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Game Results Update Kill Unit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetDyingUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetKillingUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetDyingUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetDyingUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UnitsKilled[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )]=( udg_UnitsKilled[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )] + 1 )
    if ( Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Kills_Units[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )]=( udg_Score_Kills_Units[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )] + 1.00 )
    else
        if ( Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Func008Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Score_Kills_Units[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )]=( udg_Score_Kills_Units[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )] + 0.20 )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit, Condition(function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit, function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Unit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Game Results Update Kill Building
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetDyingUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetKillingUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetDyingUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UnitsKilled[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )]=( udg_UnitsKilled[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )] + 1 )
    set udg_Score_Kills_Buildings[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )]=( udg_Score_Kills_Buildings[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )] + 2.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building, Condition(function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building, function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Kill_Building_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Game Results Update Lost
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Lost_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetDyingUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetKillingUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Lost_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UnitsLost[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) - 1 )]=( udg_UnitsLost[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) - 1 )] + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Game_Results_Update_Lost takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Lost=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Lost, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Lost, Condition(function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Lost_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Lost, function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Lost_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Game Results Update Heroes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitEnemy(GetDyingUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetDyingUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_HeroesKilled[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )]=( udg_HeroesKilled[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )] + 1 )
    set udg_Score_Kills_Heroes[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )]=( udg_Score_Kills_Heroes[( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) - 1 )] + 5.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Heroes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Heroes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Heroes, Condition(function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Game_Results_Update_Heroes, function Trig_Game_Results_Update_Heroes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Every 3min humans score
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Every_3min_humans_score_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_EndOfTheGame == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Every_3min_humans_score_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Every_3min_humans_score_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(180.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Every_3min_humans_score_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Score_Events[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( udg_Score_Events[GetForLoopIndexA()] + 20.00 )
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Every_3min_humans_score takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Every_3min_humans_score=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Every_3min_humans_score, Condition(function Trig_Every_3min_humans_score_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Every_3min_humans_score, function Trig_Every_3min_humans_score_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Humans Players Scores
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func002Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_n01F_0324) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func002Func002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_n01F_0326) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_n01F_0324) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_n01F_0326) == true)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h005_0761) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func004Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_nmgv_0540) == true )
endfunction
