function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func004Func001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_nmgv_0489) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_nmgv_0540) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_nmgv_0489) == true)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00I_0975) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h003_0045) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h00R_0297) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h013_1669) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    if ( Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Events[0]=( udg_Score_Events[0] + 20.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Events[1]=( udg_Score_Events[1] + 20.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Events[2]=( udg_Score_Events[2] + 20.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Events[3]=( udg_Score_Events[3] + 20.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Events[4]=( udg_Score_Events[4] + 20.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Events[8]=( udg_Score_Events[8] + 20.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Score_Events[9]=( udg_Score_Events[9] + 20.00 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Humans_Players_Scores takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Humans_Players_Scores=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Humans_Players_Scores, 1800.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Humans_Players_Scores, function Trig_Humans_Players_Scores_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Integer Update Values Timer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Integer_Update_Values_Timer_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer == 23 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Integer_Update_Values_Timer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call MMD___update_value(("score" ) , ( Player(udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer) ) , MMD___ops[( MMD_OP_SET )] , R2S((( udg_Score_Total[udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer])*1.0)) , MMD_TYPE_REAL) // INLINED!!
    call MMD___update_value(("kills" ) , ( Player(udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer) ) , MMD___ops[( MMD_OP_SET )] , I2S(( udg_UnitsKilled[udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer])) , MMD_TYPE_INT) // INLINED!!
    call MMD___update_value(("lost" ) , ( Player(udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer) ) , MMD___ops[( MMD_OP_SET )] , I2S(( udg_UnitsLost[udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer])) , MMD_TYPE_INT) // INLINED!!
    if ( Trig_Integer_Update_Values_Timer_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer=0
    else
        set udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer=( udg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer + 1 )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Integer_Update_Values_Timer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Integer_Update_Values_Timer, function Trig_Integer_Update_Values_Timer_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WC3Stats Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WC3Stats_Init_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unranked == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WC3Stats_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call MMD_DefineValue("kills" , MMD_TYPE_INT , MMD_GOAL_NONE , MMD_SUGGEST_NONE)
    call MMD_DefineValue("lost" , MMD_TYPE_INT , MMD_GOAL_NONE , MMD_SUGGEST_NONE)
    call MMD_DefineValue("score" , MMD_TYPE_REAL , MMD_GOAL_NONE , MMD_SUGGEST_LEADERBOARD)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WC3Stats_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WC3Stats_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_WC3Stats_Init, Condition(function Trig_WC3Stats_Init_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WC3Stats_Init, function Trig_WC3Stats_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WC3Stats Library
//===========================================================================
//TESH.scrollpos=0
//TESH.alwaysfold=0
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/// The Map Meta Data Library
/// Version: v1.00       
/// Last Modified: April 24, 2009
/// Author Chain: Strilanc, [insert next ...]
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/// This library is used to emit standardized meta data which parsers and bot hosts can use to record relevant
/// game statistics like "hero kills" which would otherwise be impossible to record automatically.
///
/// In particular, the flag function can be used to indicate if a leaver should be awarded a win or not. Replays
/// don't contain enough information to easily tell winners who leave from losers who leave. (for example: people
/// who leave while end-game stats are being shown)
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/// Interface:
///   void FlagPlayer(player, flag_constant)
///   void DefineValue(name, type_constant, goal_constant, suggest_constant)
///   void UpdateValueInt(name, player, operation_constant, value)
///   void UpdateValueReal(name, player, operation_constant, value)
///   void UpdateValueString(name, player, value)
///   void DefineEvent0(name, format) /////////////////////////
//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Portal Elendar Teal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Portal_Elendar_Teal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Elendar_Teal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n019_0020)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n019_0498)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Portal_Elendar_Teal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Portal_Elendar_Teal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Portal_Elendar_Teal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Portal_Elendar_Teal, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Elendar_Teal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Portal_Elendar_Teal, function Trig_Portal_Elendar_Teal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Five minutes remaining
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Five_minutes_remaining_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DarkGuardsOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Five_minutes_remaining_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DarkGuardsOn=true
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R01C', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6877")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Five_minutes_remaining takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Five_minutes_remaining=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Five_minutes_remaining, udg_DarkGuards_Timer)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Five_minutes_remaining, Condition(function Trig_Five_minutes_remaining_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Five_minutes_remaining, function Trig_Five_minutes_remaining_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'U008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 30.00)
    call BlzSetUnitBooleanFieldBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_BF_HERO_HIDE_HERO_INTERFACE_ICON, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(183.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dragon_dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragon_dies, Condition(function Trig_Dragon_dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragon_dies, function Trig_Dragon_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Necromancer dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Necromancer_dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Ulic' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\Soul Discharge Purple.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Necromancer_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Necromancer_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Necromancer_dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Necromancer_dies, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Necromancer_dies, function Trig_Necromancer_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Musketeer Train
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Musketeer_Train_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Musketeer_Train_Func002Func004001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Musketeer_Train_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MusketeerAlive >= 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Musketeer_Train_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02A', 30, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Musketeer_Train_Func002C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetTrainedUnit())
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Musketeer_Train_Func002Func004001001)), "TRIGSTR_7272")
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00O', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        set udg_MusketeerAlive=( udg_MusketeerAlive + 1 )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Musketeer_Train takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Musketeer_Train=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Musketeer_Train, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Musketeer_Train, Condition(function Trig_Musketeer_Train_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Musketeer_Train, function Trig_Musketeer_Train_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Musketeer Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Musketeer_Death_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02A' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Musketeer_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Musketeer_Death_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Musketeer_Death_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MusketeerAlive <= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Musketeer_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MusketeerAlive=( udg_MusketeerAlive - 1 )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02A', 30, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Musketeer_Death_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00O', 10, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R00O', ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) - 1 ), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Musketeer_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Musketeer_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Musketeer_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Musketeer_Death, Condition(function Trig_Musketeer_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Musketeer_Death, function Trig_Musketeer_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Thane Train
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Thane_Train_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thane_Train_Func002Func004001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Thane_Train_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ThaneAlive >= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thane_Train_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02P', 15, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Thane_Train_Func002C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetTrainedUnit())
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Thane_Train_Func002Func004001001)), "TRIGSTR_4867")
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R022', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        set udg_ThaneAlive=( udg_ThaneAlive + 1 )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Thane_Train takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Thane_Train=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Thane_Train, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Thane_Train, Condition(function Trig_Thane_Train_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Thane_Train, function Trig_Thane_Train_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Thane Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Thane_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thane_Death_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ThaneAlive <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thane_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ThaneAlive=( udg_ThaneAlive - 1 )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02P', 15, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Thane_Death_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R022', 10, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R022', ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R022', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) - 1 ), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Thane_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Thane_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Thane_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Thane_Death, Condition(function Trig_Thane_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Thane_Death, function Trig_Thane_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Human Village destroyed
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Func002Func005001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(21) )
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Func002Func005001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Func002Func005001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(21)), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Human_Village, Condition(function Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Func002Func005001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    if ( Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call RemoveWeatherEffectBJ(udg_RayOfLight)
        call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'YOtf', gg_rct_Human_Village)
        call ReplaceUnitBJ(gg_unit_u001_1325, 'u004', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Human_Village_destroyed takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Human_Village_destroyed=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Human_Village_destroyed, Player(21), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Human_Village_destroyed, function Trig_Human_Village_destroyed_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Protector Resurrection
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func001Func002Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetItemTypeId(GetFilterItem()) == 'I00D' )
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( RectContainsItem(udg_BookOfLight, gg_rct_Dawnfall_Altar) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsItem(RandomItemInRectBJ(gg_rct_Dawnfall_Altar, Condition(function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func001Func002Func002001001002)), gg_rct_Dawnfall_Altar) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h046_0941) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer >= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Integer=GetHeroLevel(udg_Protector_Ghost)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dawnfall_Altar)
    if ( Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call RemoveItem(udg_BookOfLight)
        call RemoveUnit(udg_Protector_Ghost)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H014', Player(20), udg_Point, 135.00)
        set udg_Unit_Hero[37]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Protector=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Integer, false)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2153")
        call ResetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_h046_0941)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', gg_unit_h046_0941)
        call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Protector_dies, udg_Protector, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('H014', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('H042', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('H014', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('H042', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
    else
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_2155", udg_Point, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Protector_Resurrection takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection, Condition(function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection, function Trig_Protector_Resurrection_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Purge Book of Light
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Func010Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetItemTypeId(GetFilterItem()) == 'I014' )
endfunction

function Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( RectContainsItem(udg_CorruptedBookOfLight, gg_rct_Purge_Book_of_Light) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( RectContainsItem(RandomItemInRectBJ(gg_rct_Purge_Book_of_Light, Condition(function Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Func010Func002001001002)), gg_rct_Purge_Book_of_Light) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Func010C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Purge_Book_of_Light)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveItem(udg_CorruptedBookOfLight)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 8.00, "TRIGSTR_4380")
    call CreateItemLoc('I00D', udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Purge_Book_of_Light takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Purge_Book_of_Light=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Purge_Book_of_Light)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Purge_Book_of_Light, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Purge_Book_of_Light, Condition(function Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Purge_Book_of_Light, function Trig_Purge_Book_of_Light_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Forgotten Durball Armor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Forgotten_Durball_Armor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I00L', udg_Point)
    set udg_Durball_Armour=GetLastCreatedItem()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Forgotten_Durball_Armor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Forgotten_Durball_Armor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Forgotten_Durball_Armor, gg_unit_n00C_0886, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Forgotten_Durball_Armor, function Trig_Forgotten_Durball_Armor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cutting down trees
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTg2' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'ATt0' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call DestructableRestoreLife(GetEnumDestructable(), GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), false)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_ATt0_20016)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_ATt0_20015)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll(gg_rct_Trees_block_Path_Purple, function Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Func004A)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'COla', gg_rct_Trees_block_Path_Purple)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cutting_down_trees takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cutting_down_trees=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cutting_down_trees, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cutting_down_trees, Condition(function Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cutting_down_trees, function Trig_Cutting_down_trees_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Night Eyes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Night_Eyes_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Eyes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Eevi', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Unit_Hero[35]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[35]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[35])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[35], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[35]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    set udg_UndeadHeroBrown02=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Revive_Death_Eyes, udg_UndeadHeroBrown02, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspiritdone.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\WarStomp\\WarStompCaster.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01M', udg_Unit_Hero[35])
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Rise_of_the_Death_hounds)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'nfel', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 8.00, "TRIGSTR_831")
    if ( Trig_Night_Eyes_Func018C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[35])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08Q', udg_Unit_Hero[35])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Night_Eyes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Night_Eyes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Night_Eyes, gg_unit_Eill_0158, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Night_Eyes, function Trig_Night_Eyes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead orc Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_orc_Hero_Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_orc_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'O007', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Unit_Hero[32]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[32]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[32])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[32], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[32]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    set udg_UndeadHeroDarkGreen02=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Revive_Rakkash, udg_UndeadHeroDarkGreen02, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 8.00, "TRIGSTR_8017")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01L', udg_Unit_Hero[32])
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necromancer_Cave_Back)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'nsog', Player(10), udg_Point, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necromancer_Cave_Back)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'nsko', Player(10), udg_Point, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necromancer_Cave_Back)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'nsoc', Player(10), udg_Point, GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig_Undead_orc_Hero_Func022C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[32])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08Q', udg_Unit_Hero[32])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_orc_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_orc_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Undead_orc_Hero, gg_unit_Ogrh_0082, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_orc_Hero, function Trig_Undead_orc_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Nerubian Hero Cage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nerubian_Hero_Cage_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nerubian_Hero_Cage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_17890)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_17891)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("death alternate", 'D03X', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_Ucrl_1330, Player(6), true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_Ucrl_1330, false)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_Ucrl_1330)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_Ucrl_1330, "attack", PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 120.00, 270.00))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01J', gg_unit_Ucrl_1330)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_4166")
    if ( Trig_Nerubian_Hero_Cage_Func011C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', gg_unit_Ucrl_1330)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08Q', gg_unit_Ucrl_1330)
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nerubian_Hero_Cage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nerubian_Hero_Cage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Nerubian_Hero_Cage, gg_unit_h05H_0372, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Nerubian_Hero_Cage, function Trig_Nerubian_Hero_Cage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aslyr Sword Turn on
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H014' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H042' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) == 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00N_0139)
    call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00N_0145)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_n00N_0139)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_n00N_0145)
    call DisplayTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], "TRIGSTR_6314")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on, Player(20), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on, Condition(function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on, function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Turn_on_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aslyr Sword can be taken
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_nrvi_0117) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_nrvs_0118) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_nrvs_0125) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_B001_0417)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_B001_0416)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken, gg_unit_nrvi_0117, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken, gg_unit_nrvs_0118, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken, gg_unit_nrvs_0125, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken, Condition(function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken, function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_can_be_taken_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aslyr Sword Taken
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Taken_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(20) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == gg_item_I001_0015 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Taken_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_AslyrSwordTaken=true
    set udg_Score_Events[20]=( udg_Score_Events[20] + 20.00 )
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D01I', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("stand second", 'D01I', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetTriggerUnit(), GetHeroProperName(GetTriggerUnit()), gg_snd_H09Arthas16, "TRIGSTR_7174", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.00, false)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Soul Beam Blue.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt, 100, GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Cosmic Wings.mdx")
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call WaygateActivateBJ(false, gg_unit_n00N_0145)
    call ShowUnitHide(gg_unit_n00N_0145)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( " took the legendary sword " + ( GetItemName(gg_item_I001_0015) + "!" ) ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aslyr_Sword_Taken takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Taken=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Taken, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Taken, Condition(function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Taken_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aslyr_Sword_Taken, function Trig_Aslyr_Sword_Taken_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Portal Research Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Portal_Research_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Research_Begins_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Research_Begins_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Research_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01I', 0, Player(1))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1)) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01I', 0, Player(0))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Portal_Research_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Portal_Research_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Portal_Research_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Portal_Research_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Research_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Portal_Research_Begins, function Trig_Portal_Research_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Portal Research Cancel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Portal_Research_Cancel_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Research_Cancel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01I', 1, Player(0))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01I', 1, Player(1))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Portal_Research_Cancel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Portal_Research_Cancel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Portal_Research_Cancel, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Portal_Research_Cancel, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Research_Cancel_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Portal_Research_Cancel, function Trig_Portal_Research_Cancel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Portal Research End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Portal_Research_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Research_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01I', 1, Player(0))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01I', 1, Player(1))
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R01I', 1, Player(0))
    call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R01I', 1, Player(1))
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_n00P_0265)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_n00P_0288)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|cffff0000" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) + ( "|r" + ( " |cff00ff00et|r " + ( "|cff0042ff" + ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + ( "|r |cff00ff00can now begin the spell to close the portal. For this the red and blue player must have a hero on the power circle of their base.|r" ) ) ) ) ) ) ))
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Spell)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Portal_Research_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Portal_Research_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Portal_Research_End, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Portal_Research_End, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Research_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Portal_Research_End, function Trig_Portal_Research_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Portal Spell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func001001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func001001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(0) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func001001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(0))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func002001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func002001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Red, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func001001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Red, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001Func002001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func001001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func001001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(1) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func001001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(1))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func002001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func002001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Blue, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func001001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Blue, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002Func002001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Portal_Spell_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func007002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func007002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(0) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func007002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(0))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Red), 180.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func010002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func010002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func010002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Red), 180.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func013002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func013002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(1) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func013002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(1))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Blue), 180.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func016002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func016002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7) )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func016002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(7))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Blue), 180.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Spell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6384")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Heroes_dies)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Destroy)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Red, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func007002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Red, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func010002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func011A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Blue, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func013002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Close_Portal_Blue, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func016002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Portal_Spell_Func017A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_PortalDestroy, false, 120.00)
    set udg_PortalDestroy=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_PortalDestroy, "TRIGSTR_6381")
    set udg_PortalDestroyWindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_PortalDestroyWindow)
    set udg_PortalsAreClosing=true
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=59
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy, "spell")
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy, "spell")
        call TriggerSleepAction(2)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Portal_Spell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Portal_Spell=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Spell)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Portal_Spell, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Portal_Spell, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Spell_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Portal_Spell, function Trig_Portal_Spell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Portal Heroes dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Portal_Heroes_dies_Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Heroes_dies_Func012002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy )
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Heroes_dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetTriggerUnit() == udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy), (GetTriggerUnit() == udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Portal_Heroes_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Spell)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Destroy)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6385")
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_PortalDestroy)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_PortalDestroyWindow)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00P_0288)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00P_0265)
    set udg_PortalsAreClosing=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Portal_Heroes_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Portal_Heroes_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Heroes_dies)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Portal_Heroes_dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Portal_Heroes_dies, Condition(function Trig_Portal_Heroes_dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Portal_Heroes_dies, function Trig_Portal_Heroes_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Portal Destroy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Portal_Destroy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Spell)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Heroes_dies)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_PortalDestroyWindow)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6382")
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_n00O_0151, 50.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_n00O_0208, 50.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_n00O_0208)
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_n00O_0151)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00P_0288)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00P_0265)
    set udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy=null
    set udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy=null
    set udg_PortalsAreClosing=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Portal_Destroy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Portal_Destroy=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Portal_Destroy)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Portal_Destroy, udg_PortalDestroy)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Portal_Destroy, function Trig_Portal_Destroy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bridges Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R010' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R017' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R02M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Bridges_Red_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func002Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func002Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h05C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func003Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h05D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func004Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h05B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R010' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bridges_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Bridges_Red_Func002C() ) then
        call KillDestructable(gg_dest_LT09_5946)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Red_Bridge_North_East_1)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func002Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Red_Bridge_North_East_2)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func002Func006002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Bridges_Red_Func003C() ) then
        call KillDestructable(gg_dest_LT10_0059)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Red_Bridge_East)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func003Func005002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Bridges_Red_Func004C() ) then
        call KillDestructable(gg_dest_LT06_0002)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Red_Bridge_West)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bridges_Red_Func004Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bridges_Red takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bridges_Red=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bridges_Red, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bridges_Red, Condition(function Trig_Bridges_Red_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bridges_Red, function Trig_Bridges_Red_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bridge Bulwark
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bridge_Bulwark_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bridge_Bulwark_Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Bridge_Bulwark_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_LT06_2418)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Graywall_Bridge)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bridge_Bulwark_Func004002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bridge_Bulwark takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bridge_Bulwark=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bridge_Bulwark, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bridge_Bulwark, Condition(function Trig_Bridge_Bulwark_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bridge_Bulwark, function Trig_Bridge_Bulwark_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Abandonned Church Anti Glitch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch_Func004002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true), (IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " tried to glitch the \"Abandonned Church Quest\". The unit who enters in the zone is removed and this is a warning to every player." ))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch, Condition(function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch, function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Abandonned Church Open
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00L' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00K' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00T' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_Ulic_1139 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_7112", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        else
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\DivineShield\\DivineShieldTarget.mdl")
            set udg_InvuShieldSpecialEffect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
            set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Abandonned_Church_Channel)
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point, 45.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_7113", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt, 50.00, GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0665, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt, 50.00, GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0665, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt, 50.00, GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0665, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt, 50.00, GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0665, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_HolyBolt, 50.00, GetTriggerUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0665, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("stand second", 'D02P', gg_rct_Uther_Statue)
            call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'JOgr', gg_rct_Uther_Statue)
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
            call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_InvuShieldSpecialEffect)
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00B_0665)
            call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call SetDoodadAnimationBJ("death alternate", 'D01B', 300.00, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel_Exterior))
            call SetDoodadAnimationBJ("death alternate", 'D01B', 300.00, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel_Interior))
            call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00B_0665)
            call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00B_0074)
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_7114")
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Unsummon\\UnsummonTarget.mdl")
            set udg_InvuShieldSpecialEffect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
            set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Abandonned_Church_Channel)
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point, 45.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_2267", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("stand second", 'D02P', gg_rct_Uther_Statue)
            call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'JOgr', gg_rct_Uther_Statue)
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Anti_Glitch)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
            call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_InvuShieldSpecialEffect)
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A045', GetTriggerUnit())
            set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00B_0665)
            call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 3.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call SetDoodadAnimationBJ("death alternate", 'D01B', 300.00, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel_Exterior))
            call SetDoodadAnimationBJ("death alternate", 'D01B', 300.00, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel_Interior))
            call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00B_0665)
            call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00B_0074)
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_2268")
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Abandonned_Church_Open takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Open=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Open, gg_rct_Activate_Corrupted_Church_Quest)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Open, Condition(function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Open, function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Open_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Abandonned Church Boss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_U00I_1254, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00I_1254, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Abandonned_Church_Boss takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel_Boss_fight)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss, function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Abandonned Church Boss End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_U00I_1254 ) ) then
