        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 10.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func005Func011002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func006Func011002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func006Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func005C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()), null, "TRIGSTR_6093", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.00, false)
        call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()), null, "TRIGSTR_6094", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.00, false)
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.50)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_U00I_1254, "TRIGSTR_6095", gg_snd_Galadrasil02, "TRIGSTR_6096", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.00, false)
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00I_1254, "stand victory")
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00I_1254)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func005Func011002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func006C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()), null, "TRIGSTR_6105", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.00, false)
        call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()), null, "TRIGSTR_6106", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.00, false)
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.50)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_U00I_1254, "TRIGSTR_6107", gg_snd_Galadrasil03, "TRIGSTR_6108", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00I_1254, "stand victory")
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.80)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00I_1254)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func006Func011002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_U00I_1254, Player(6), true)
        set udg_Score_Total[6]=( udg_Score_Total[6] + 20.00 )
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00I_1254, false)
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6109")
        if ( Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Func006Func018C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', gg_unit_U00I_1254)
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08Q', gg_unit_U00I_1254)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(gg_unit_U00I_1254, 100)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_U00I_1254, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End, Condition(function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End, function Trig_Abandonned_Church_Boss_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Abandonned Chuch Boss dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathPact\\DeathPactTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_7142")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Purge_Book_of_Light)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathPact\\DeathPactTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4377")
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Purge_Book_of_Light)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies, gg_unit_U00I_1254, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies, function Trig_Abandonned_Chuch_Boss_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dolmen 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dolmen_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnteringUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_01_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DolmenQuestStep == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnteringUnit()) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_01_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DolmenQuestStep == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnteringUnit()) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_01_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DolmenQuestStep == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnteringUnit()) >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dolmen_01_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_01_Center)
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
        set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01R', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
    else
        if ( Trig_Dolmen_01_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
            set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_01_Center)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
            set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01O', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 1000 ))
            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
        else
            if ( Trig_Dolmen_01_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
                set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
                set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_01_Center)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
                set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2000 ))
                call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
                call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End)
            else
                call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_5298", GetEnteringUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
                call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
                call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
                call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
                call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dolmen_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dolmen_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Dolmen_01, gg_rct_Dolmen_01)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dolmen_01, Condition(function Trig_Dolmen_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dolmen_01, function Trig_Dolmen_01_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnteringUnit()) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    endif

    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dolmen_02_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_02_Center)
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
        set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01R', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
    else
        if ( Trig_Dolmen_02_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
            set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_02_Center)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
            set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01O', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 1000 ))
            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
        else
            if ( Trig_Dolmen_02_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
                set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
                set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_02_Center)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
                call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
                set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2000 ))
                call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
                call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End)
            else
                call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6037", GetEnteringUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
                call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
                call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
                call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
                call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Dolmen_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Dolmen_02, gg_rct_Dolmen_02)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dolmen_02, function Trig_Dolmen_02_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_03_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnteringUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_03_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DolmenQuestStep == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnteringUnit()) >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnteringUnit()) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnteringUnit()) >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_03_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dolmen_03_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_03_Center)
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
        set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01R', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
    else
        if ( Trig_Dolmen_03_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
            set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_03_Center)
            set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
            set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01O', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 1000 ))
            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
        else
            if ( Trig_Dolmen_03_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
                set udg_DolmenQuestStep=( udg_DolmenQuestStep + 1 )
                set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_03_Center)
                set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
                set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetLastCreatedUnit(), true)
                call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2000 ))
                call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
                call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Spell Channel")
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Spell Slam")
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_DemonicWerewolf, "Stand Ready")
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_DemonicWerewolf, false)
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_DemonicWerewolf)
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End)
            else
                call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6039", GetEnteringUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
                call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
                call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
                call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
                call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dolmen_03 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dolmen_03=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Dolmen_03, gg_rct_Dolmen_03)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dolmen_03, Condition(function Trig_Dolmen_03_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dolmen_03, function Trig_Dolmen_03_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dolmen Quest End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dolmen_Quest_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dolmen_Quest_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetKillingUnitBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'h06H', Player(9), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
    set udg_DemonicWerewolf=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6047", GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6048", udg_DemonicWerewolf, 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dolmen_Quest_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End, Condition(function Trig_Dolmen_Quest_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dolmen_Quest_End, function Trig_Dolmen_Quest_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Partial Wolf Amulet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01R') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01O') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01R') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01S') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01O') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01S') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001Func003C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01R'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01O'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01S'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01P', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Partial_Wolf_Amulet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Partial_Wolf_Amulet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Partial_Wolf_Amulet, Condition(function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Partial_Wolf_Amulet, function Trig_Partial_Wolf_Amulet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wolf Amulet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wolf_Amulet_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01R') == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01O') == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01S') == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Wolf_Amulet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Wolf_Amulet_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01P') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wolf_Amulet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01R'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01O'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01S'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01P'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01Q', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wolf_Amulet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wolf_Amulet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wolf_Amulet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wolf_Amulet, Condition(function Trig_Wolf_Amulet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wolf_Amulet, function Trig_Wolf_Amulet_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Announcements
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Announcements_Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func031001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func036001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func042001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func042002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == Player(4) )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func043001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func046001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func048001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func051001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Func053001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Announcements_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, gg_unit_h01Z_0101, "TRIGSTR_6860", gg_snd_Guard_Captain_Updated_1, "TRIGSTR_6859", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(287.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, gg_unit_h01Z_0101, "TRIGSTR_6861", gg_snd_Guard_Captain_Updated_2, "TRIGSTR_6862", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'n005', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(40.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, gg_unit_h01Z_0101, "TRIGSTR_6863", gg_snd_Guard_Captain_Updated_3, "TRIGSTR_6864", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'n005', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, gg_unit_h01Z_0101, "TRIGSTR_6865", gg_snd_Guard_Captain_Updated_4, "TRIGSTR_6866", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Reinforcements_Dark_Green)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(90.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Reinforcements_Dark_Green)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(105.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, gg_unit_h01Z_0101, "TRIGSTR_6867", gg_snd_Guard_Captain_Updated_5, "TRIGSTR_6868", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Barkshire_invasion)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[4], udg_Point, 3.00)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Announcements_Func042002001001)), 8.00, "TRIGSTR_5303")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(9, 'hrif', Player(4), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Barkshire_invasion)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'h021', Player(4), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Barkshire_invasion)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h020', Player(4), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Announcements takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Announcements=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Announcements, 75.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Announcements, function Trig_Announcements_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Seafront cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func053Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func053C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func054Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func054C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleport_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func055Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func055C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func056Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func056C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Dark_Arrival_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func057C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CrystalGolemAlive == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PrideOfTheDwarves == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func058C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_PortalDestroy) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    call FogMaskEnableOff()
    call FogEnableOff()
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_uubs_0551)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_uubs_0550)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_uubs_0552)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Seafront, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_uubs_0552, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_3))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_uubs_0550, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_uubs_0551, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront))
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, gg_unit_h01Z_0101, "TRIGSTR_1472", gg_snd_Guard_Captain_Updated_6, "TRIGSTR_1473", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boat_2)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("death", 'NWsp', gg_rct_Human_Ships_at_Beach)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'NWsd', gg_rct_Human_Ships_at_Beach)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call FogMaskEnableOn()
    call FogEnableOn()
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(gg_unit_uubs_0552, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boat_1), 360.00)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_uubs_0552, Player(11), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(gg_unit_uubs_0550, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boat_2), 360.00)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_uubs_0550, Player(6), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(gg_unit_uubs_0551, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boat_3), 360.00)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_uubs_0551, Player(10), true)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(gg_unit_uubs_0552, 0.00)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(gg_unit_uubs_0550, 0.00)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(gg_unit_uubs_0551, 0.00)
    set udg_Unit=gg_unit_uubs_0552
    call UnitRemoveAbility(udg_Unit, 'Amov')
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_Point, 3.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Unit=gg_unit_uubs_0550
    call UnitRemoveAbility(udg_Unit, 'Amov')
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_Point, 3.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Unit=gg_unit_uubs_0551
    call UnitRemoveAbility(udg_Unit, 'Amov')
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_Point, 3.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, "TRIGSTR_1705")
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 15, 15)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    if ( Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func053C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Call_Of_Justice, udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
        set udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice, function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func053Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func054C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleport, udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleport_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport, function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func054Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func055C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleportation, udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation, function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func055Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func056C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Dark_Arrival, udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
        set udg_Dark_Arrival_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival, function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func056Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func057C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_CrystalGolem)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Func058C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(897.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1696")
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', gg_unit_uubs_0552)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', gg_unit_uubs_0550)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', gg_unit_uubs_0551)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Seafront_cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Seafront_cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Seafront_cinematic, 312.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Seafront_cinematic, function Trig_Seafront_cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Capitals Riotings
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Capitals_Riotings_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Capitals_Riotings_Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Capitals_Riotings_Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CivilWarOn == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Capitals_Riotings_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_under_capital)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[10], udg_Point, 5.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dolmen_02_Center)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[10], udg_Point, 5.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'nfel', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(180.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, gg_unit_h01Z_0101, "TRIGSTR_6919", gg_snd_Guard_Captain_Updated_8, "TRIGSTR_6920", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    if ( (udg_CivilWarOn == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Orc_Emcapment)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(20, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[10], udg_Point, 5.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Capitals_Riotings takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Capitals_Riotings=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Capitals_Riotings, 857.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Capitals_Riotings, function Trig_Capitals_Riotings_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead orc chief
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_orc_chief_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_orc_chief_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o008', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, 360.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_orc_chief takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_orc_chief=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Undead_orc_chief, gg_unit_o004_0564, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_orc_chief, Condition(function Trig_Undead_orc_chief_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_orc_chief, function Trig_Undead_orc_chief_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func001001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func001001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func001001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func001001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'U008' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func001001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true))), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'U008')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u009' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func003001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n00K' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Mana_Well_1, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func001001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Mana_Well_1, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func002001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Mana_Well_1, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001Func003001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func002Func001001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func002Func001001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'U008' )

        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true)) // INLINED!!

    endif

        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004Func001001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004Func001001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'U008' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004Func001001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true))), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'U008')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u009' )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n00K' )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Mana_Well_4, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004Func001001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Mana_Well_4, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004Func002001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Mana_Well_4, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004Func003001001002))) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func055C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ManaWellUnit1=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ManaWellUnit2=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func009002 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ManaWellUnit3=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func012002 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ManaWellUnit4=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func031002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), 6.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func035002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func052001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(1), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func052002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func053A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NECancelDeath\\NECancelDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 0.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Mana_Well_1)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Mana_Well_2)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func006002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Mana_Well_3)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func009002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Mana_Well_4)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func012002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    //  
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_ManaWellUnit1)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_ManaWellUnit2)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_ManaWellUnit3)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_ManaWellUnit4)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(udg_ManaWellUnit1, gg_unit_n013_0957, 0)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(udg_ManaWellUnit2, gg_unit_n013_0957, 0)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(udg_ManaWellUnit3, gg_unit_n013_0957, 0)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(udg_ManaWellUnit4, gg_unit_n013_0957, 0)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit1, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit2, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit3, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit4, true)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_1504")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n013_0957, "stand third")
    call SetDoodadAnimationBJ("hide", 'D02I', 300.00, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Mana_Well_2))
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(1), 6.00)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func031002)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_ManaWellUnit1, "spell")
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_ManaWellUnit2, "spell")
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_ManaWellUnit3, "spell")
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_ManaWellUnit4, "spell")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(1))
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func035002)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n013_0957, Player(11), true)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A04K', gg_unit_n013_0957)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04M', gg_unit_n013_0957)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ncop_1016)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ncop_0959)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ncop_1015)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ncop_1008)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_ManaWellUnit1)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_ManaWellUnit2)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_ManaWellUnit3)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_ManaWellUnit4)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit1, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit2, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit3, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_ManaWellUnit4, false)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_2668")
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(1), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(1), Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func052002002002))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Func053A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mana_Well_Corruption takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mana_Well_Corruption=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Mana_Well_Corruption, 1.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mana_Well_Corruption, Condition(function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mana_Well_Corruption, function Trig_Mana_Well_Corruption_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lit Beacon 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lit_Beacon_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h03C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lit_Beacon_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Hint)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4894")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_02)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lit_Beacon_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_01, Player(0), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_UPGRADE_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_01, Condition(function Trig_Lit_Beacon_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_01, function Trig_Lit_Beacon_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lit Beacon 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h03C', Player(0)) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(0), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(0), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'h022', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Reinforcements), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'h06L', Player(4), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Yellow_reinforcements), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'h001', Player(4), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Yellow_reinforcements), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lit_Beacon_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_02, 600.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_02, Condition(function Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lit_Beacon_02, function Trig_Lit_Beacon_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reinforcements Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reinforcements_Red_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(0), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Red_Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == Player(0) )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Red_Func002001001)), 5.00, "TRIGSTR_221")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Reinforcements)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'h022', Player(0), udg_Point, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Reinforcements_Red=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Reinforcements_Red, 600.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Reinforcements_Red, Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Red_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reinforcements_Red, function Trig_Reinforcements_Red_Actions)
endfunction
