    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reinforcements_Teal, function Trig_Reinforcements_Teal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: First Reinforcements Teal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_First_Reinforcements_Teal_Func002Func012001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == Player(2) )
endfunction

function Trig_First_Reinforcements_Teal_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(2), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Reinforcements_Teal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    if ( Trig_First_Reinforcements_Teal_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_First_Reinforcements_Teal_Func002Func012001001)), 6.00, "TRIGSTR_546")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Elendar_Reinforcements)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'h04W', Player(2), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Hjnd', Player(2), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_Unit_Hero[11]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Name_Hero[11]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11])
        call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00Y', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastCreatedUnit(), "TRIGSTR_3661", gg_snd_SylvanasWhat2, "TRIGSTR_3691", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Elendar_Reinforcements)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'h04W', Player(7), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Hjnd', Player(7), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_Unit_Hero[11]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Name_Hero[11]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11])
        call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00Y', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastCreatedUnit(), "TRIGSTR_3700", gg_snd_SylvanasWhat2, "TRIGSTR_3702", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_First_Reinforcements_Teal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_First_Reinforcements_Teal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_First_Reinforcements_Teal, 600.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_First_Reinforcements_Teal, function Trig_First_Reinforcements_Teal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reinforcements Light blue
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func004001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func007001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00X', Player(9)) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func024001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func004001001)), 6.00, "TRIGSTR_2469")
    call TriggerSleepAction(300.00)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func007001001)), 6.00, "TRIGSTR_4180")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Reinforcements_Light_Blue)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h018', Player(9), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Reinforcements_Light_Blue)
    if ( Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Func016C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h063', Player(9), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h062', Player(9), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Reinforcements_Light_Blue)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'h01Q', Player(9), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers) == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Reinforcements_Light_Blue)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'e000', Player(9), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reinforcements_Light_blue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reinforcements_Light_blue=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Reinforcements_Light_blue, 120.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reinforcements_Light_blue, function Trig_Reinforcements_Light_blue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Elias
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Elias_Func002Func014001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == Player(0) )
endfunction

function Trig_Elias_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(0), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elias_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    if ( Trig_Elias_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Elias_Func002Func014001001)), 6.00, "TRIGSTR_5602")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Reinforcements)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h022', Player(0), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H00W', Player(0), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_Unit_Hero[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Name_Hero[5]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5])
        call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('ofir', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
        call SetUnitColor(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit())))
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastCreatedUnit(), "TRIGSTR_7918", gg_snd_KnightYesAttack1, "TRIGSTR_7919", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Reinforcements)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h022', Player(7), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H00W', Player(7), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_Unit_Hero[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Name_Hero[5]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5])
        call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('ofir', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\GeneralHeroGlow.mdx")
        call SetUnitColor(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit())))
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastCreatedUnit(), "TRIGSTR_1053", gg_snd_KnightYesAttack1, "TRIGSTR_1065", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Elias takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Elias=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Elias, 1200.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Elias, function Trig_Elias_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Elendar King
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Elendar_King_Func003Func014001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == Player(2) )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_King_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(2), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_King_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02G', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Elendar_King_Func003C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Elendar_King_Func003Func014001001)), 6.00, "TRIGSTR_3705")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Elendar_Reinforcements)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'h052', Player(2), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n01B', Player(2), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H054', Player(2), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_Unit_Hero[12]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Name_Hero[12]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12])
        call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
        set udg_Unit_ElendarKing=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('cnob', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastCreatedUnit(), "TRIGSTR_3706", gg_snd_DruidOfTheClawYesAttack1, "TRIGSTR_3707", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Elendar_Reinforcements)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'h052', Player(7), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n01B', Player(7), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H054', Player(7), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_Unit_Hero[12]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Name_Hero[12]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12])
        call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
        set udg_Unit_ElendarKing=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('cnob', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastCreatedUnit(), "TRIGSTR_3703", gg_snd_DruidOfTheClawYesAttack1, "TRIGSTR_3704", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Elendar_King takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Elendar_King=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Elendar_King, 1210.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Elendar_King, function Trig_Elendar_King_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Red Heavy Footmen x10
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetResearched() == 'R01O' )
endfunction

function Trig_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10_Func004002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h025_0058 )
endfunction

function Trig_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetResearched() == 'R01O'), (GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h025_0058)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h022', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10, Condition(function Trig_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10, function Trig_Red_Heavy_Footmen_x10_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    return ( GetResearched() == 'R00G' )

    return ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h028_0064 )

function Trig_Blue_Mage_Guard_x10_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetResearched() == 'R00G'), (GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h028_0064)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Purple Musketeer x10
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetResearched() == 'R00O' )
endfunction

function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Func002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h02G_0102 )
endfunction

function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetResearched() == 'R00O'), (GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h02G_0102)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Func001Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MusketeerAlive >= 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Func001C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(4500, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Func001Func002001001)), "TRIGSTR_7273")
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00O', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Purple_Army)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h02A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_MusketeerAlive=( udg_MusketeerAlive + 10 )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Purple_Musketeer_x10 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Purple_Musketeer_x10=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Purple_Musketeer_x10, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Purple_Musketeer_x10, Condition(function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Purple_Musketeer_x10, function Trig_Purple_Musketeer_x10_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetResearched() == 'R01S'), (GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h044_0232)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Orange_x10_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h01J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10, Condition(function Trig_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10, function Trig_Orange_Dwarven_Warriors_x10_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Orange Thanes x10
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetResearched() == 'R022' )
endfunction

function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Func002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h044_0232 )
endfunction

function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetResearched() == 'R022'), (GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h044_0232)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Func001Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ThaneAlive >= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Func001C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(4500, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Func001Func002001001)), "TRIGSTR_4793")
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R022', 0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    else
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Orange_x10_Army)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'h02P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, 90.00)
        set udg_ThaneAlive=( udg_ThaneAlive + 10 )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Orange_Thanes_x10 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Orange_Thanes_x10=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Orange_Thanes_x10, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Orange_Thanes_x10, Condition(function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Orange_Thanes_x10, function Trig_Orange_Thanes_x10_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Teredar Fortress
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func024C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_180")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func016Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func019C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func022C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Func024C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Teredar_Fortress takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Teredar_Fortress=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Teredar_Fortress, gg_unit_h002_0461, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Teredar_Fortress, function Trig_Teredar_Fortress_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crystal Falcon Citadel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func016Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func016Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func016Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func016Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_515")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func016Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func016Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func019C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func022C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Func024C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel, gg_unit_h00P_0294, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel, function Trig_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Elendar Keep
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func010Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func010Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func010Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif

endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func020001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1044")
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func010Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func010Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func012C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func014C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func015C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func016C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elendar_Keep_Func019C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Elendar_Keep takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Elendar_Keep=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Elendar_Keep, gg_unit_h008_0223, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Elendar_Keep, function Trig_Elendar_Keep_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Leonar Citadel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func014002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func019Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction
