    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func019Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func050001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_173")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('n01D')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func014002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func017A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func019Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func019Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func022C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func024C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func025C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func026C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func027C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTcx_8718)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_uubs_1023)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_uubs_1020)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_uubs_1023, Player(10), true)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_uubs_1020, Player(11), true)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_uubs_1023)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_uubs_1020)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Point, 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(gg_unit_uubs_1023, 0.00)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(gg_unit_uubs_1020, 0.00)
    set udg_Unit=gg_unit_uubs_1023
    call UnitRemoveAbility(udg_Unit, 'Amov')
    set udg_Unit=gg_unit_uubs_1020
    call UnitRemoveAbility(udg_Unit, 'Amov')
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func045C() ) then
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func046C() ) then
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func047C() ) then
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func048C() ) then
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Func049C() ) then
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n006', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n006', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Leonar_Citadel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Leonar_Citadel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Leonar_Citadel, gg_unit_h009_0538, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Leonar_Citadel, function Trig_Leonar_Citadel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Church of the Golden Eagle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif

endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func028001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_172")
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_ewsp_1024)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(gg_unit_u001_1171, 'u004', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(gg_unit_u001_1315, 'u004', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func017A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func019Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func022C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func024C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func025C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func026C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Func027C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle, gg_unit_h007_0211, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle, function Trig_Church_of_the_Golden_Eagle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stormfury Citadel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func026001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_n00U_1496)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1286")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func015A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func017Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func019C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func022C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func024C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Func025C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stormfury_Citadel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stormfury_Citadel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Stormfury_Citadel, gg_unit_h01I_1483, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stormfury_Citadel, function Trig_Stormfury_Citadel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ganch Keep
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true

    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction
