    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_277")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func016Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func019C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func022C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Ganch_Keep_Func024C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ganch_Keep takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ganch_Keep=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Ganch_Keep, gg_unit_h00B_0976, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ganch_Keep, function Trig_Ganch_Keep_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hammerfell Castle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06S', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A086', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A087', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A088', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08B', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A089', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A085', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8) ) then // INLINED!!
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08C', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func024C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[6]=( udg_Score_Events[6] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[10]=( udg_Score_Events[10] + 50.00 )
    set udg_Score_Events[11]=( udg_Score_Events[11] + 50.00 )
    set udg_CapitalsAliveInteger=( udg_CapitalsAliveInteger - 1 )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_238")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_IncomeUndeadBonus=( udg_IncomeUndeadBonus + 1 )
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('uzg2')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func016Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=900
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1000
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func019C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1100
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1200
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1300
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func022C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1400
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1500
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Func024C() ) then
        set udg_Integer=1600
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, udg_Integer)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, udg_Integer)
    else
    endif
    if ( (udg_CapitalsAliveInteger <= 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hammerfell_Castle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hammerfell_Castle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Hammerfell_Castle, gg_unit_h004_0354, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hammerfell_Castle, function Trig_Hammerfell_Castle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Great Tower Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h03A' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h03C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h03B' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Great_Tower_Red takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Great_Tower_Red=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Great_Tower_Red, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Great_Tower_Red, Condition(function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Great_Tower_Red, function Trig_Great_Tower_Red_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4909")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dawnfall_Hold takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold, gg_unit_h015_0207, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold, function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Leonar City
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func002Func012002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func002Func013002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Leonar_City_Anti_Bug))
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Leonar_City_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Leonar_City_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Leonar_City_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_174")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Skeleton_Key)
        call CreateItemLoc('I00M', udg_Point)
        call SetItemInvulnerableBJ(GetLastCreatedItem(), true)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Leonar_City, Condition(function Trig_Leonar_City_Func002Func012002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Leonar_City_Func002Func013002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Leonar_City)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u003', Player(11), udg_Point, 90.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Leonar_City takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Leonar_City=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Leonar_City, gg_unit_h00I_0975, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Leonar_City, function Trig_Leonar_City_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Barkshire_Func002Func008002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Barkshire_Func002Func009002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Barkshire_Anti_Bug))
endfunction

function Trig_Barkshire_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barkshire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Barkshire_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Barkshire_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Barkshire_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_178")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Barkshire, Condition(function Trig_Barkshire_Func002Func008002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Barkshire_Func002Func009002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Barkshire)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u003', Player(10), udg_Point, 30.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Barkshire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Barkshire, gg_unit_h003_0045, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Barkshire, function Trig_Barkshire_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )

function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func004Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func006Func009002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func006Func010002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bulwark_Bastion_Anti_Bug))
endfunction

function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('e004')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func002002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func004Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func004Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_16887)
    if ( Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func006C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_780")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Flesh_giants_at_bulwark)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u000', Player(6), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Heart_of_the_Mountain)
        call CreateItemLoc('I000', udg_Point)
        call SetItemInvulnerableBJ(GetLastCreatedItem(), true)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Bulwark_Bastion, Condition(function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func006Func009002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Func006Func010002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bulwark_Bastion)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u003', Player(6), udg_Point, 295.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion, gg_unit_h00R_0297, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion, function Trig_Bulwark_Graywall_Bastion_Actions)
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Garrison_Tower_Red_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Garrison_Tower_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Garrison_Tower_Red_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Garrison_Tower_Red_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Garrison_Tower_Red takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Garrison_Tower_Red=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Garrison_Tower_Red, gg_unit_h00H_0659, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Garrison_Tower_Red, function Trig_Garrison_Tower_Red_Actions)
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mage_Guild_4_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Mage_Guild_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Mage_Guild_4_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Mage_Guild_4_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mage_Guild_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mage_Guild_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Mage_Guild_4, gg_unit_h005_0761, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mage_Guild_4, function Trig_Mage_Guild_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: South Fields 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_South_Fields_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_492")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_South_Fields_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_South_Fields_1, gg_unit_h00X_0598, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_South_Fields_1, Condition(function Trig_South_Fields_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_South_Fields_1, function Trig_South_Fields_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: South Fields 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction
