    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_South_Fields_2_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_South_Fields_2_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_294")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Point_South_of_Yellow)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Seafront_2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u000', Player(11), udg_Point, 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_South_Fields_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_South_Fields_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_South_Fields_2, gg_unit_h00X_1068, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_South_Fields_2, function Trig_South_Fields_2_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func006Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func006Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func006Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func006Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func007002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func008002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_South_Fields_Barricade_Anti_Bug))
endfunction

function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_296")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_South_Fields_Barricade)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u000', Player(10), udg_Point, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func006Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func006Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_South_Fields_Barricade, Condition(function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func007002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Func008002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_South_Fields_Barricade)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u003', Player(10), udg_Point, 295.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_South_Fields_Barricade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_South_Fields_Barricade=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_South_Fields_Barricade, gg_unit_h013_1669, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_South_Fields_Barricade, Condition(function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_South_Fields_Barricade, function Trig_South_Fields_Barricade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blacksmith and Artisan
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blacksmith_and_Artisan_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02J' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h01C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h01D' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Blacksmith_and_Artisan_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Blacksmith_and_Artisan_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blacksmith_and_Artisan_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blacksmith_and_Artisan takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blacksmith_and_Artisan=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blacksmith_and_Artisan, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blacksmith_and_Artisan, Condition(function Trig_Blacksmith_and_Artisan_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blacksmith_and_Artisan, function Trig_Blacksmith_and_Artisan_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Outskirt Town Hall
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Outskirt_Town_Hall_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_2675")
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_h04E_1019, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HCancelDeath\\HCancelDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_h04E_1019)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Outskirt_Town_Hall takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Outskirt_Town_Hall=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Outskirt_Town_Hall, gg_unit_h00A_0399, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Outskirt_Town_Hall, function Trig_Outskirt_Town_Hall_Actions)
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Generators_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Income_Generators_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Income_Generators_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Income_Generators_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Income_Generators=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Income_Generators, gg_unit_nmgv_0540, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Income_Generators, gg_unit_nmgv_0489, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Income_Generators, function Trig_Income_Generators_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banners_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Banners_Func002Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Banners_Func002Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Banners=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Banners, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Banners, Condition(function Trig_Banners_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Banners, function Trig_Banners_Actions)
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Windmill_House_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Windmill_House_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Windmill_House takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Windmill_House=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Windmill_House, gg_unit_n01F_0324, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Windmill_House, gg_unit_n01F_0326, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Windmill_House, function Trig_Windmill_House_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Twenty minutes passed
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Twenty_minutes_passed_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(udg_StartingTime)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02R', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Twenty_minutes_passed takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Twenty_minutes_passed=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Twenty_minutes_passed, 1200.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Twenty_minutes_passed, function Trig_Twenty_minutes_passed_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Last Stand Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), Player(0)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08P' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 6.00, ( "Soldiers have been called to defend " + ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + "!" ) ))
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_RedCapital)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\BattleCryCaster.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 50.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h024', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(180.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h023', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(180.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08P', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Last_Stand_Red takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Last_Stand_Red=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Red, gg_unit_h002_0461, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Red, gg_unit_h002_0461, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Red, Condition(function Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Red, function Trig_Last_Stand_Red_Actions)
endfunction

    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(180.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(180.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08P', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Last_Stand_Orange takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Last_Stand_Orange=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Orange, gg_unit_h01I_1483, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Orange, gg_unit_h01I_1483, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Orange, Condition(function Trig_Last_Stand_Orange_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Orange, function Trig_Last_Stand_Orange_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Last Stand Grey
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Last_Stand_Grey_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), Player(8)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Stand_Grey_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08P' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Last_Stand_Grey_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Stand_Grey_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Last_Stand_Grey_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Stand_Grey_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 6.00, ( "Soldiers have been called to defend " + ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + "!" ) ))
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Grey_Army)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\BattleCryCaster.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 50.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h011', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(180.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(180.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08P', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Last_Stand_Grey takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Last_Stand_Grey=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Grey, gg_unit_h00B_0976, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Grey, gg_unit_h00B_0976, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Last_Stand_Grey, function Trig_Last_Stand_Grey_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), Player(9)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    endif

    endif

    endif

    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd

        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(180.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A08P', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction
