//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Northwall Pass begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Northwall_Pass_begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00U_1496, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00U_1496, "stand second")
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 50.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "stand work")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Northwall_Pass_begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_begins, Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_begins, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Northwall Pass cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Func001Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PrideOfTheDwarves == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_NoPrideOfTheDwarves == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Func001Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Func001C() ) then
        if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00U_1496, Player(5), true)
        else
            call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00U_1496, Player(7), true)
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00U_1496, Player(5), true)
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00U_1496, "stand")
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Northwall_Pass_cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_cancels, Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_cancels, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Northwall Pass finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func004002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'nglm' )
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveDestructable(GetEnumDestructable())
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func009002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Northwall_Pass_ON=true
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_Kill, Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func004002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func005002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call EnumDestructablesInRectAll(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_Kill, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func007002)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_Kill)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Func009002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_01), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_01), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_02), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_02), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_03), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_03), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_04), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_04), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_05), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_05), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_06), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_06), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_07), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_07), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_08), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_08), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_09), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_09), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_10), "Doodads\\Cinematic\\CavernDust\\CavernDust.mdl")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('LTrc', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_10), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 1.50, 0)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00U_1496, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00U_1496, "stand second")
    set udg_NoPrideOfTheDwarves=true
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Northwall_Pass_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_finishes, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pride of the Dwarves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A060' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Score_Events[5]=( udg_Score_Events[5] + 20.00 )
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_TheHornOfCenarius)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_8120")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00U_1496, "stand second")
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00V', 0, Player(5))
    else
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00V', 0, Player(7))
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_h05A_1119)
    set udg_PrideOfTheDwarves=true
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A060', Player(5))
    else
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A060', Player(7))
    endif
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00C', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A063', gg_unit_h01Y_0968)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A063', gg_unit_h01Y_0937)
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_CrystalGolem)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_CrystalGolem, true)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_h01V_1500)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_h01V_1498)
    call ShowUnitShow(gg_unit_h01V_1501)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'XOmr', gg_rct_Crystal_Golem_Region)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetUnitOwner(udg_CrystalGolem, Player(5), true)
    else
        call SetUnitOwner(udg_CrystalGolem, Player(7), true)
    endif
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_CrystalGolem, "sleep")
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_CrystalGolem)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_dies, udg_CrystalGolem, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitManaEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_Ready, udg_CrystalGolem, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL, 500.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, 1500)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func003002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Func027Func004A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pride_of_the_Dwarves=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Pride_of_the_Dwarves, gg_unit_n00U_1496, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pride_of_the_Dwarves, Condition(function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pride_of_the_Dwarves, function Trig_Pride_of_the_Dwarves_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crystal Golem dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crystal_Golem_dies_Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Golem_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CrystalGolemAlive=false
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Crystal_Golem_Regen)
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00V', Player(5), udg_Point, 310.00)
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00V', Player(7), udg_Point, 310.00)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_CrystalGolem=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_CrystalGolem, true)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_CrystalGolem, "sleep")
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_CrystalGolem)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_dies, udg_CrystalGolem, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitManaEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_Ready, udg_CrystalGolem, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL, 500.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crystal_Golem_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_dies, function Trig_Crystal_Golem_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crystal Golem Ready
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crystal_Golem_Ready_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Golem_Ready_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "stop")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "stop")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "stop")
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "birth")
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( (IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[5], udg_Point, 3.00)
    else
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[7], udg_Point, 3.00)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_CrystalGolem)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_CrystalGolem, false)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('ACm2', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_CrystalGolemAlive=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crystal_Golem_Ready takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_Ready=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_Ready, function Trig_Crystal_Golem_Ready_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crystal Obelisks dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crystal_Obelisks_dies_Func005Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CrystalGolemAlive == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Obelisks_dies_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h01V', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crystal_Obelisks_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetDoodadAnimationBJ("hide", 'XOmr', 60.00, udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Crystal_Obelisks_dies_Func005C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_dies)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_Ready)
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_CrystalGolem, false)
        if ( (udg_CrystalGolemAlive == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            call KillUnit(udg_CrystalGolem)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crystal_Obelisks_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crystal_Obelisks_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Obelisks_dies, gg_unit_h01V_1500, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Obelisks_dies, gg_unit_h01V_1498, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Crystal_Obelisks_dies, gg_unit_h01V_1501, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crystal_Obelisks_dies, function Trig_Crystal_Obelisks_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Helping Dwarves in Cave Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[1]=gg_unit_h01J_1554
    set udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[2]=gg_unit_h01J_1557
    set udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[3]=gg_unit_h01L_1556
    set udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[4]=gg_unit_h01J_1560
    set udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[5]=gg_unit_h01J_1559
    set udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[6]=gg_unit_h01L_1558
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Ensnare\\ensnareTarget.mdl")
    set udg_SpecialEffect_Web[1]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Ensnare\\ensnareTarget.mdl")
    set udg_SpecialEffect_Web[2]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[3], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Ensnare\\ensnareTarget.mdl")
    set udg_SpecialEffect_Web[3]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[4], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Ensnare\\ensnareTarget.mdl")
    set udg_SpecialEffect_Web[4]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[5], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Ensnare\\ensnareTarget.mdl")
    set udg_SpecialEffect_Web[5]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[6], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Ensnare\\ensnareTarget.mdl")
    set udg_SpecialEffect_Web[6]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[1], UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.00)
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[2], UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.00)
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[3], UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.00)
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[4], UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.00)
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[5], UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.00)
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[6], UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Init, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Init, function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Helping Dwarves in Cave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func006002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func002002003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01L' )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func002002003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01J' )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01L'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01J')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01L'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h01J'))), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[1] )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[2] )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[3] )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[4] )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[5] )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[6] )
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(5), true)
    else
        call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
    endif
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.25)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_4430", GetEnumUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    if ( (GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[1]) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SpecialEffect_Web[1])
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[2]) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SpecialEffect_Web[2])
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[3]) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SpecialEffect_Web[3])
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[4]) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SpecialEffect_Web[4])
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[5]) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SpecialEffect_Web[5])
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetEnumUnit() == udg_Dwarf_Needing_Help[6]) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SpecialEffect_Web[6])
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(150.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, 120.00, gg_unit_h01J_1554)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, 120.00, gg_unit_h01J_1557)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, 120.00, gg_unit_h01L_1556)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, 120.00, gg_unit_h01J_1560)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, 120.00, gg_unit_h01J_1559)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, 120.00, gg_unit_h01L_1558)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, Condition(function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave, function Trig_Helping_Dwarves_in_Cave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Close the tunnels begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R01R' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R01E' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Close_the_tunnels_begins_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 50.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "stand work")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Close_the_tunnels_begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_begins, Condition(function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_begins, function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Close the tunnels cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_cancels_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R01R' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetResearched() == 'R01E' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Close_the_tunnels_cancels_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Close_the_tunnels_cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_cancels, Condition(function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_cancels, function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Close the tunnels finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_finishes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_finishes_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Close_the_tunnels_finishes_Func001C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0583, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\NeutralBuildingExplosion\\NeutralBuildingExplosion.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0471, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\NeutralBuildingExplosion\\NeutralBuildingExplosion.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call ShowDestructableBJ(true, gg_dest_LTrc_8266)
        call ShowDestructableBJ(true, gg_dest_LTrc_8252)
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00B_0583)
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00B_0471)
        call DisplayTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[5], "TRIGSTR_6888")
        call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'XOmr', gg_rct_Dwarf_Tunnel_North_01)
        call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'XOmr', gg_rct_Dwarf_Tunnel_North_02)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Close_the_tunnels_finishes_Func002C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_1243, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\NeutralBuildingExplosion\\NeutralBuildingExplosion.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00B_0517, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\NeutralBuildingExplosion\\NeutralBuildingExplosion.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call ShowDestructableBJ(true, gg_dest_LTrc_8265)
        call ShowDestructableBJ(true, gg_dest_LTrc_8255)
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00B_1243)
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00B_0517)
        call DisplayTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[5], "TRIGSTR_2002")
        call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'XOmr', gg_rct_Dwarf_Tunnel_South_01)
        call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'XOmr', gg_rct_Dwarf_Tunnel_South_02)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Close_the_tunnels_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Close_the_tunnels_finishes, function Trig_Close_the_tunnels_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spiders spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spiders_spawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_u00C_0066) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_u00C_0066) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spiders_spawn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'nsgt')) < 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'nspb')) < 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'nspr')) < 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spiders_spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Spiders_spawn_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spiders_Spawn_in_Vault)
        set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h02Q_0226)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'nspr', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "patrol", udg_Point2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nspb', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "patrol", udg_Point2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call DisplayTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[5], "TRIGSTR_7242")
        call TriggerSleepAction(2)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spiders_Spawn_Tunnel)
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spiders_Tunnel_Patrol)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'nspr', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "patrol", udg_Point2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nspb', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "patrol", udg_Point2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Entering_Dwarven_Mines)
        set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spiders_Tunnel_Patrol)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'nspr', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "patrol", udg_Point2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'nspb', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "patrol", udg_Point2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spiders_spawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spiders_spawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spiders_spawn, Condition(function Trig_Spiders_spawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spiders_spawn, function Trig_Spiders_spawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Horor Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01J', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetDoodadAnimationBJ("death", 'ZZys', 128, GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_n00J_1555)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(gg_unit_n00J_1555, 100)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", gg_unit_n00J_1555, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Disenchant\\DisenchantSpecialArt.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func007C() ) then
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h02Q_0226, Player(5), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h00C_0231, Player(5), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h00C_0570, Player(5), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00J_1555, Player(5), true)
    else
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h02Q_0226, Player(7), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h00C_0231, Player(7), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h00C_0570, Player(7), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00J_1555, Player(7), true)
    endif
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h02Q_0226, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h00C_0231, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h00C_0570, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1408")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R01G', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func003002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Func013Func004A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancient_Horor_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancient_Horor_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Ancient_Horor_Dies, gg_unit_u00C_0066, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ancient_Horor_Dies, function Trig_Ancient_Horor_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Vault_Death_Func003Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Vault_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n00J', false, Player(5))
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6250")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R01G', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Vault_Death_Func003Func003002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Vault_Death_Func003Func004A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Vault_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Vault_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Vault_Death, gg_unit_h02Q_0226, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vault_Death, function Trig_Vault_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Northwall Pass Anti Death Knight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Caster, GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Func001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n00K' )
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Func001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight, GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n00K'), (RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight, GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Func001002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Func002002)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 200.00 ))
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight, Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight_Actions)
endfunction

        return false

    return true

function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func003002)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(0, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
        if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func002002002))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func003002)
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        else
            if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func002002002))
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func003002)
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(2, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            else
                if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002002002))
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003002)
                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(3, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001002002))
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002002)
                        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(4, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func002Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func002Func003002)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(300, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func003Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func003Func003002)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(300, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func004Func001002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func004Func002002)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func005Func001002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func005Func002002)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(50, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func006Func001002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Func006Func002002)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(100, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch, Condition(function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch, function Trig_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Glitch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rifleman unlock
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rifleman_unlock_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetResearched() == 'R014' )
endfunction

function Trig_Rifleman_unlock_Func004002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(5) )
endfunction

function Trig_Rifleman_unlock_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetResearched() == 'R014'), (GetTriggerPlayer() == Player(5))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rifleman_unlock_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_RiflemanWarcry1)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6320")
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02H', 10, Player(5))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rifleman_unlock takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rifleman_unlock=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Rifleman_unlock, Player(5), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Rifleman_unlock, Condition(function Trig_Rifleman_unlock_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rifleman_unlock, function Trig_Rifleman_unlock_Actions)
endfunction
