function Trig_Dwarven_Armory_dies_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Armory_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Dwarven_Armory_dies_Func001Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Dwarven_Armory_dies_Func001Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dwarven_Armory_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dwarven_Armory_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Dwarven_Armory_dies, gg_unit_h01Y_0968, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Dwarven_Armory_dies, gg_unit_h01Y_0937, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dwarven_Armory_dies, function Trig_Dwarven_Armory_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Statues of Coal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnteringUnit(), Player(20)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Coal_Statues_Back)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], udg_Point, 3.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00G_0009, "morph")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00G_0014, "morph")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.50)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00G_0009, Player(20), true)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_n00G_0014, Player(20), true)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(gg_unit_n00G_0009, 'n00A', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(gg_unit_n00G_0014, 'n00A', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM)
    call DisplayTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], "TRIGSTR_6791")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Statues_of_Coal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal, gg_rct_Activate_Coal_Statues)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal, Condition(function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal, function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Statues of Coal Contains
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Contains_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( 'n00A' == GetUnitTypeId(GetEnteringUnit()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Contains_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Coal_Statues_Back)
    set udg_Point2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Activate_Coal_Statues)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point, udg_Point2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Statues_of_Coal_Contains takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal_Contains=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal_Contains, gg_rct_Activate_Coal_Statues)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal_Contains, Condition(function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Contains_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Statues_of_Coal_Contains, function Trig_Statues_of_Coal_Contains_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Protector Ghost revive
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Protector_Ghost_revive_Func003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_Ghost_revive_Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Protector_Ghost=GetEnumUnit()
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_Ghost_revive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Coal_defense)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point, true)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(20), Condition(function Trig_Protector_Ghost_revive_Func003002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Protector_Ghost_revive_Func004002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_Protector_Ghost, 100, 100, 100, 50.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_Protector_Ghost, true)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A05N', udg_Protector_Ghost)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Protector_Ghost, "corporealform")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A05N', udg_Protector_Ghost)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_Protector_Ghost, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Protector_Ghost_revive takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Protector_Ghost_revive=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Protector_Ghost_revive, function Trig_Protector_Ghost_revive_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: SanctumCorrection
//===========================================================================

    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_MageSanctumGreySpawn)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTrainedUnit(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Combat Training
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Combat_Training_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R030' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Combat_Training_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R030', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Combat_Training_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R030', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Combat_Training_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R030', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Combat_Training_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Combat_Training_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R036', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R036', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Combat_Training_Func002C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R036', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R036', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Combat_Training_Func003C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R036', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R036', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Combat_Training takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Combat_Training=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Combat_Training, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Combat_Training, Condition(function Trig_Combat_Training_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Combat_Training, function Trig_Combat_Training_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tier Abilities
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tier_Abilities_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R031' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tier_Abilities_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R031', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tier_Abilities_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R031', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tier_Abilities_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R031', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tier_Abilities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Tier_Abilities_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Tier=1
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A8', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 2)
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A9', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 2)
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AG', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10], 2)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A4', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A1', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09Z', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A3', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=14
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( "Dawnfall Guardians | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ))
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Tier_Abilities_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Tier=2
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09Z', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A3', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A0', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09X', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=14
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( "Dawnfall Guardians | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ))
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Tier_Abilities_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Tier=3
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A0', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09X', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09W', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A2', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=14
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( "Dawnfall Guardians | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ))
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tier_Abilities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tier_Abilities=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Tier_Abilities, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Tier_Abilities, Condition(function Trig_Tier_Abilities_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tier_Abilities, function Trig_Tier_Abilities_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Good Relations
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Good_Relations_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R038' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Good_Relations_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Jorgen_The_Engineer)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H065', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, 135.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Awaken\\Awaken.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13], 5, false)
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13])
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[13]=0
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gandulf_Palpatine)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H016', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, 135.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Awaken\\Awaken.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14], 5, false)
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14])
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[14]=0
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dawnfall_Altar)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], udg_Point, 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], 10.00, "TRIGSTR_5623")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Good_Relations takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Good_Relations=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Good_Relations, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Good_Relations, Condition(function Trig_Good_Relations_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Good_Relations, function Trig_Good_Relations_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Orders 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Orders_01_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AD' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AC' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AE' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Orders_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Orders_01_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Orders_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Orders_Launched=true
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Orders_Timer, false, 140.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Orders_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Orders_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Orders_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Orders_01, Condition(function Trig_Orders_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Orders_01, function Trig_Orders_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Orders 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Orders_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Orders_Launched=false
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AF', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AB', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Orders_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Orders_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Orders_02, udg_Orders_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Orders_02, function Trig_Orders_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dawnfall Guardians Cooldowns fixed 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AR' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AP' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AS' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AA' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AU' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AV' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AZ' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AY' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Fire_Slam_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Fire_Slam_Timer, false, 120.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Fire_Flask_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Fire_Flask_Timer, false, 60.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Multishot_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Multishot_Timer, false, 140.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Dawnfall_Strength_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Dawnfall_Strength_Timer, false, 100.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Taunt_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Taunt_Timer, false, 180.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Shield_Bash_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Shield_Bash_Timer, false, 140.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Marks_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Marks_Timer, false, 120.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Power_Shot_Launched=true
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Power_Shot_Timer, false, 160.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01, function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dawnfall Guardians Cooldowns fixed 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func001Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Fire_Slam_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func001Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Fire_Flask_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func001Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Multishot_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00O' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A5' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func002Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Dawnfall_Strength_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Y' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func002Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Taunt_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Shield_Bash_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Marks_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Power_Shot_Launched == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A6' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A7' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0B2' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0B1' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func001C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.33)
        if ( (udg_Fire_Slam_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], 'A0AR', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Fire_Slam_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_Fire_Flask_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], 'A0AP', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Fire_Flask_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_Multishot_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], 'A0AS', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Multishot_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func002C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.33)
        if ( (udg_Dawnfall_Strength_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 'A0AA', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Dawnfall_Strength_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Func003C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.33)
        if ( (udg_Taunt_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 'A0AU', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Taunt_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_Shield_Bash_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 'A0AV', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Shield_Bash_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_Marks_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 'A0AZ', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Marks_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (udg_Power_Shot_Launched == true) ) then // INLINED!!
            call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 'A0AY', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Power_Shot_Timer))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02, function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dawnfall Guardians Cooldowns fixed 03
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Fire_Slam_Launched=false
        set udg_Fire_Flask_Launched=false
        set udg_Multishot_Launched=false
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Dawnfall_Strength_Launched=false
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Taunt_Launched=false
        set udg_Shield_Bash_Launched=false
        set udg_Marks_Launched=false
        set udg_Power_Shot_Launched=false
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03, function Trig_Dawnfall_Guardians_Cooldowns_fixed_03_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Explosive Arrows
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'H068' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'H03N' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R031', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AT', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func002Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIfb\\AIfbSpecialArt.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetEnumUnit(), I2R(udg_Integer_Explosive_Arrows), ATTACK_TYPE_PIERCE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_Point_Explosive_Arrows=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    set udg_Integer_Explosive_Arrows=( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetAttacker(), 0) / 2 )
    set udg_Group_Units_Explosive_Arrows=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(150.00, udg_Point_Explosive_Arrows, Condition(function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func005002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Group_Units_Explosive_Arrows, function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Group_Units_Explosive_Arrows)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Explosive_Arrows)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Explosive_Arrows takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Explosive_Arrows=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Explosive_Arrows, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Explosive_Arrows, Condition(function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Explosive_Arrows, function Trig_Explosive_Arrows_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Leopold Faithgiver Ability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Y' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_LeopoldFaithgiver_Melee == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Orders_Launched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
    if ( (udg_LeopoldFaithgiver_Melee == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_LeopoldFaithgiver_Melee=false
    else
        set udg_LeopoldFaithgiver_Melee=true
    endif
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6]=GetTriggerUnit()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Simple Cape.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], ( "Dawnfall Guardian | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[6]) ))
    if ( Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Func008C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AB', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AF', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
        call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 'A0AF', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Orders_Timer))
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], "channel")
    else
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AB', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AB', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability, Condition(function Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability, function Trig_Leopold_Faithgiver_Ability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pyrokar Lightbringer Ability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00O' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A5' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability_Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_PyrokarLightbringer_Melee == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
    if ( (udg_PyrokarLightbringer_Melee == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_PyrokarLightbringer_Melee=false
    else
        set udg_PyrokarLightbringer_Melee=true
    endif
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11]=GetTriggerUnit()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Simple Cape.mdx")
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], ( "Dawnfall Guardian | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[11]) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability, Condition(function Trig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability, function Trig_Pyrokar_Lightbringer_Ability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Corvin The Bull Ability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A6' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A7' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability_Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
    if ( (udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee=false
    else
        set udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee=true
    endif
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12]=GetTriggerUnit()
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], ( "Dawnfall Guardian | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[12]) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability, Condition(function Trig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability, function Trig_Corvin_The_Bull_Ability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bow And Sword Dawnfall Guardians
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0BL' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0BM' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians_Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'H03T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
    if ( (udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee=false
    else
        set udg_CorvinTheBull_Melee=true
    endif
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12]=GetTriggerUnit()
    call SetUnitColor(GetTriggerUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], ( "Dawnfall Guardian | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[12]) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians, Condition(function Trig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians, function Trig_Bow_And_Sword_Dawnfall_Guardians_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger:  Undead Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig__Undead_Red_Func041001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func041001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H017' )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func041001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H017')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h002', Player(0)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(0), Condition(function Trig__Undead_Red_Func041001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func018Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func030C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func036Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func036Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig__Undead_Red_Func036Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func036A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig__Undead_Red_Func036Func001C() ) then
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func037001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(0))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig__Undead_Red_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(0), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(0), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(0), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig__Undead_Red_Func018Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Red)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04H', Player(0), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroRed01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[38]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[38]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[38])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[38], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[38]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Red, udg_UndeadHeroRed01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig__Undead_Red_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[38])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Red_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(0), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig__Undead_Red_Func036A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig__Undead_Red takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg__Undead_Red=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg__Undead_Red, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg__Undead_Red, Condition(function Trig__Undead_Red_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg__Undead_Red, function Trig__Undead_Red_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(1), Condition(function Trig__Undead_Blue_Func041001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif

    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Blue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(1))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig__Undead_Blue_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(1), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(1), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(1), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[1], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[1], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig__Undead_Blue_Func018Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Blue)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04J', Player(1), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroBlue01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[39]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[39]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[39])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[39], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[39]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Blue, udg_UndeadHeroBlue01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig__Undead_Blue_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[39])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Blue_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(1), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig__Undead_Blue_Func036A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger:  Undead Teal
//===========================================================================
function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041Func002001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041Func002001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07J', udg_Unit_ElendarKing) == 0 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_ElendarKingResurrecting == false ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h008', Player(2)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(2), Condition(function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041Func002001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig__Undead_Teal_Func041C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func018Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func031C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func037Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func037Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig__Undead_Teal_Func037Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func037A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig__Undead_Teal_Func037Func001C() ) then
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func040001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Teal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(2)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(2))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(2), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(2), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(2), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[2], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[2], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig__Undead_Teal_Func018Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Teal)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dark_Green_Hero_Revive)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04X', Player(2), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroTeal01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[40]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[40]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[40])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[40], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[40]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Teal, udg_UndeadHeroTeal01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig__Undead_Teal_Func031C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[40])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Teal_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(2), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig__Undead_Teal_Func037A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig__Undead_Teal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg__Undead_Teal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg__Undead_Teal, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg__Undead_Teal, Condition(function Trig__Undead_Teal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg__Undead_Teal, function Trig__Undead_Teal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger:  Undead Purple
//===========================================================================
function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func041001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func041001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H019' )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func041001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H019')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h009', Player(3)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(3), Condition(function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func041001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func018Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func030C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func036Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func036Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig__Undead_Purple_Func036Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func036A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig__Undead_Purple_Func036Func001C() ) then
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func037001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Purple_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(3)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(3))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(3), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(3), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(3), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[3], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[3], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig__Undead_Purple_Func018Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Purple)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04G', Player(3), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroPurple01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[41]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[41]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[41])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[41], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[41]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Purple, udg_UndeadHeroPurple01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig__Undead_Purple_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[41])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Purple_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(3), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig__Undead_Purple_Func036A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig__Undead_Purple takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg__Undead_Purple=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg__Undead_Purple, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg__Undead_Purple, Condition(function Trig__Undead_Purple_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg__Undead_Purple, function Trig__Undead_Purple_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Yellow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(4)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(4))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig__Undead_Yellow_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(4), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(4), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(4), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[4], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[4], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig__Undead_Yellow_Func018Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Yellow)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dark_Green_Hero_Revive)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04I', Player(4), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroYellow01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[42]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[42]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[42])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[42], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[42]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Yellow, udg_UndeadHeroYellow01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig__Undead_Yellow_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[42])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(4), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig__Undead_Yellow_Func036A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction
