//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Orange
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func042001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func042001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H01P' )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func042001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H01P')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h01I', Player(5)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(5), Condition(function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func042001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func031C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func037Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func037A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Undead_Orange_Func037Func001C() ) then
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func040001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Orange_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(5)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(5))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(5), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(5), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[5], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[5], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Orange)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_Ready)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Crystal_Golem_dies)
    call KillUnit(udg_CrystalGolem)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Undead_Orange_Func019Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Green_spawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H01U', Player(5), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroOrange01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[43]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[43]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[43])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[43], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[43]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Orange, udg_UndeadHeroOrange01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig_Undead_Orange_Func031C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[43])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Orange_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(5), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig_Undead_Orange_Func037A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Orange takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Orange=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Undead_Orange, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Orange, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Orange_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Orange, function Trig_Undead_Orange_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger:  Undead Grey
//===========================================================================
function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func041001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func041001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H01O' )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func041001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'H01O')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h00B', Player(8)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func041001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func018Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func030C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func036Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func036Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig__Undead_Grey_Func036Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func036A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig__Undead_Grey_Func036Func001C() ) then
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func037001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Grey_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(8)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(8))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(8), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(8), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(8), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[8], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[8], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(8), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(8), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig__Undead_Grey_Func018Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Grey)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04F', Player(8), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroGrey01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[44]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[44]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[44])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[44], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[44]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Grey, udg_UndeadHeroGrey01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig__Undead_Grey_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[44])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Grey_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(8), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig__Undead_Grey_Func036A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig__Undead_Grey takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg__Undead_Grey=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg__Undead_Grey, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg__Undead_Grey, Condition(function Trig__Undead_Grey_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg__Undead_Grey, function Trig__Undead_Grey_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig__Undead_Light_blue_Func041001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    endif

        return true
    endif

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false

    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then

    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig__Undead_Light_blue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CreepAggroWhat1)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(Player(9)) + " |cffff0000joined the Zombies!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(9))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig__Undead_Light_blue_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(9), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(9), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(9), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[9], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[9], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(9), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(9), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig__Undead_Light_blue_Func018Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dark_Green_Hero_Revive)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04K', Player(9), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroLightBlue01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[45]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[45]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[45])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[45], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[45]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Light_Blue, udg_UndeadHeroLightBlue01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig__Undead_Light_blue_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[45])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', Player(9), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue)
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig__Undead_Light_blue_Func036A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dawnfall Hold destruction
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Protector_Ghost != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Protector) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func022Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func035C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func037Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func037Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func037Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func037A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func037Func001C() ) then
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func039001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func040001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Protector_Ghost_revive)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Protector_Ghost)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_QuestFailed)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_7730")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(20))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func009A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(20), udg_UndeadPlayers)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(20), udg_HumanPlayers)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(20), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(20), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(20), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func022Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
            call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Coal)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04L', Player(20), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_UndeadHeroCoal01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Unit_Hero[46]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Name_Hero[46]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Coal, udg_UndeadHeroCoal01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set udg_ResurrectionPointTyrial=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func035C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[46])
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Func037A)
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction, gg_unit_h015_0207, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction, Condition(function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction, function Trig_Dawnfall_Hold_destruction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Protector dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func026A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(7), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func039Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func052C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func054Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetEnumPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func054Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func054Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func054A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func054Func001C() ) then
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(GetEnumPlayer())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func055001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func056001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func057001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h015_0207) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protector_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Integer=GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\Soul Discharge Blue.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_Protector_dies_Func007C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Protector_Ghost_revive)
        call RemoveUnit(udg_Protector_Ghost)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_7742")
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(20))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func026A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(20), udg_UndeadPlayers)
        call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(Player(20), udg_HumanPlayers)
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(7), Player(20), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_HumanPlayers, udg_UndeadPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call SetForceAllianceStateBJ(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_HumanPlayers, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(7))
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(20), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(20), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func039Func001C() ) then
                call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll on", true)
                call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_No_friendly_attacks_Commands_Undeads, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], "-troll off", true)
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Coal)
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H04L', Player(20), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_UndeadHeroCoal01=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Unit_Hero[46]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_Name_Hero[46]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46])
        call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
        call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Servant_Coal, udg_UndeadHeroCoal01, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_RegularServantsLevel, false)
        set udg_ResurrectionPointTyrial=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        if ( Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func052C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', udg_Unit_Hero[46])
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call ForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, function Trig_Protector_dies_Func007Func054A)
        if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(10)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(12))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(11)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(13))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING) ) then // INLINED!!
            call ShareEverythingWithTeam(Player(14))
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_QuestFailed)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_7732")
        set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Coal_defense)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H042', Player(20), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Protector_Ghost=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Protector_Ghost, udg_Integer, false)
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_Protector_Ghost, 100, 100, 100, 50.00)
        call PingMinimapLocForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[20], udg_Point, 3.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Coal)
        call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Protector_Ghost_revive, udg_Protector_Ghost, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_Protector_Ghost, true)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A05N', udg_Protector_Ghost)
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Protector_Ghost, "corporealform")
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A05N', udg_Protector_Ghost)
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_Protector_Ghost, false)
        call SetUnitPathing(udg_Protector_Ghost, false)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Protector_Resurrection)
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_h046_0941, "stand work")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Protector_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Protector_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Protector_dies, gg_unit_H014_0206, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Protector_dies, function Trig_Protector_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Corpse Storage Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func016002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func016002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func016002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h002_0461) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Red_2))
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func014Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true )

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func014Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func014Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func014Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func014Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Red)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(0), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Red)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(0), udg_Point, 205.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(0)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Red_2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Red_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Corpse Storage Blue
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func016002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func016002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h00P_0294) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Blue_2))

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Blue)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(1), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Blue)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(1), udg_Point, 70.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Blue_2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Blue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Corpse Storage Teal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func016002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func016002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func016002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h008_0223) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Teal_2))
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func014Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Teal)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(2), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Teal)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(2), udg_Point, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(2)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Teal_2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Teal_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) )

    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h009_0538) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Purple)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(3), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Purple)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(3), udg_Point, 205.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(3)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Purple_2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Purple_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Corpse Storage Yellow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func016002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func016002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func016002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h007_0211) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_2))
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func014Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true )

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Yellow)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(4), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Yellow)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(4), udg_Point, 205.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(4)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_2)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Yellow_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif

        return false
