function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Orange)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(5), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Orange)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(5), udg_Point, 205.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(5)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Orange_2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Orange_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Corpse Storage Grey
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func016002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func016002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func016002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h00B_0976) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Grey_2))
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func014Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Grey)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Grey)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(8), udg_Point, 295.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(8)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Grey_2)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Grey_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10)), (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6))))) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_h004_0354) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00H') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00S') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(350, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00I') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00G') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(750, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B027') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B00E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1250, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01V') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(800, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B029') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(900, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02D') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02A') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1100, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02B') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1200, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02C') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1300, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B028') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1400, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02E') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1500, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B02F') == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1600, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'n00W')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'usep', Player(9), udg_Point, 205.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, ( GetPlayerName(Player(9)) + " |cffff0000has now a Corpse Storage where his capital was standing!|r" ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED, 0)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func002002002))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Func014Func003A)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_FOOD_CAP_CEILING, GetPlayerState(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_FOOD_USED))
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue, gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue, function Trig_Summon_Corpse_Storage_Light_Blue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero die and give soul
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h00R_0297 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h00A_0399 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h003_0045 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h008_0223 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h00I_0975 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h015_0207 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func003Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h01I_1483 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h004_0354 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h007_0211 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h009_0538 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h002_0461 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h00B_0976 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h00P_0294 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func004Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func003C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1, GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Func004C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(2, GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_die_and_give_soul takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_die_and_give_soul=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_die_and_give_soul, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_die_and_give_soul, Condition(function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_die_and_give_soul, function Trig_Hero_die_and_give_soul_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Event Ancient Horror
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Func017002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(6), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Func020002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(6), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Func023002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(6), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_u00C_0066, Player(6), true)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6426")
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ(gg_unit_u00C_0066, UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 0.00)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('ACtn', gg_unit_u00C_0066)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('ACfb', gg_unit_u00C_0066)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spiders_Spawn_in_Vault)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'nsgt', Player(6), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Ancient_Horror)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'nsgt', Player(6), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_nfgt_0639, Player(6), true)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_nfgt_0614, Player(6), true)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_nfgt_0637, Player(6), true)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'nspr')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Func017002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'nspb')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Func020002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'nsgt')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Func023002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror, function Trig_Undead_Event_Ancient_Horror_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Event Portal Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins, function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel, function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_Cancel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Event Portal End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00J', 0, Player(11))
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_9491")
    call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00H_0828)
    call WaygateActivateBJ(true, gg_unit_n00H_0826)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00H_0828, "stand")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00H_0826, "stand")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Portal_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_End, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_End, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Portal_End, function Trig_Undead_Event_Portal_End_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel, function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_Cancel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Event Add 5 minutes End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 0, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 0, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01M', 0, Player(11))
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_HumansWin)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_HumansWinwindow)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_HumansWin, false, ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_HumansWin) + 300.00 ))
    set udg_HumansWin=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_HumansWin, "TRIGSTR_6429")
    set udg_HumansWinwindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_HumansWinwindow)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6430")
    // ---------------------------------------
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_DarkGuards_Timer)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_DarkGuards_Timer, false, ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_DarkGuards_Timer) + 300.00 ))
    set udg_DarkGuards_Timer=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_DarkGuards_Timer, "TRIGSTR_1857")
    set udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_DarkGuards_TimerWindow)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End, function Trig_Undead_Event_Add_5_minutes_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Event Rebuild Bridges End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT06_0002) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT10_0059) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT09_5946) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT06_2418) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01L', 0, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01L', 0, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01L', 0, Player(11))
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6432")
    if ( (IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT06_0002) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_LT06_0002, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_LT06_0002), true)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT10_0059) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_LT10_0059, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_LT10_0059), true)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT09_5946) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_LT09_5946, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_LT09_5946), true)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (IsDestructableDeadBJ(gg_dest_LT06_2418) == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_LT06_2418, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_LT06_2418), true)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_LT04_13465, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_LT04_13465), false)
    call RemoveDestructable(gg_dest_YSdb_0111)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End, function Trig_Undead_Event_Rebuild_Bridges_End_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Undead Event Graveyard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Graveyard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Graveyard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Graveyard_Event)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00K', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'uske', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'uskm', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_Point, 3.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Event Infected Rats End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Infected_Rats_End_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Infected_Rats_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01B', 0, Player(6))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01B', 0, Player(10))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01B', 0, Player(11))
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6876")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Grey_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(6), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_RedCapital)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Blue_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(11), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Purple_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Yellow_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Light_Blue_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Undead_Dwarves)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(6), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Teal_Army)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00D', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1983")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South_East)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_North_East)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D02F', gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South_North_West)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South)
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n000', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n004', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n003', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n006', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South_East)
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n000', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n004', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n003', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n006', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_North_East)
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n000', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n004', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n003', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n006', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Red_Capital_Zombies_spawn_South_North_West)
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n000', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n004', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n003', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'n006', Player(10), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy, function Trig_Undead_Event_Powerful_Necromancy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Event Plague Coming from South
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R011' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2688")
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Barkshire_invasion)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'uktn', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'uaco', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'umtw', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'uabo', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n000', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n005', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n004', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 4) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n003', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_ZombieEvolution == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n006', Player(10), udg_Point, 0.00)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South, function Trig_Undead_Event_Plague_Coming_from_South_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skip Dragon Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] == GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer >= ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=true
            set udg_Integer=( udg_Integer + 1 )
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 3.00, ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + ( " wants to skip the cinematic (" + ( I2S(udg_Integer) + ( "/" + ( I2S(( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 )) + ")." ) ) ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_SkipCinematic=true
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DestroyTimer(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1663")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(0))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(1))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(2))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(3))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(4))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(5))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(8))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(9))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(10))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, Player(11))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic, function Trig_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon Activation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_Activation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I000') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Activation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, "TRIGSTR_4977")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_DragonShine)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_Activation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_Activation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dragon_Activation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragon_Activation, Condition(function Trig_Dragon_Activation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragon_Activation, function Trig_Dragon_Activation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ping DragonShine
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ping_DragonShine_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_ncp2_0400)
    call PingMinimapLocForForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, udg_Point, 20.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ping_DragonShine takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ping_DragonShine=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_DragonShine)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Ping_DragonShine, 60.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ping_DragonShine, function Trig_Ping_DragonShine_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Obtains dragonfire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Obtains_dragonfire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetManipulatingUnit()) == 'U008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'ofir' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Obtains_dragonfire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveItem(GetManipulatedItem())
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02Y', GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5346")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Obtains_dragonfire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Obtains_dragonfire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Obtains_dragonfire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Obtains_dragonfire, Condition(function Trig_Obtains_dragonfire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Obtains_dragonfire, function Trig_Obtains_dragonfire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I000') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( udg_SkipCinematic == true )

endfunction

    call GroupAddGroup(udg_GroupUnits, udg_DragonKingGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit(), 150.00)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_Point)
endfunction

        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction
