function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func138C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CrystalGolemAlive == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PrideOfTheDwarves == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func139C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PortalsAreClosing == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ncp2_0400)
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I000'))
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(gg_unit_n001_0398, 'U008', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM)
    call SetUnitOwner(GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), Player(11), true)
    set udg_Unit_Hero[36]=GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
    set udg_Name_Hero[36]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[36])
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[36], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[36]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    set udg_Dragon=GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Dragon, "Spell Ready")
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ping_DragonShine)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic)
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon, false, 41.00)
    set udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_HumansWin)
    if ( (udg_PortalsAreClosing == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_PortalDestroy)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Dragon_King_Region)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func025A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Veleron, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "TRIGSTR_5012", gg_snd_Vuleron01Fire, "TRIGSTR_5013", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 10.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Dark_Lords, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 10.50 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dragon_cinematic_starts)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetEnteringUnit(), "spell")
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 12.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_FaerieFireLaunch1)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dragon_cinematic_starts)
    call CreateItemLoc('I000', udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetEnteringUnit())
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Dragon)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 12.50 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Veleron, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "TRIGSTR_5016", gg_snd_Vuleron02Fire, "TRIGSTR_5017", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 23.10 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Dark_Lords, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetEnteringUnit(), "spell")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_FlashBack1Second)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 24.60 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    // DRAGON KING DEATH CINEMATIC BEGINS
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 26.40 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetEnteringUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Dragon_King_Cam_1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Dragon_King_Region_Group_1)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dragon_King_Region_Movement)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func064A)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 26.90 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 27.40 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00W_1413, "TRIGSTR_7911", gg_snd_KnightWarcry1, "TRIGSTR_7912", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 29.40 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 30.40 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Dragon_King_Cam_2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DragonKingGroup, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func079002)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Dragon_King_Region_Group_2)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_H01H_1367, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(gg_unit_H01H_1367, 150.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_H01H_1367, "attack", gg_unit_H00W_1368)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func085A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 30.90 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00W_1368, "TRIGSTR_7913", gg_snd_KnightYesAttack3, "TRIGSTR_7914", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 32.90 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 100.00, 0, 0, 0)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 33.90 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_MetalHeavySliceFlesh3)
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_H01H_1367)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 100.00, 0, 0, 0)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetRandomSubGroup(3, udg_DragonKingGroup), function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func098002)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Dragon_King_Cam_3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 36.90 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call IssueTargetItemOrder(gg_unit_H00W_1368, "smart", gg_item_I000_1349)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_H00W_1368, "TRIGSTR_7915", gg_snd_KnightYesAttack1, "TRIGSTR_7916", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Dragon_King_Cam_4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 39.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0.00, 0, 0, 0)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 40.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DragonKingGroup, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func110002)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0.00, 0, 0, 0)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_ManaShieldCaster1)
    // DRAGON KING DEATH CINEMATIC ENDS
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Veleron, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon) - 41.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), "TRIGSTR_5020", gg_snd_Vuleron03Fire, "TRIGSTR_5021", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_Dragon_cinematic_starts, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func121002)
    call ResumeMusicBJ()
    set udg_Integer=0
    set udg_SkipCinematic=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Skip_Dragon_Cinematic)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DestroyTimer(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Dragon)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1348")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Dragon, "TRIGSTR_1411", gg_snd_HeroFireLordWarcry1, "TRIGSTR_1412", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_HumansWin)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    set udg_Score_Total[11]=( udg_Score_Total[11] + 20.00 )
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func134C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Call_Of_Justice, udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
        set udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func134Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func135C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleport, udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleport_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func135Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func136C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleportation, udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func136Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func137C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Dark_Arrival, udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
        set udg_Dark_Arrival_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func137Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func138C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_CrystalGolem)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Func139C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_PortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic, gg_rct_Dragon_cinematic_starts)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic, Condition(function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon Cinematic skipped
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SkipCinematic == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I000' )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I000') ) then // INLINED!!
        call RemoveItem(GetEnumItem())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func014Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func015Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleport_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func016Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func017Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Dark_Arrival_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CrystalGolemAlive == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PrideOfTheDwarves == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PortalsAreClosing == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Veleron, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0.00)
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_Dragon_cinematic_starts, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func003002)
    call ResumeMusicBJ()
    set udg_Integer=0
    set udg_SkipCinematic=false
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1420")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Dragon, "TRIGSTR_1421", gg_snd_HeroFireLordWarcry1, "TRIGSTR_1422", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_HumansWin)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    set udg_Score_Total[11]=( udg_Score_Total[11] + 20.00 )
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func014C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Call_Of_Justice, udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
        set udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func014Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func015C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleport, udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleport_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func015Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func016C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleportation, udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func016Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func017C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Dark_Arrival, udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
        set udg_Dark_Arrival_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func017Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func018C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_CrystalGolem)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Func019C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_PortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped, Condition(function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped, function Trig_Dragon_Cinematic_skipped_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skip Necromancer Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] == GetTriggerPlayer() ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer >= ( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=true
            set udg_Integer=( udg_Integer + 1 )
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 3.00, ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + ( " wants to skip the cinematic (" + ( I2S(udg_Integer) + ( "/" + ( I2S(( udg_NumberOfPlayers / 2 )) + ")." ) ) ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_SkipCinematic=true
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DestroyTimer(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1664")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(0))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(1))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(2))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(3))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(4))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(5))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(8))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(9))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(10))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, Player(11))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic, function Trig_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Nobody in Necromancer Cave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_HumanPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necromancer_Cave_Back)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave, gg_rct_Necromancer_Cave)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave, Condition(function Trig_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave, function Trig_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Great Necromancer Gate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Gate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(GetEnteringUnit(), GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I00M')) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Gate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ncp2_1944)
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetEnteringUnit(), 'I00M'))
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4989")
    set udg_Point=GetDestructableLoc(gg_dest_B003_3978)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_B003_3978)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Nobody_in_Necromancer_Cave)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Great_Necromancer_Gate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Gate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Gate, gg_rct_Necromancer_Gate)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Gate, Condition(function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Gate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Gate, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Gate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Great Necromancer Obelisks
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(GetEnteringUnit(), Player(10)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call UnitShareVisionBJ(true, gg_unit_n00M_0943, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call UnitShareVisionBJ(true, gg_unit_n00M_0944, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00M_0943)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00M_0944)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00M_0943, "stand work")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00M_0944, "stand work")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\VampiricAura\\VampiricAura.mdl")
    set udg_SpecialEffectVampiricAura=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00M_0943)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Darksummoning\\DarkSummonTarget.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00M_0944)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Darksummoning\\DarkSummonTarget.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_Point=GetDestructableLoc(gg_dest_B001_12508)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "spell")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_B001_12508)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SpecialEffectVampiricAura)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00M_0943, "stand")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_n00M_0944, "stand")
    call UnitShareVisionBJ(false, gg_unit_n00M_0943, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call UnitShareVisionBJ(false, gg_unit_n00M_0944, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks, gg_rct_Necromancers_Obelisks)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks, Condition(function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Obelisks_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Great Necromancer Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(GetEnteringUnit(), Player(10)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_The_Great_Necromancer, GetEnumPlayer(), 0.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_PortalsAreClosing == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func021001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) - 4.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func022001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func024001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) - 12.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func028001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) - 22.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func030001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func035002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call ExplodeUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func050Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func050C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func051Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func051C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleport_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func052Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func052C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func053Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func053C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Dark_Arrival_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func054C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CrystalGolemAlive == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PrideOfTheDwarves == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func055C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PortalsAreClosing == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func006002)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer, false, 22.00)
    set udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer=GetLastCreatedTimerBJ()
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), gg_unit_Ulic_1139, 0.00)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_The_Great_Necromancer_Hero_position)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_HumansWin)
    if ( (udg_PortalsAreClosing == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_PortalDestroy)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_Ulic_1139, "TRIGSTR_4940", gg_snd_Lich01Reverb, "TRIGSTR_4941", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) - 4.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_Ulic_1139, "TRIGSTR_4946", gg_snd_Lich02Reverb, "TRIGSTR_4947", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) - 12.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Ulic_1139, "stand channel")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_Ulic_1139, "TRIGSTR_4948", gg_snd_Lich03Reverb, "TRIGSTR_4949", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    loop
        exitwhen ( (TimerGetRemaining(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) <= ( TimerGetTimeout(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer) - 22.00 )) ) // INLINED!!
        call TriggerSleepAction(RMaxBJ(bj_WAIT_FOR_COND_MIN_INTERVAL, 0.10))
    endloop
    call ResetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Ulic_1139)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic == true) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_Ulic_1139, Player(10), true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_Ulic_1139, false)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), 'ushd')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func035002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Gate)
    call ResumeMusicBJ()
    set udg_Integer=0
    set udg_SkipCinematic=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Skip_Necromancer_Cinematic)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DestroyTimer(udg_Timer_Cinematic_Necromancer)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1414")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_Ulic_1139, "TRIGSTR_1415", gg_snd_HeroLichReady1, "TRIGSTR_1416", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_HumansWin)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    if ( Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func050C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Call_Of_Justice, udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
        set udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func050Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func051C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleport, udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleport_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func051Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func052C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleportation, udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func052Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func053C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Dark_Arrival, udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
        set udg_Dark_Arrival_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func053Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func054C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_CrystalGolem)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Func055C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_PortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic, gg_rct_Necromancer_cinematic_starts)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic, Condition(function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic, function Trig_Great_Necromancer_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Necromancer cinematic skipped
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SkipCinematic == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call ExplodeUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func021Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func022Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleport_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func023Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func024Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func024C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Dark_Arrival_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CrystalGolemAlive == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PrideOfTheDwarves == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func026C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PortalsAreClosing == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), 'ushd')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func003002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_Ulic_1139, Player(10), true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_Ulic_1139, false)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Ulic_1139)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], 0)
        call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 0)
        call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, gg_rct_Abandonned_Chapel)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Great_Necromancer_Gate)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call ResumeMusicBJ()
    set udg_Integer=0
    set udg_SkipCinematic=false
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_PlayerVote[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1417")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_Ulic_1139, "TRIGSTR_1418", gg_snd_HeroLichReady1, "TRIGSTR_1419", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_HumansWin)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    set udg_Score_Total[10]=( udg_Score_Total[10] + 20.00 )
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func021C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Call_Of_Justice, udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
        set udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice, function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func021Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func022C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleport, udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleport_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport, function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func022Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleport)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleport_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func023C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Mass_Teleportation, udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
        set udg_Mass_Teleportation_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation, function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func023Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Mass_Teleportation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Mass_Teleportation_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func024C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Unit_Dark_Arrival, udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
        set udg_Dark_Arrival_ON=false
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival, function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func024Func003002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_01)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func025C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_CrystalGolem)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1500, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1498, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_h01V_1501, "drain", udg_CrystalGolem)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Func026C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_PortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_RedUnitPortalDestroy)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_BlueUnitPortalDestroy)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped, Condition(function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped, function Trig_Necromancer_cinematic_skipped_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dying Heroes Defenders
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Defenders_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Defenders_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetItemDroppableBJ(GetEnumItem(), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Defenders_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_Point, 100.00, 100.00), function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Defenders_Func002002)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetDyingUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dying_Heroes_Defenders takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Defenders=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Defenders, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Defenders, Condition(function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Defenders_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Defenders, function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Defenders_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dying Heroes Teal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Func001Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetItemDroppableBJ(GetEnumItem(), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H054' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07J', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_ElendarKingResurrecting == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Func001C() ) then
        call DoNothing()
    else
        set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call EnumItemsInRectBJ(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_Point, 100.00, 100.00), function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Func001Func006002)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dying_Heroes_Teal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Teal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Teal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Teal, Condition(function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Teal, function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Teal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dying_Heroes_Grey takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Grey=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Grey, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Grey, Condition(function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Grey_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Grey, function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Grey_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dying Heroes Light Blue
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetItemDroppableBJ(GetEnumItem(), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_Point, 100.00, 100.00), function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue_Func002002)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetDyingUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue, Condition(function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue, function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Light_Blue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dying Heroes Coal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Coal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(20) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Coal_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetItemDroppableBJ(GetEnumItem(), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Coal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_Point, 100.00, 100.00), function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Coal_Func002002)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetDyingUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dying_Heroes_Coal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Coal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Coal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Coal, Condition(function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Coal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dying_Heroes_Coal, function Trig_Dying_Heroes_Coal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 2 Zombie Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_Begins, function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 2 Zombie Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels, function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_Cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 2 Zombie finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_finishes_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h009_0538) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ZombieEvolution=2
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R000', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R000', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n000', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R023', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R024', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R025', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R026', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R027', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_420")
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_0552)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_0550)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_0551)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 15, 15)
    if ( Trig_Level_2_Zombie_finishes_Func010C() ) then
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_1023)
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n000', gg_unit_uubs_1020)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_2_Zombie_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_2_Zombie_finishes, function Trig_Level_2_Zombie_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

        return false

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_3_Zombie_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_3_Zombie_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_3_Zombie_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 3 Zombie finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func011002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func014002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func017002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func020002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func023002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func026002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func028C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h009_0538) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ZombieEvolution=3
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R001', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R001', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n005', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R023', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R024', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R025', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R026', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R027', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_482")
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_0552)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_0550)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_0551)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 15, 15)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(6), 'n000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func011002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(10), 'n000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func014002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(11), 'n000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func017002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func020002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func023002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func026002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Func028C() ) then
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_1023)
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n005', gg_unit_uubs_1020)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_3_Zombie_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_3_Zombie_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_3_Zombie_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_3_Zombie_finishes, function Trig_Level_3_Zombie_finishes_Actions)
endfunction
