//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 4 Zombie Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R003', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R003', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R003', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R003', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R003', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R003', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_Cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 4 Zombie finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func011002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func014002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func017002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func020002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func023002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func026002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func028C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h009_0538) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ZombieEvolution=4
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R003', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R003', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n004', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R023', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R024', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R025', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R026', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R027', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_481")
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_0552)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_0550)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_0551)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 15, 15)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(6), 'n005')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func011002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(10), 'n005')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func014002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(11), 'n005')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func017002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n005')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func020002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n005')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func023002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n005')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func026002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Func028C() ) then
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_1023)
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n004', gg_unit_uubs_1020)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_4_Zombie_finishes, function Trig_Level_4_Zombie_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 5 Zombie Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_Begins, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 5 Zombie Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func023002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func026002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func028C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(gg_unit_h009_0538) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ZombieEvolution=5
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R002', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R002', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n003', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R023', 4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R024', 4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R025', 4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R026', 4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R027', 4, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_544")
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_0552)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_0550)
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_0551)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n006', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n006', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 15, 15)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n006', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 15, 15)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(6), 'n004')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func011002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(10), 'n004')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func014002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(11), 'n004')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func017002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n004')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func020002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n004')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func023002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n004')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func026002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Func028C() ) then
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_1023)
        call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ('n003', gg_unit_uubs_1020)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n006', gg_unit_uubs_1023, 15, 15)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('n006', gg_unit_uubs_1020, 15, 15)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Level_5_Zombie_finishes, function Trig_Level_5_Zombie_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Day
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Day_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation_Night)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_DaybreakRooster)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2971")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Day takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Day=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterGameStateEventTimeOfDay(gg_trg_Day, EQUAL, 6.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Day, function Trig_Day_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Night
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Night_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation_Night)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_DuskWolf)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2972")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Night takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Night=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterGameStateEventTimeOfDay(gg_trg_Night, EQUAL, 18.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Night, function Trig_Night_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Infestation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetDyingUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != gg_unit_nvlk_0007 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13) )

    return GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13))) // INLINED!!

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6) )

endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(13) ) ) then

    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit())
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func003Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func004Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func005Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func006C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Func006Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Infestation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Infestation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation, function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Infestation Night
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetDyingUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != gg_unit_nvlk_0007 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func002Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func002Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func006Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(12) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(13) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != Player(14) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ZombieEvolution == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit())
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func002C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04N', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Empowered Zombie")
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0) + 10 ), 0)
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ))
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
        call BlzSetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2.00 ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func003C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func003Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04N', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Empowered Mutant Zombie")
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0) + 10 ), 0)
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ))
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
        call BlzSetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2.00 ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func004C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func004Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n004', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04N', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Empowered Infected Zombie")
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0) + 10 ), 0)
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ))
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
        call BlzSetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2.00 ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func005C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func005Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n003', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04N', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Empowered Crazy Ghoul")
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0) + 10 ), 0)
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ))
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
        call BlzSetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2.00 ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func006C() ) then
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(10)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(12)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', Player(12), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(11)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(13)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', Player(13), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( (GetBooleanOr((GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(6)), (GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(14)))) ) then // INLINED!!
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', Player(14), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        if ( Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Func006Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n006', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        else
        endif
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04N', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call BlzSetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Empowered Mutant")
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0) + 10 ), 0)
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ))
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100)
        call BlzSetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 2.00 ))
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Infestation_Night takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Infestation_Night=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation_Night)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation_Night, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation_Night, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Infestation_Night, function Trig_Undead_Infestation_Night_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dummy Zombie Player Dark Green Gold
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dummy_Zombie_Player_Dark_Green_Gold_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(Player(12), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(12), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dummy_Zombie_Player_Dark_Green_Gold takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dummy_Zombie_Player_Dark_Green_Gold=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerStateEvent(gg_trg_Dummy_Zombie_Player_Dark_Green_Gold, Player(12), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dummy_Zombie_Player_Dark_Green_Gold, function Trig_Dummy_Zombie_Player_Dark_Green_Gold_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(12), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Vampiric Hounds Research
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vampiric_Hounds_Research_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vampiric_Hounds_Research_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n00T', false, Player(10))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Vampiric_Hounds_Research takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Vampiric_Hounds_Research=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Vampiric_Hounds_Research, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Vampiric_Hounds_Research, Condition(function Trig_Vampiric_Hounds_Research_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vampiric_Hounds_Research, function Trig_Vampiric_Hounds_Research_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Nightmare Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nightmare_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nightmare_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Nightmare_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Nightmare_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Nightmare_Begins, function Trig_Nightmare_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Nightmare Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nightmare_Cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nightmare_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Nightmare_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Nightmare_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Nightmare_Cancels, function Trig_Nightmare_Cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Nightmare finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nightmare_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightmare_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00D', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R00D', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('u000', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 5, 5)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('u000', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 5, 5)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('u000', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 5, 5)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n00F', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 3, 3)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n00F', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 3, 3)
    call AddUnitToStockBJ('n00F', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 3, 3)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Nightmare|r!" ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nightmare_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nightmare_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Nightmare_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Nightmare_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Nightmare_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Nightmare_finishes, function Trig_Nightmare_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aura of Fear Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Begins, function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aura of Fear Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels, function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aura of Fear Finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func004002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func004002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func004002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'Ulic' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'U008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func005Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02S', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02S', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Aura of Fear|r!" ))
    set udg_AuraOfFearResearched=true
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func004002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes, Condition(function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes, function Trig_Aura_of_Fear_Finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Magic Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Magic_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Begins, function Trig_Dark_Magic_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Magic Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Magic_Cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_Cancels, function Trig_Dark_Magic_Cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Magic finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R00C', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Dark Ritual|r!" ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Func002C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00C', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R00C', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('u009', gg_unit_uubs_0552, 10, 10)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('u009', gg_unit_uubs_0550, 10, 10)
        call AddUnitToStockBJ('u009', gg_unit_uubs_0551, 10, 10)
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Dark Magic|r!" ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Magic_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Magic_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Magic_finishes, function Trig_Dark_Magic_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Damned_Training_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Damned_Training_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Damned Training Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Damned_Training_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Damned_Training_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Damned_Training_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Damned_Training_Cancels, function Trig_Damned_Training_Cancels_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Damned Training finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R00W', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Invincible Power|r!" ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Func002C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R00W', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R00W', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Damned Training|r!" ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Damned_Training_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Damned_Training_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Damned_Training_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Damned_Training_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Damned_Training_finishes, function Trig_Damned_Training_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

    endif

    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true

        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

        return false

    return true
endfunction

        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 1, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 1, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Cancels_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 1, Player(11))
    else

        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 1, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 1, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Flesh Giant Powerful Attack Finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02C', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02C', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('u000', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('u007', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Flesh Giant:Powerful Attack|r!" ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes, Condition(function Trig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes, function Trig_Flesh_Giant_Powerful_Attack_Finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R029' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Hound_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Begins_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Hound_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Death_Hound_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Begins_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R029', 0, Player(10))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R029', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Death_Hound_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Begins_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R029', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R029', 0, Player(11))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Death_Hound_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Begins_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R029', 0, Player(6))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R029', 0, Player(10))
    else
    endif
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Hound_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R029', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R029', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('nfel', false, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('n00T', true, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Death Hound:Powerful Mana Burn|r!" ))
endfunction

        return false

    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02B', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02B', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Heartless:Deadly Instinct|r!" ))
endfunction
