//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Power Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Func001Func001Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Func001Func001Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Func001Func001Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Func001Func001Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 0) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Power_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Power_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Power_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Power_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Power_Begins, function Trig_Undead_Power_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Power Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Power_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Power_Cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Power_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Power_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Power_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Power_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Power_Cancels, function Trig_Undead_Power_Cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Power finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func003Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08L', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02O', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02P', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Undead Power|r level 1!" ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func002C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02O', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02P', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Undead Power|r level 2!" ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func003C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02O', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02O', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02P', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Undead Power|r level 3!" ))
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('u00H')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Func003Func004002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Power_finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Power_finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Power_finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Power_finishes, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Power_finishes, function Trig_Undead_Power_finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Strength Begins
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Func001Func001Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Func001Func001Func002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Func001Func001Func003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Func001Func001Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 0) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Strength_Begins takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Begins=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Begins, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_START)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Begins, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Begins, function Trig_Undead_Strength_Begins_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Strength Cancels
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Strength_Cancels_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Cancels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 5, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Strength_Cancels takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Cancels=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Cancels, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_CANCEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Cancels, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Strength_Cancels_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Cancels, function Trig_Undead_Strength_Cancels_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Undead Strength Finishes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func003Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08M', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R02N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02N', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02Q', 1, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Undead Strength|r level 1!" ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func002C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02N', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02Q', 2, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Undead Strength|r level 2!" ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func003C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R02N', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02N', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R02Q', 3, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 10.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " researched |cffff0000Undead Strength|r level 3!" ))
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('u00H')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Func003Func004002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Undead_Strength_Finishes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Finishes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Finishes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Finishes, Condition(function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Undead_Strength_Finishes, function Trig_Undead_Strength_Finishes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Revive Cargul
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Revive_Cargul_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Revive_Cargul_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DoNothing()
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Green_spawn)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetDyingUnit(), udg_Point, true)
    call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown(GetDyingUnit(), 2.00, 1)
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A075', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A075', GetTriggerUnit())
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Lord_Strength_Effect)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig_Revive_Cargul_Func010C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Revive_Cargul takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Revive_Cargul=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Revive_Cargul, function Trig_Revive_Cargul_Actions)
endfunction

    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23

        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd

    endif
    return true

    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetDyingUnit(), udg_Point, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09R', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=0
    set udg_Unholy_Fire_On=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02)
    if ( Trig_Revive_Rakkash_Func010C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])

    endloop
endfunction

    set udg_Point=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Dark_Green_Hero_Revive)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetDyingUnit(), udg_Point, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    if ( Trig_Servant_Light_Blue_Func006C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Servant_Light_Blue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Servant_Light_Blue=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Servant_Light_Blue, function Trig_Servant_Light_Blue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Servant Coal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Servant_Coal_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AuraOfFearResearched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Servant_Coal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DoNothing()
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetDyingUnit(), udg_ResurrectionPointTyrial, true)
    if ( Trig_Servant_Coal_Func004C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07V', GetDyingUnit())
    else
    endif
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A07V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Servant_Coal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Servant_Coal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Servant_Coal, function Trig_Servant_Coal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Regular Servants Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Regular_Servants_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_RegularServantsLevel=( udg_RegularServantsLevel + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Regular_Servants_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Regular_Servants_Level=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Regular_Servants_Level, 420.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Regular_Servants_Level, function Trig_Regular_Servants_Level_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Zombie
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func006Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func007Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func008Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n000')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func006Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n000')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func007Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n000')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Func008Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Zombie takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Zombie=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Zombie, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Zombie, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Zombie, function Trig_Remove_Zombie_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'nfel')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n00T')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n01H')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n00T')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func011A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'nfel')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func013Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n00T')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func013Func005A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n01H')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func013Func008A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func014C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'nfel')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func014Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func015C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'nfel')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func015Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func016C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n00T')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func016Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n00T')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func017Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n00T')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Hound_Func018Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)

endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func008Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func009Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func010Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func011Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func012Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'u000')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'u007')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'u000')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func007Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'u000')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func008Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'u000')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func009Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func010C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'u007')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func010Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'u007')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func011Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func012C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'u007')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Func012Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Flesh_Giant takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Flesh_Giant=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Flesh_Giant, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Flesh_Giant, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Flesh_Giant, function Trig_Remove_Flesh_Giant_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Heartless
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func007Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func009Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n00F')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n01I')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n00F')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func007Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n00F')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func008Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n00F')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func009Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n01I')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Func009Func005A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Remove_Heartless=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Heartless, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Heartless, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Heartless, function Trig_Remove_Heartless_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Death Knight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R019' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func007Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func008Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func008Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n00K')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n01G')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(12), 'n00K')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func007Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n00K')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func008Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(13), 'n01G')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func008Func005A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(14), 'n00K')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Func009Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
endfunction
