    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Death_Knight, function Trig_Remove_Death_Knight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: VL Config
//===========================================================================
function Trig_VL_Config_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // !! CONFIG START !!
    // Abilities & Dummy Unit
    set udg_VL_Ability='A05Z'
    // Dummy Unit
    set udg_VL_Dummy='h02I'
    // Miss on Attacks Ability
    set udg_VL_AbilityCurse='A05X'
    // Buff for VL_AbilityMiss
    // NOTE: If you want to change debuff SFX, refer to this buff
    set udg_VL_Debuff='B00O'
    // Healing Ability
    set udg_VL_AbilityHeal='A05Y'
    // Buff for VL_AbilityHeal
    // NOTE: If you want to change the buff SFX, refer to this buff
    set udg_VL_Buff='B00N'
    //  
    // Max Level VL_Ability Will Have
    // NOTE: THIS IS REALLY IMPORTANT IF YOU WANT AOE TO WORK PROPERLY
    set udg_VL_MaxLevel=1
    //  
    // Special Effect for Lightning
    set udg_VL_L_SFX="HWPB"
    set udg_VL_L_Amount=3
    set udg_VL_L_Duration=1.00
    set udg_VL_L_Distance=800.00
    set udg_VL_L_Height=1500.00
    //  
    // Duration of Spell Per Level
    set udg_VL_Duration[1]=5.00
    set udg_VL_Duration[2]=10.00
    set udg_VL_Duration[3]=12.00
    //  
    // Radius of Spell Per Level
    // NOTE: Make sure to match the AoE values of VL_Ability
    set udg_VL_AoE[1]=300.00
    set udg_VL_AoE[2]=350.00
    set udg_VL_AoE[3]=400.00
    //  
    // Special Effect for AoE Indicator
    set udg_VL_C_SFX="Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Transmute\\GoldBottleMissile.mdl"
    set udg_VL_C_Speed=4.00
    set udg_VL_C_Amount=3
    set udg_VL_C_GrowTime=2.00
    //  
    // Special Effect from Caster At Start of Ability
    set udg_VL_SFX="Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl"
    //  
    // Special Effect for Lightning Points
    set udg_VL_L_SFX_EndPoint="Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl"
    // !! CONFIG END !!
    //  
    set udg_VL_PeriodicTimer=0.03
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_VL_Loop, udg_VL_PeriodicTimer)
    //  
    set udg_VL_TempLoc=GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_VL_Dummy, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_VL_TempLoc, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_VL_DummyCaster=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_VL_AbilityCurse, udg_VL_DummyCaster)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_VL_AbilityHeal, udg_VL_DummyCaster)
    call UnitRemoveAbility(udg_VL_DummyCaster, 'Amov')
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VL_TempLoc)
    set udg_VL_TempReal=I2R(udg_VL_C_Amount)
    set udg_VL_C_Even=( 360.00 / udg_VL_TempReal )
    set udg_VL_TempInt=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_VL_TempInt > udg_VL_MaxLevel
        set udg_VL_C_GrowRate[udg_VL_TempInt]=( udg_VL_AoE[udg_VL_TempInt] / ( udg_VL_C_GrowTime / udg_VL_PeriodicTimer ) )
        set udg_VL_TempInt=udg_VL_TempInt + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_VL_Config takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_VL_Config=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_VL_Config, function Trig_VL_Config_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: VL Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_VL_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == udg_VL_Ability ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Cast_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VL_SpellCount == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Cast_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VL_RecycledSize == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local real x1
    local real y1
    local real z1
    local real x2
    local real y2
    local real z2
    //  
    set udg_VL_SpellCount=( udg_VL_SpellCount + 1 )
    if ( Trig_VL_Cast_Func009C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_VL_Loop)
    else
        // loop is already on; do nothing
    endif
    //  
    if ( Trig_VL_Cast_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_VL_MaxIndex=( udg_VL_MaxIndex + 1 )
        set udg_VL_Spell_ID=udg_VL_MaxIndex
    else
        set udg_VL_RecycledSize=( udg_VL_RecycledSize - 1 )
        set udg_VL_Spell_ID=udg_VL_RecycledStack[udg_VL_RecycledSize]
    endif
    set udg_VL_NodeNext[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=0
    set udg_VL_NodeNext[udg_VL_NodePrev[0]]=udg_VL_Spell_ID
    set udg_VL_NodePrev[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=udg_VL_NodePrev[0]
    set udg_VL_NodePrev[0]=udg_VL_Spell_ID
    //  
    set udg_VL_Caster[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_VL_Owner[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=GetTriggerPlayer()
    set udg_VL_AbilityLvl[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_VL_Ability, udg_VL_Caster[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    set udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=GetUnitLoc(udg_VL_Caster[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    set udg_VL_C_MoveRate[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_VL_CounterDuration[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_VL_L_Counter[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_VL_CurrentAoE[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_VL_L_CheckSFX[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=true
    //  
    if udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID] == null then
    set udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=CreateGroup()
    endif
    //  
    set udg_VL_TempLoc=GetUnitLoc(udg_VL_Caster[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    set udg_VL_L_Direction=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID], udg_VL_TempLoc)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VL_TempLoc)
    set udg_VL_TempLoc=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID], udg_VL_L_Distance, udg_VL_L_Direction)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID], udg_VL_SFX)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set x1=GetLocationX(udg_VL_TempLoc)
    set y1=GetLocationY(udg_VL_TempLoc)
    set z1=GetLocationZ(udg_VL_TempLoc) + udg_VL_L_Height
    set x2=GetLocationX(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    set y2=GetLocationY(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    set z2=GetLocationZ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VL_TempLoc)
    set udg_VL_TempInt=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_VL_TempInt > udg_VL_L_Amount
        set udg_VL_L_ID=( ( udg_VL_Spell_ID * udg_VL_L_Amount ) + udg_VL_TempInt )
        set udg_VL_L[udg_VL_L_ID]=AddLightningEx(udg_VL_L_SFX, true, x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID], udg_VL_L_SFX_EndPoint)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_VL_TempInt=udg_VL_TempInt + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_VL_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_VL_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_VL_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_VL_Cast, Condition(function Trig_VL_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_VL_Cast, function Trig_VL_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: VL Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_Debuff) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VL_TempUnit=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ(udg_VL_Debuff, udg_VL_TempUnit)
    else
        // TempUnit does not have debuff; do nothing
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VL_SpellCount == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func014Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VL_L_Counter[udg_VL_Spell_ID] >= udg_VL_L_Duration ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VL_L_CheckSFX[udg_VL_Spell_ID] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VL_CurrentAoE[udg_VL_Spell_ID] <= udg_VL_AoE[udg_VL_AbilityLvl[udg_VL_Spell_ID]] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_Owner[udg_VL_Spell_ID]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_Buff) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_Owner[udg_VL_Spell_ID]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_Debuff) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_VL_TempUnit, UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_Owner[udg_VL_Spell_ID]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_VL_TempUnit, UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_VL_TempUnit) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VL_TempUnit=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002C() ) then
        // healing friendly units that don't have buff
        // cursing enemy units that don't have buff
        if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VL_DummyCaster, "rejuvination", udg_VL_TempUnit)
        else
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VL_DummyCaster, "curse", udg_VL_TempUnit)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
        endif
    else
        // TempUnit did not pass filters; do nothing
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_VL_TempUnit) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_VL_TempReal >= udg_VL_CurrentAoE[udg_VL_Spell_ID] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func029A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VL_TempUnit=GetEnumUnit()
    set udg_VL_TempLoc=GetUnitLoc(udg_VL_TempUnit)
    set udg_VL_TempReal=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_VL_TempLoc, udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ(udg_VL_Debuff, udg_VL_TempUnit)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_VL_TempUnit, udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
    else
        // TempUnit is still in radius; keep debuff
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VL_TempLoc)
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_VL_CounterDuration[udg_VL_Spell_ID] >= udg_VL_Duration[udg_VL_AbilityLvl[udg_VL_Spell_ID]] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_VL_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VL_Spell_ID=0
    set udg_VL_LoopInt=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_VL_LoopInt > udg_VL_SpellCount
        set udg_VL_Spell_ID=udg_VL_NodeNext[udg_VL_Spell_ID]
        set udg_VL_CounterDuration[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=( udg_VL_CounterDuration[udg_VL_Spell_ID] + udg_VL_PeriodicTimer )
        // checking if the instance duration has ended
        if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID], function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func001A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
            set udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=null
            call RemoveLocation(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
            //  
            set udg_VL_RecycledStack[udg_VL_RecycledSize]=udg_VL_Spell_ID
            set udg_VL_RecycledSize=( udg_VL_RecycledSize + 1 )
            set udg_VL_NodeNext[udg_VL_NodePrev[udg_VL_Spell_ID]]=udg_VL_NodeNext[udg_VL_Spell_ID]
            set udg_VL_NodePrev[udg_VL_NodeNext[udg_VL_Spell_ID]]=udg_VL_NodePrev[udg_VL_Spell_ID]
            //  
            set udg_VL_SpellCount=( udg_VL_SpellCount - 1 )
            if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func012C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_VL_Loop)
            else
                // there is still a spell instance running; do not turn loop off
            endif
        else
            // checking if lightning effects are still active
            if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func014C() ) then
                set udg_VL_L_Counter[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=( udg_VL_L_Counter[udg_VL_Spell_ID] + udg_VL_PeriodicTimer )
                // checking if the lightning effects have reached their max duration of visibility
                if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func014Func005C() ) then
                    set udg_VL_TempInt=1
                    loop
                        exitwhen udg_VL_TempInt > udg_VL_L_Amount
                        set udg_VL_L_ID=( ( udg_VL_Spell_ID * udg_VL_L_Amount ) + udg_VL_TempInt )
                        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_VL_L[udg_VL_L_ID])
                        set udg_VL_TempInt=udg_VL_TempInt + 1
                    endloop
                    set udg_VL_L_CheckSFX[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=false
                else
                    // lightning effects have not reached their max duration of visibility; do not destroy them
                endif
            else
                // lightning effects are no longer active; do nothing
            endif
            // creating the circle effect
            if ( Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func016C() ) then
                set udg_VL_CurrentAoE[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=( udg_VL_CurrentAoE[udg_VL_Spell_ID] + udg_VL_C_GrowRate[udg_VL_AbilityLvl[udg_VL_Spell_ID]] )
            else
                // effects have already reached max AoE; do not continue to grow
            endif
            set udg_VL_TempInt=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_VL_TempInt > udg_VL_C_Amount
                set udg_VL_TempReal=I2R(udg_VL_TempInt)
                set udg_VL_Degree=( udg_VL_C_MoveRate[udg_VL_Spell_ID] + ( udg_VL_C_Even * udg_VL_TempReal ) )
                set udg_VL_TempLoc=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID], udg_VL_CurrentAoE[udg_VL_Spell_ID], udg_VL_Degree)
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VL_TempLoc, udg_VL_C_SFX)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_VL_TempLoc)
                set udg_VL_TempInt=udg_VL_TempInt + 1
            endloop
            set udg_VL_C_MoveRate[udg_VL_Spell_ID]=( udg_VL_C_MoveRate[udg_VL_Spell_ID] + udg_VL_C_Speed )
            //  
            call SetUnitOwner(udg_VL_DummyCaster, udg_VL_Owner[udg_VL_Spell_ID], true)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_VL_DummyCaster, udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_VL_AbilityCurse, udg_VL_DummyCaster, udg_VL_AbilityLvl[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_VL_AbilityHeal, udg_VL_DummyCaster, udg_VL_AbilityLvl[udg_VL_Spell_ID])
            //  
            // finding all units inside effect
            set bj_wantDestroyGroup=true
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(udg_VL_CurrentAoE[udg_VL_Spell_ID], udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_VL_Spell_ID]), function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func027A)
            // checking if any enemy units left the radius with debuff active
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID], function Trig_VL_Loop_Func002Func004Func029A)
        endif
        set udg_VL_LoopInt=udg_VL_LoopInt + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_VL_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_VL_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_VL_Loop)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_VL_Loop, function Trig_VL_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Mending Config
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Mending_Config_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // !! CONFIG START !!
    // Abilities & Dummy Unit
    set udg_WM_Ability='A07X'
    // Dummy Unit
    set udg_WM_Dummy='h02I'
    // Miss on Attacks Ability
    // Buff for VL_AbilityMiss
    // NOTE: If you want to change debuff SFX, refer to this buff
    // Healing Ability
    set udg_WM_AbilityHeal='A07Z'
    // Buff for VL_AbilityHeal
    // NOTE: If you want to change the buff SFX, refer to this buff
    set udg_WM_Buff='B024'
    //  
    // Max Level VL_Ability Will Have
    // NOTE: THIS IS REALLY IMPORTANT IF YOU WANT AOE TO WORK PROPERLY
    set udg_WM_MaxLevel=3
    //  
    // Special Effect for Lightning
    //  
    // Duration of Spell Per Level
    set udg_WM_Duration[1]=5.00
    set udg_WM_Duration[2]=8.00
    set udg_WM_Duration[3]=10.00
    //  
    // Radius of Spell Per Level
    // NOTE: Make sure to match the AoE values of VL_Ability
    set udg_WM_AoE[1]=300.00
    set udg_WM_AoE[2]=300.00
    set udg_WM_AoE[3]=300.00
    //  
    // Special Effect for AoE Indicator
    set udg_WM_C_SFX="war3mapImported\\OrbWaterX.mdx"
    set udg_WM_C_Speed=4.00
    set udg_WM_C_Amount=3
    set udg_WM_C_GrowTime=2.00
    //  
    // Special Effect from Caster At Start of Ability
    set udg_WM_SFX="war3mapImported\\WaterBlast.mdx"
    //  
    // Special Effect for Lightning Points
    set udg_WM_L_SFX_EndPoint="war3mapImported\\HealingWater.MDX"
    // !! CONFIG END !!
    //  
    set udg_WM_PeriodicTimer=0.03
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Loop, udg_WM_PeriodicTimer)
    //  
    set udg_WM_TempLoc=GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_WM_Dummy, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_WM_TempLoc, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_WM_DummyCaster=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_WM_AbilityHeal, udg_WM_DummyCaster)
    call UnitRemoveAbility(udg_WM_DummyCaster, 'Amov')
    call RemoveLocation(udg_WM_TempLoc)
    set udg_WM_TempReal=I2R(udg_WM_C_Amount)
    set udg_WM_C_Even=( 360.00 / udg_WM_TempReal )
    set udg_WM_TempInt=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_WM_TempInt > udg_WM_MaxLevel
        set udg_WM_C_GrowRate[udg_WM_TempInt]=( udg_WM_AoE[udg_WM_TempInt] / ( udg_WM_C_GrowTime / udg_WM_PeriodicTimer ) )
        set udg_WM_TempInt=udg_WM_TempInt + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Mending_Config takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Mending_Config=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Config, function Trig_Water_Mending_Config_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Mending Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == udg_WM_Ability ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WM_SpellCount == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WM_RecycledSize == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local real x1
    local real y1
    local real z1
    local real x2
    local real y2
    local real z2
    //  
    set udg_WM_SpellCount=( udg_WM_SpellCount + 1 )
    if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Func009C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Loop)
    else
        // loop is already on; do nothing
    endif
    //  
    if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_WM_MaxIndex=( udg_WM_MaxIndex + 1 )
        set udg_WM_Spell_ID=udg_WM_MaxIndex
    else
        set udg_WM_RecycledSize=( udg_WM_RecycledSize - 1 )
        set udg_WM_Spell_ID=udg_WM_RecycledStack[udg_WM_RecycledSize]
    endif
    set udg_WM_NodeNext[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=0
    set udg_WM_NodeNext[udg_WM_NodePrev[0]]=udg_WM_Spell_ID
    set udg_WM_NodePrev[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=udg_WM_NodePrev[0]
    set udg_WM_NodePrev[0]=udg_WM_Spell_ID
    //  
    set udg_WM_Caster[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_WM_Owner[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=GetTriggerPlayer()
    set udg_WM_AbilityLvl[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_WM_Ability, udg_WM_Caster[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
    set udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_WM_C_MoveRate[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_WM_CounterDuration[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_WM_L_Counter[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_WM_CurrentAoE[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=0.00
    set udg_WM_L_CheckSFX[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=true
    //  
    if udg_WM_GroupEnemy[udg_WM_Spell_ID] == null then
    set udg_WM_GroupEnemy[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=CreateGroup()
    endif
    //  
    set udg_WM_TempLoc=GetUnitLoc(udg_WM_Caster[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
    set udg_WM_L_Direction=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID], udg_VL_TempLoc)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_WM_TempLoc)
    set udg_WM_TempLoc=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID], udg_WM_L_Distance, udg_WM_L_Direction)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID], udg_WM_SFX)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set x1=GetLocationX(udg_WM_TempLoc)
    set y1=GetLocationY(udg_WM_TempLoc)
    set z1=GetLocationZ(udg_WM_TempLoc) + udg_WM_L_Height
    set x2=GetLocationX(udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
    set y2=GetLocationY(udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
    set z2=GetLocationZ(udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_WM_TempLoc)
    set udg_WM_TempInt=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_WM_TempInt > udg_WM_L_Amount
        set udg_WM_L_ID=( ( udg_WM_Spell_ID * udg_WM_L_Amount ) + udg_WM_TempInt )
        set udg_WM_L[udg_WM_L_ID]=AddLightningEx(udg_WM_L_SFX, true, x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VL_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID], udg_WM_L_SFX_EndPoint)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_WM_TempInt=udg_WM_TempInt + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Mending_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Mending_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Cast, function Trig_Water_Mending_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Mending Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_WM_TempUnit, udg_WM_Buff) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WM_TempUnit=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ(udg_WM_Debuff, udg_WM_TempUnit)
    else
        // TempUnit does not have debuff; do nothing
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WM_SpellCount == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func014Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WM_L_Counter[udg_WM_Spell_ID] >= udg_WM_L_Duration ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WM_L_CheckSFX[udg_WM_Spell_ID] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WM_CurrentAoE[udg_WM_Spell_ID] <= udg_WM_AoE[udg_WM_AbilityLvl[udg_WM_Spell_ID]] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(udg_WM_TempUnit, udg_WM_Owner[udg_WM_Spell_ID]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_WM_TempUnit, udg_WM_Buff) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(udg_WM_TempUnit, udg_WM_Owner[udg_WM_Spell_ID]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_WM_TempUnit, udg_WM_Debuff) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_WM_TempUnit, UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(udg_WM_TempUnit, udg_WM_Owner[udg_WM_Spell_ID]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_WM_TempUnit, UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_WM_TempUnit) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WM_TempUnit=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002C() ) then
        // healing friendly units that don't have buff
        // cursing enemy units that don't have buff
        if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_WM_DummyCaster, "rejuvination", udg_WM_TempUnit)
        else
        endif
    else
        // TempUnit did not pass filters; do nothing
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_WM_TempUnit) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_WM_TempReal >= udg_WM_CurrentAoE[udg_WM_Spell_ID] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func029A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WM_TempUnit=GetEnumUnit()
    set udg_WM_TempLoc=GetUnitLoc(udg_WM_TempUnit)
    set udg_WM_TempReal=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_WM_TempLoc, udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
    if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func029Func004C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ(udg_WM_Debuff, udg_WM_TempUnit)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_WM_TempUnit, udg_WM_GroupEnemy[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
    else
        // TempUnit is still in radius; keep debuff
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_WM_TempLoc)
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WM_CounterDuration[udg_WM_Spell_ID] >= udg_WM_Duration[udg_WM_AbilityLvl[udg_WM_Spell_ID]] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WM_Spell_ID=0
    set udg_VL_LoopInt=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_VL_LoopInt > udg_WM_SpellCount
        set udg_WM_Spell_ID=udg_WM_NodeNext[udg_WM_Spell_ID]
        set udg_WM_CounterDuration[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=( udg_WM_CounterDuration[udg_WM_Spell_ID] + udg_WM_PeriodicTimer )
        // checking if the instance duration has ended
        if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_WM_GroupEnemy[udg_WM_Spell_ID], function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func001A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_WM_GroupEnemy[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
            set udg_WM_GroupEnemy[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=null
            call RemoveLocation(udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
            //  
            set udg_WM_RecycledStack[udg_VL_RecycledSize]=udg_WM_Spell_ID
            set udg_WM_RecycledSize=( udg_WM_RecycledSize + 1 )
            set udg_WM_NodeNext[udg_WM_NodePrev[udg_WM_Spell_ID]]=udg_WM_NodeNext[udg_WM_Spell_ID]
            set udg_WM_NodePrev[udg_WM_NodeNext[udg_WM_Spell_ID]]=udg_WM_NodePrev[udg_WM_Spell_ID]
            //  
            set udg_WM_SpellCount=( udg_WM_SpellCount - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func012C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Loop)
            else
                // there is still a spell instance running; do not turn loop off
            endif
        else
            // checking if lightning effects are still active
            if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func014C() ) then
                set udg_WM_L_Counter[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=( udg_WM_L_Counter[udg_WM_Spell_ID] + udg_WM_PeriodicTimer )
                // checking if the lightning effects have reached their max duration of visibility
                if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func014Func005C() ) then
                    set udg_WM_TempInt=1
                    loop
                        exitwhen udg_WM_TempInt > udg_WM_L_Amount
                        set udg_WM_L_ID=( ( udg_WM_Spell_ID * udg_WM_L_Amount ) + udg_WM_TempInt )
                        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_VL_L[udg_WM_L_ID])
                        set udg_WM_TempInt=udg_WM_TempInt + 1
                    endloop
                    set udg_WM_L_CheckSFX[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=false
                else
                    // lightning effects have not reached their max duration of visibility; do not destroy them
                endif
            else
                // lightning effects are no longer active; do nothing
            endif
            // creating the circle effect
            if ( Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func016C() ) then
                set udg_WM_CurrentAoE[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=( udg_WM_CurrentAoE[udg_WM_Spell_ID] + udg_WM_C_GrowRate[udg_WM_AbilityLvl[udg_WM_Spell_ID]] )
            else
                // effects have already reached max AoE; do not continue to grow
            endif
            set udg_WM_TempInt=1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_WM_TempInt > udg_WM_C_Amount
                set udg_WM_TempReal=I2R(udg_WM_TempInt)
                set udg_WM_Degree=( udg_WM_C_MoveRate[udg_WM_Spell_ID] + ( udg_WM_C_Even * udg_WM_TempReal ) )
                set udg_WM_TempLoc=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID], udg_WM_CurrentAoE[udg_WM_Spell_ID], udg_WM_Degree)
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_WM_TempLoc, udg_WM_C_SFX)
                call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_WM_TempLoc)
                set udg_WM_TempInt=udg_WM_TempInt + 1
            endloop
            set udg_WM_C_MoveRate[udg_WM_Spell_ID]=( udg_WM_C_MoveRate[udg_WM_Spell_ID] + udg_WM_C_Speed )
            //  
            call SetUnitOwner(udg_WM_DummyCaster, udg_WM_Owner[udg_WM_Spell_ID], true)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_WM_DummyCaster, udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_WM_AbilityCurse, udg_WM_DummyCaster, udg_WM_AbilityLvl[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_WM_AbilityHeal, udg_WM_DummyCaster, udg_WM_AbilityLvl[udg_WM_Spell_ID])
            //  
            // finding all units inside effect
            set bj_wantDestroyGroup=true
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(udg_WM_CurrentAoE[udg_WM_Spell_ID], udg_WM_TargetLoc[udg_WM_Spell_ID]), function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func027A)
            // checking if any enemy units left the radius with debuff active
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_VL_GroupEnemy[udg_VL_Spell_ID], function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Func002Func004Func029A)
        endif
        set udg_VL_LoopInt=udg_VL_LoopInt + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Mending_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Mending_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Loop)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Loop, function Trig_Water_Mending_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ini
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ini_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // This following spell can be used anywhere in your map as an alternative to pause
    set udg__Pause='A047'
    // configurable
    set udg_Config_CH_Spell='A048'
    set udg_Config_CH_Unit='h03Y'
    set udg_Config_CH_Duration=4.00
    set udg_Config_CH_lvlDuration=2.00
    set udg_Config_CH_AoE=400.00
    set udg_Config_CH_lvlAoE=0.00
    // Model causes lag on first cast.... Preloading.
    call RemoveUnit(CreateUnit(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Config_CH_Unit, 0, 0, 0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ini takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ini=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ini, function Trig_ini_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chronosphere ini
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chronosphere_ini_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == udg_Config_CH_Spell ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_ini_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CH_Dex == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_ini_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Chronosphere_ini_Func003C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Chronosphere_loop)
    else
    endif
    set udg_CH_Dex=( udg_CH_Dex + 1 )
    set udg_CH_Caster[udg_CH_Dex]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_CH_lvl=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_Config_CH_Spell, udg_CH_Caster[udg_CH_Dex])
    set udg_CH_p=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    // Chronosphere dummy must be owned by caster, otherwise true sight will not work
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Config_CH_Unit, GetOwningPlayer(udg_CH_Caster[udg_CH_Dex]), udg_CH_p, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_CH_p)
    set udg_CH_Effect[udg_CH_Dex]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(( udg_Config_CH_Duration + ( I2R(udg_CH_lvl) * udg_Config_CH_lvlDuration ) ), 'BTLF', udg_CH_Effect[udg_CH_Dex])
    set udg_CH_AoE[udg_CH_Dex]=( udg_Config_CH_AoE + ( I2R(udg_CH_lvl) * udg_Config_CH_lvlAoE ) )
    // Next function has no effect if AoE is 400
    // The chronosphere looks odd if it's size is not 100%. I'm not a modeler so I can't fix it. If that is a probelm, use a diffirent model or fix it yourself.
    call SetUnitScalePercent(udg_CH_Effect[udg_CH_Dex], ( udg_CH_AoE[udg_CH_Dex] / 4.00 ), 0.00, 0.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chronosphere_ini takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chronosphere_ini=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Chronosphere_ini, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Chronosphere_ini, Condition(function Trig_Chronosphere_ini_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chronosphere_ini, function Trig_Chronosphere_ini_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chronosphere loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CH_Dex == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func010Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_CH_unit, udg_CH_Group2) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func010Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CH_unit != udg_CH_Caster[udg_CH_i] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_CH_unit) != 'h000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CH_unit=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func010Func002C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_CH_unit, udg_CH_Group)
        if ( Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func010Func002Func002C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg__Pause, udg_CH_unit)
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_CH_unit, "defend")
            call UnitPauseTimedLifeBJ(true, udg_CH_unit)
            call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_CH_unit, 0.00)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_CH_unit, udg_CH_Group2)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_CH_Effect[udg_CH_i]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_CH_unit, udg_CH_Group) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CH_unit=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func002Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg__Pause, udg_CH_unit)
        call UnitPauseTimedLifeBJ(false, udg_CH_unit)
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_CH_unit, 100.00)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_CH_unit, udg_CH_Group2)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CH_i=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_CH_i > udg_CH_Dex
        if ( Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_CH_p=GetUnitLoc(udg_CH_Effect[udg_CH_i])
            set bj_wantDestroyGroup=true
            // I know I don't have to filter Chronosphere since it has locust and won't be picked, but for some reason - if I don't filter chronosphere - then the chronospheres can pause each other...
            call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(udg_CH_AoE[udg_CH_i], udg_CH_p), function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func010A)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_CH_p)
        else
            set udg_CH_Caster[udg_CH_i]=udg_CH_Caster[udg_CH_Dex]
            set udg_CH_Effect[udg_CH_i]=udg_CH_Effect[udg_CH_Dex]
            set udg_CH_AoE[udg_CH_i]=udg_CH_AoE[udg_CH_Dex]
            set udg_CH_Dex=( udg_CH_Dex - 1 )
            set udg_CH_i=( udg_CH_i - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func001Func001Func006C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        endif
        set udg_CH_i=udg_CH_i + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_CH_Group2, function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Func002A)
    call GroupClear(udg_CH_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chronosphere_loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chronosphere_loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Chronosphere_loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Chronosphere_loop, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chronosphere_loop, function Trig_Chronosphere_loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Event Config
//
// GUI Unit Event by Bribe, version 2.5.0.0
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Event_Config_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    //  
    // Copy Unit Event Ability from Object Editor, then set DetectRemoveAbility to it as follows:
    //  
    set udg_DetectRemoveAbility='A07K'
    //  
    // Paste it a second time, then set DetectTransformAbility to it as follows:
    //  
    set udg_DetectTransformAbility='A07L'
    //  
    // Don't enable the following lines as they exist simply to make copying the system easier
    //  
    // One additional event to run right before Unit Indexer initializes, added 29 May 2017 for ZiBitheWand3r3r 
    set udg_UnitIndexEvent=- 1.00
    //  
    // Initialize Unit Event now that all the InitTrig_ functions have run
    //  
    set udg_IsUnitPreplaced[0]=true
    call ExecuteFunc("UnitEventInit")
    set udg_UnitIndexEvent=3.00
    set udg_IsUnitPreplaced[0]=udg_IsUnitTransforming[0]
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_Event_Config takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_Event_Config=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unit_Event_Config, function Trig_Unit_Event_Config_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Event
//===========================================================================
//===========================================================================
function UnitEventDestroyGroup takes integer i returns nothing
    if udg_CargoTransportGroup[i] != null then
        call DestroyGroup(udg_CargoTransportGroup[i])
        set udg_CargoTransportGroup[i]=null
    endif
endfunction
function UnitEventCheckAfter takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i= 0
    loop
        set i=udg_CheckDeathList[i]
        exitwhen i == 0
        if udg_IsUnitNew[i] then
            //The unit was just created.
            set udg_IsUnitNew[i]=false
        elseif udg_IsUnitTransforming[i] then
           //Added 21 July 2017 to fix the issue re-adding this ability in the same instant
           set udg_UDex=i
           set udg_UnitTypeEvent=0.00
           set udg_UnitTypeEvent=1.00
           set udg_UnitTypeOf[i]=GetUnitTypeId(udg_UDexUnits[i]) //Set this afterward to give the user extra reference
           set udg_IsUnitTransforming[i]=false
           call UnitAddAbility(udg_UDexUnits[i], udg_DetectTransformAbility)
        elseif udg_IsUnitAlive[i] then
            //The unit has started reincarnating.
            set udg_IsUnitReincarnating[i]=true
            set udg_IsUnitAlive[i]=false
            set udg_UDex=i
            set udg_DeathEvent=0.50
            set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
        endif
        set udg_CheckDeathInList[i]=false
    endloop
    //Empty the list
    set udg_CheckDeathList[0]=0
endfunction
function UnitEventCheckAfterProxy takes integer i returns nothing
    if udg_CheckDeathList[0] == 0 then
        call TimerStart(udg_CheckDeathTimer, 0.00, false, function UnitEventCheckAfter)
    endif
    if not udg_CheckDeathInList[i] then
        set udg_CheckDeathList[i]=udg_CheckDeathList[0]
        set udg_CheckDeathList[0]=i
        set udg_CheckDeathInList[i]=true
    endif
endfunction

function UnitEventOnUnload takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i= udg_UDex
    call GroupRemoveUnit(udg_CargoTransportGroup[GetUnitUserData(udg_CargoTransportUnit[i])], udg_UDexUnits[i])
    set udg_IsUnitBeingUnloaded[i]=true
    set udg_CargoEvent=0.00
    set udg_CargoEvent=2.00
    set udg_CargoEvent=0.00
    set udg_IsUnitBeingUnloaded[i]=false
    if not IsUnitLoaded(udg_UDexUnits[i]) or IsUnitType(udg_CargoTransportUnit[i], UNIT_TYPE_DEAD) or GetUnitTypeId(udg_CargoTransportUnit[i]) == 0 then
        set udg_CargoTransportUnit[i]=null
    endif
endfunction

function UnitEventOnDeath takes nothing returns boolean
    local integer pdex= udg_UDex
    set udg_UDex=GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit())
    if udg_UDex != 0 then
        set udg_KillerOfUnit[udg_UDex]=GetKillingUnit() //Added 29 May 2017 for GIMLI_2 
        set udg_IsUnitAlive[udg_UDex]=false
        set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
        set udg_DeathEvent=1.00
        set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
        set udg_KillerOfUnit[udg_UDex]=null
        if udg_CargoTransportUnit[udg_UDex] != null then
            call UnitEventOnUnload()
        endif
    endif
    set udg_UDex=pdex
    return false
endfunction
  
function UnitEventOnOrder takes nothing returns boolean
    local integer pdex= udg_UDex
    local unit u= GetFilterUnit()
    local integer i= GetUnitUserData(u)
    if i > 0 then
        set udg_UDex=i
        if GetUnitAbilityLevel(u, udg_DetectRemoveAbility) == 0 then
            if not udg_IsUnitRemoved[i] then
                set udg_IsUnitRemoved[i]=true
                set udg_IsUnitAlive[i]=false
                set udg_SummonerOfUnit[i]=null
                
                //For backwards-compatibility:
                set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
                set udg_DeathEvent=3.00
                set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
                
                //Fire deindex event for UDex:
                set udg_UnitIndexEvent=0.00
                set udg_UnitIndexEvent=2.00
                set udg_UnitIndexEvent=0.00
                
                set udg_UDexNext[udg_UDexPrev[i]]=udg_UDexNext[i]
                set udg_UDexPrev[udg_UDexNext[i]]=udg_UDexPrev[i]
                
                // Recycle the index for later use
                set udg_UDexUnits[i]=null
                set udg_UDexPrev[i]=udg_UDexLastRecycled
                set udg_UDexLastRecycled=i
                call UnitEventDestroyGroup(i)
            endif
        elseif not udg_IsUnitAlive[i] then
            if not IsUnitType(u, UNIT_TYPE_DEAD) then
                set udg_IsUnitAlive[i]=true
                set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
                set udg_DeathEvent=2.00
                set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
                set udg_IsUnitReincarnating[i]=false
            endif
        elseif IsUnitType(u, UNIT_TYPE_DEAD) then
            if udg_IsUnitNew[i] then
                //This unit was created as a corpse.
                set udg_IsUnitAlive[i]=false
                set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
                set udg_DeathEvent=1.00
                set udg_DeathEvent=0.00
            elseif udg_CargoTransportUnit[i] == null or not IsUnitType(u, UNIT_TYPE_HERO) then
                //The unit may have just started reincarnating.
                call UnitEventCheckAfterProxy(i)
            endif
        elseif GetUnitAbilityLevel(u, udg_DetectTransformAbility) == 0 and not udg_IsUnitTransforming[i] then
            set udg_IsUnitTransforming[i]=true
            call UnitEventCheckAfterProxy(i) //This block has been updated on 21 July 2017
        endif
        if udg_CargoTransportUnit[i] != null and not udg_IsUnitBeingUnloaded[i] and not IsUnitLoaded(u) or IsUnitType(u, UNIT_TYPE_DEAD) then
            call UnitEventOnUnload()
        endif
        set udg_UDex=pdex
    endif
    set u=null
    return false
endfunction
function UnitEventOnSummon takes nothing returns boolean
    local integer pdex= udg_UDex
    set udg_UDex=GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit())
    if udg_IsUnitNew[udg_UDex] then
        set udg_SummonerOfUnit[udg_UDex]=GetSummoningUnit()
        set udg_UnitIndexEvent=0.00
        set udg_UnitIndexEvent=0.50
        set udg_UnitIndexEvent=0.00
    endif
    set udg_UDex=pdex
    return false
endfunction
function UnitEventOnLoad takes nothing returns boolean
    local integer pdex= udg_UDex
    local integer i= GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit())
    local integer index
    if i != 0 then
        set udg_UDex=i
        if udg_CargoTransportUnit[i] != null then
            call UnitEventOnUnload()
        endif
        //Loaded corpses do not issue an order when unloaded, therefore must
        //use the enter-region event method taken from Jesus4Lyf's Transport.
        if not udg_IsUnitAlive[i] then
            call SetUnitX(udg_UDexUnits[i], udg_WorldMaxX)
            call SetUnitY(udg_UDexUnits[i], udg_WorldMaxY)
        endif
        
        set udg_CargoTransportUnit[i]=GetTransportUnit()
        set index=GetUnitUserData(udg_CargoTransportUnit[i])
        if udg_CargoTransportGroup[index] == null then
            set udg_CargoTransportGroup[index]=CreateGroup()
        endif
        call GroupAddUnit(udg_CargoTransportGroup[index], udg_UDexUnits[i])
        set udg_CargoEvent=0.00
        set udg_CargoEvent=1.00
        set udg_CargoEvent=0.00
        set udg_UDex=pdex
    endif
    return false
endfunction
function UnitEventEnter takes nothing returns boolean
    local integer pdex= udg_UDex
    local integer i= udg_UDexLastRecycled
    local unit u= GetFilterUnit()
    if udg_UnitIndexerEnabled and GetUnitAbilityLevel(u, udg_DetectRemoveAbility) == 0 then
        //Generate a unique integer index for this unit
        if i == 0 then
            set i=udg_UDexMax + 1
            set udg_UDexMax=i
        else
            set udg_UDexLastRecycled=udg_UDexPrev[i]
        endif
        //Link index to unit, unit to index
        set udg_UDexUnits[i]=u
        call SetUnitUserData(u, i)
        
        //For backwards-compatibility, add the unit to a linked list
        set udg_UDexNext[i]=udg_UDexNext[0]
        set udg_UDexPrev[udg_UDexNext[0]]=i
        set udg_UDexNext[0]=i
        set udg_UDexPrev[i]=0

        set udg_CheckDeathInList[i]=false

        call UnitAddAbility(u, udg_DetectRemoveAbility)
        call UnitMakeAbilityPermanent(u, true, udg_DetectRemoveAbility)
        call UnitAddAbility(u, udg_DetectTransformAbility)
        set udg_UnitTypeOf[i]=GetUnitTypeId(u)
        set udg_IsUnitNew[i]=true
        set udg_IsUnitAlive[i]=true
        set udg_IsUnitRemoved[i]=false
        set udg_IsUnitReincarnating[i]=false
        set udg_IsUnitPreplaced[i]=udg_IsUnitPreplaced[0] //Added 29 May 2017 for Spellbound
        call UnitEventCheckAfterProxy(i)
        
        //Fire index event for UDex
        set udg_UDex=i
        set udg_UnitIndexEvent=0.00
        set udg_UnitIndexEvent=1.00
        set udg_UnitIndexEvent=0.00
    else
        set udg_UDex=GetUnitUserData(u)
        if udg_CargoTransportUnit[udg_UDex] != null and not IsUnitLoaded(u) then
            //The unit was dead, but has re-entered the map.
            call UnitEventOnUnload()
        endif
    endif
    set udg_UDex=pdex
    set u=null
    return false
endfunction
//===========================================================================
function UnitEventInit takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i= bj_MAX_PLAYER_SLOTS
    local player p
    local trigger t= CreateTrigger()
    local trigger load= CreateTrigger()
    local trigger death= CreateTrigger()
    local trigger summon= CreateTrigger()
    local rect r= GetWorldBounds()
    local region re= CreateRegion()
    local boolexpr enterB= Filter(function UnitEventEnter)
    local boolexpr orderB= Filter(function UnitEventOnOrder)
    set udg_WorldMaxX=GetRectMaxX(r)
    set udg_WorldMaxY=GetRectMaxY(r)
    call RegionAddRect(re, r)
    call RemoveRect(r)
    call UnitEventDestroyGroup(0)
    call UnitEventDestroyGroup(1)
    
    set udg_CheckDeathList[0]=0
    set udg_UnitIndexerEnabled=true
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRegion(CreateTrigger(), re, enterB)
    call TriggerAddCondition(load, Filter(function UnitEventOnLoad))
    call TriggerAddCondition(death, Filter(function UnitEventOnDeath))
    call TriggerAddCondition(summon, Filter(function UnitEventOnSummon))
    loop
        set i=i - 1
        set p=Player(i)
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(p, udg_DetectRemoveAbility, false)
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(p, udg_DetectTransformAbility, false)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEvent(summon, p, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SUMMON, null)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEvent(t, p, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER, orderB)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEvent(death, p, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH, null)
        call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEvent(load, p, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_LOADED, null)
        call GroupEnumUnitsOfPlayer(bj_lastCreatedGroup, p, enterB)
        exitwhen i == 0
    endloop
    set summon=null
    set death=null
    set load=null
    set re=null
    set enterB=null
    set orderB=null
    set p=null
    set r=null
    set t=null
endfunction
function InitTrig_Unit_Event takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction
//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit In Action
//
// Unit In Action v 1.0.0.0
// Addon to UnitEvent to simplify the AI experience of tracking which units can and cannot perform actions
// UnitIndexEvent == 1.00 >> Created
// DeathEvent == 2.00 >> Ressurrected
// CargoEvent == 2.00 >> Unloaded from a transport
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_In_Action_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_UnitInAction[udg_UDex] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_In_Action_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UnitInAction[udg_UDex]=true
    set udg_UnitInActionEvent=0.00
    set udg_UnitInActionEvent=1.00
    set udg_UnitInActionEvent=0.00
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_In_Action takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_In_Action=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Unit_In_Action, "udg_UnitIndexEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Unit_In_Action, "udg_DeathEvent", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Unit_In_Action, "udg_CargoEvent", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unit_In_Action, Condition(function Trig_Unit_In_Action_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unit_In_Action, function Trig_Unit_In_Action_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Inaction
//
// UnitIndexEvent == 2.00 >> Removed from game
// DeathEvent == 0.50 >> Starts Reincarnating
// DeathEvent == 1.00 >> Dies
// CargoEvent == 1.00 >> Loaded into a transport
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Inaction_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_UnitInAction[udg_UDex] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Inaction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_UnitInAction[udg_UDex]=false
    set udg_UnitInActionEvent=0.00
    set udg_UnitInActionEvent=2.00
    set udg_UnitInActionEvent=0.00
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_Inaction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_Inaction=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Unit_Inaction, "udg_UnitIndexEvent", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Unit_Inaction, "udg_DeathEvent", EQUAL, 0.50)
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Unit_Inaction, "udg_DeathEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Unit_Inaction, "udg_CargoEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unit_Inaction, Condition(function Trig_Unit_Inaction_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unit_Inaction, function Trig_Unit_Inaction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: On Reincarnate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_On_Reincarnate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ElendarKingResurrecting=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_On_Reincarnate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_On_Reincarnate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_On_Reincarnate, "udg_DeathEvent", EQUAL, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_On_Reincarnate, function Trig_On_Reincarnate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: On Revival
//===========================================================================
function Trig_On_Revival_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IsUnitReincarnating[udg_UDex] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_UDexUnits[udg_UDex] == udg_Unit_ElendarKing ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_On_Revival_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_On_Revival_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ElendarKingResurrecting=false
        set udg_Immortality_Point=GetUnitLoc(udg_Unit_ElendarKing)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Immortality_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Immortality_Point, "war3mapImported\\HolyAwakening.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Immortality_Point, 350.00, ( I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) * 30.00 )), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Unit_ElendarKing), udg_Immortality_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07M', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "stomp")
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Immortality_Point)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_On_Revival takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_On_Revival=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_On_Revival, "udg_DeathEvent", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_On_Revival, function Trig_On_Revival_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Call of Justice 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Call_of_Justice_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Call_of_Justice_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON=true
    set udg_Unit_Call_Of_Justice=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_01=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_02=GetSpellTargetLoc()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Call_of_Justice_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_01, Condition(function Trig_Call_of_Justice_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_01, function Trig_Call_of_Justice_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Call of Justice 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Call_Of_Justice_ON=false
    set udg_Unit_Call_Of_Justice=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_GroupUnits_Call_Of_Justice=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point_Call_Of_Justice_01, Condition(function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Func003002003))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Call_of_Justice_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_02, Condition(function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Call_of_Justice_02, function Trig_Call_of_Justice_02_Actions)
endfunction
