//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Desecration
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Desecration_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANr2', GetFilterUnit()) < 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) != true), (GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANr2', GetFilterUnit()) < 1)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) != true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) != true), (GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANr2', GetFilterUnit()) < 1)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) != true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) != true), (GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANr2', GetFilterUnit()) < 1)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Desecration_Caster)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Desecration_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Desecration_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Desecration_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func018Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter > 25 )
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func018A takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting final calculations
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Desecration_Explosion_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Desecration_Corpse_Group)
    if ( (udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter > 25) ) then // INLINED!!
        set udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter=25
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_Desecration_Total_Damage=( udg_Desecration_Level_Damage * I2R(udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter) )
    set udg_Desecration_Total_Heal=( udg_Desecration_Level_Heal * I2R(udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter) )
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating nice special effect
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Desecration_Explosion_Location, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NightElfLargeDeathExplode\\NightElfLargeDeathExplode.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Desecration_Explosion_Location, "Abilities\\Weapons\\AvengerMissile\\AvengerMissile.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Removing unit, as we don't need it anymore
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Desecration_Explosion_Location)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Damaging the units
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Desecration_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Desecration_Total_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN)
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Desecration_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Desecration_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Desecration_Location=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Desecration_Ability_Level=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), udg_Desecration_Caster)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Desecration_Area_of_Effect=250.00
    set udg_Desecration_Base_Damage=6.00
    set udg_Desecration_Level_Damage=( udg_Desecration_Base_Damage * I2R(udg_Desecration_Ability_Level) )
    set udg_Desecration_Base_Heal=10.00
    set udg_Desecration_Level_Heal=( udg_Desecration_Base_Heal * I2R(udg_Desecration_Ability_Level) )
    set udg_Desecration_Corpse_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_Desecration_Area_of_Effect, udg_Desecration_Location, Condition(function Trig_Desecration_Func015002003))
    set udg_Desecration_Damage_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_Desecration_Area_of_Effect, udg_Desecration_Location, Condition(function Trig_Desecration_Func016002003))
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Desecration_Corpse_Group, function Trig_Desecration_Func018A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Desecration_Damage_Group, function Trig_Desecration_Func019A)
    if ( Trig_Desecration_Func020C() ) then
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Creating nice special effect
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Desecration_Caster, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathPact\\DeathPactTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Creating and setting the floating text
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( "+" + I2S(R2I(udg_Desecration_Total_Heal)) ), udg_Desecration_Caster, 0, 10, 40.00, 0.00, 50.00, 0)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 3.00)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 5.00)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    else
    endif
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating nice special effect
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Desecration_Location, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlameStrike\\FlameStrikeTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Desecration_Location, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UDeathMedium\\UDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Desecration_Location, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UndeadDissipate\\UndeadDissipate.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Healing the caster
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Desecration_Caster, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Desecration_Caster) + udg_Desecration_Total_Heal ))
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Resseting the counter
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Desecration_Corpse_Counter=0
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Desecration_Location)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Desecration_Corpse_Group)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Desecration_Damage_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Desecration takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Desecration=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Desecration, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Desecration, Condition(function Trig_Desecration_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Desecration, function Trig_Desecration_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Termal Eruption
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func020A takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Damaging the units from unit group and creating nice special effects
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Termal_Eruption_Total_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\CrushingWave\\CrushingWaveDamage.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
endfunction

function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Owner=GetOwningPlayer(udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster)
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Location=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Ability_Level=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), udg_Termal_Eruption_Caster)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Area_of_Effect=200.00
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Base_Damage=90.00
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Total_Damage=( udg_Termal_Eruption_Base_Damage * I2R(udg_Termal_Eruption_Ability_Level) )
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Loop_Number=18
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Dummy_Ability='A05D'
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_DummyAbility2='A05C'
    set udg_Termal_Eruption_Damage_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_Termal_Eruption_Area_of_Effect, udg_Termal_Eruption_Location, Condition(function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func017002003))
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Termal_Eruption_Loop_Number
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting Loop Location
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set udg_Termal_Eruption_Loop_Location=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Termal_Eruption_Location, 50.00, ( 360.00 * ( I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) / I2R(udg_Termal_Eruption_Loop_Number) ) ))
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting the Dummy, ordering it to cast a spell
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Termal_Eruption_Owner, udg_Termal_Eruption_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Termal_Eruption_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "carrionswarm", udg_Termal_Eruption_Loop_Location)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Clearing Leaks
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Termal_Eruption_Loop_Location)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Termal_Eruption_Damage_Group, function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Func020A)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Dummy, ordering it to cast a spell
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Termal_Eruption_Owner, udg_Termal_Eruption_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Termal_Eruption_DummyAbility2, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_Termal_Eruption_DummyAbility2, GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Termal_Eruption_Ability_Level)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderclap")
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating nice special effects
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Termal_Eruption_Location, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Termal_Eruption_Location, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NECancelDeath\\NECancelDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing Leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Termal_Eruption_Location)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Termal_Eruption_Damage_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Termal_Eruption takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Termal_Eruption=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Termal_Eruption, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Termal_Eruption, Condition(function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Termal_Eruption, function Trig_Termal_Eruption_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magical Explosion
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A064' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 1.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 1.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetFilterUnit()) >= 1.00))), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) != true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) != true)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func019Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func019Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func019Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Damaging the units from unit group and creating nice special effects
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Magical_Explosion_Total_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NEDeathSmall\\NEDeathSmall.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( (udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) - 80.00 ))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) - 160.00 ))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( (udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) - 250.00 ))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_Owner=GetOwningPlayer(udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster)
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_Location=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), udg_Magical_Explosion_Caster)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_AreaOfEffect=200.00
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_Base_Damage=100.00
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_Total_Damage=( udg_Magical_Explosion_Base_Damage * I2R(udg_Magical_Explosion_AbilityLevel) )
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_Loop_Number=18
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_DummyAbility='A065'
    set udg_Magical_Explosion_Damage_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_Magical_Explosion_AreaOfEffect, udg_Magical_Explosion_Location, Condition(function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func016002003))
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Magical_Explosion_Loop_Number
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting Loop Location
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set udg_Magical_Explosion_LoopLocation=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Magical_Explosion_Location, 50.00, ( 360.00 * ( I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) / I2R(udg_Magical_Explosion_Loop_Number) ) ))
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting the Dummy, ordering it to cast a spell
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Magical_Explosion_Owner, udg_Magical_Explosion_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Magical_Explosion_DummyAbility, GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "carrionswarm", udg_Termal_Eruption_Loop_Location)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Clearing Leaks
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Magical_Explosion_LoopLocation)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Magical_Explosion_Damage_Group, function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Func019A)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing Leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Magical_Explosion_Location)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Magical_Explosion_Damage_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magical_Explosion takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magical_Explosion=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magical_Explosion, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Magical_Explosion, Condition(function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magical_Explosion, function Trig_Magical_Explosion_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Ship
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Ship_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSummonedUnit()) == 'h04N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Ship_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetSummonedUnit(), 50.00, 100, 50.00, 50.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetSummonedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\CrushingWave\\CrushingWaveDamage.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetSummonedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ(GetSummonedUnit(), true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Ship takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Ship=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ghost_Ship, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SUMMON)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Ship, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Ship_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Ship, function Trig_Ghost_Ship_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Energy Blast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Energy_Blast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nmgv' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Energy_Blast_Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Energy_Blast_Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 800.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Energy_Blast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\TheHolyBomb.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Energy_Blast_Func005002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Energy_Blast_Func006002)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Energy_Blast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Energy_Blast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Energy_Blast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Energy_Blast, Condition(function Trig_Energy_Blast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Energy_Blast, function Trig_Energy_Blast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancestors
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancestors_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancestors_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h057', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 150.00, 0.00), GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 150.00, 0), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100, 20.00, 20.00, 50.00)
    call SetUnitPathing(GetLastCreatedUnit(), false)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(40.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h058', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 150.00, 180.00), GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 150.00, 180.00), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 20.00, 20.00, 100, 50.00)
    call SetUnitPathing(GetLastCreatedUnit(), false)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(40.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h059', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 150.00, 270.00), GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Point, 150.00, 270.00), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 20.00, 100, 20.00, 50.00)
    call SetUnitPathing(GetLastCreatedUnit(), false)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(40.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancestors takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancestors=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ancestors, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ancestors, Condition(function Trig_Ancestors_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ancestors, function Trig_Ancestors_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancestors end
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancestors_end_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h057' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h058' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h059' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Ancestors_end_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Ancestors_end_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancestors_end_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\ToonBoom\\ToonBoom.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancestors_end takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancestors_end=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ancestors_end, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ancestors_end, Condition(function Trig_Ancestors_end_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ancestors_end, function Trig_Ancestors_end_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magic Ball
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magic_Ball_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h05R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Ball_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Ball_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) - 200.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetEnumUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NEDeathSmall\\NEDeathSmall.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Ball_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point_Magic_Ball=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point_Magic_Ball, Condition(function Trig_Magic_Ball_Func003002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Magic_Ball_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_Magic_Ball)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magic_Ball takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magic_Ball=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magic_Ball, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Magic_Ball, Condition(function Trig_Magic_Ball_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magic_Ball, function Trig_Magic_Ball_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Burst
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Burst_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func015002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func015002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func015002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Fire_Burst_Caster)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func015002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Fire_Burst_Caster)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func015002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Fire_Burst_Caster)) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Damaging the Arera and creating special effect
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Fire_Burst_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Fire_Burst_Total_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating special effect
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Weapons\\RedDragonBreath\\RedDragonMissile.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Burst_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Location=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Owner=GetOwningPlayer(udg_Fire_Burst_Caster)
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Ability_Level=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), udg_Fire_Burst_Caster)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Area_of_Effect=225.00
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Base_Damage=100.00
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Total_Damage=( udg_Fire_Burst_Base_Damage * I2R(udg_Fire_Burst_Ability_Level) )
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Dummy_Ability='A00A'
    set udg_Fire_Burst_Damage_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_Fire_Burst_Area_of_Effect, udg_Fire_Burst_Location, Condition(function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func015002003))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=25
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Creating and setting the dummy
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Fire_Burst_Owner, udg_Fire_Burst_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( 20.00 * I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) ), 0.00)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Creating special effect
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\SpellBreakerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Fire_Burst_Damage_Group, function Trig_Fire_Burst_Func017A)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating special effect
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Fire_Burst_Location, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Doom\\DoomDeath.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Fire_Burst_Location, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\NeutralBuildingExplosion\\NeutralBuildingExplosion.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating and setting the dummy
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Fire_Burst_Owner, udg_Fire_Burst_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Fire_Burst_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_Fire_Burst_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Fire_Burst_Ability_Level)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "flamestrike", udg_Fire_Burst_Location)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Fire_Burst_Location)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Fire_Burst_Damage_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Burst takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Burst=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fire_Burst, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fire_Burst, Condition(function Trig_Fire_Burst_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Burst, function Trig_Fire_Burst_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Holy Blessing
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Holy_Blessing_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Blessing_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    local unit u= GetTriggerUnit()
    local unit t= GetSpellTargetUnit()
    local integer i= GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), u)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Heal base value
    local real r= 90.
    // Heal total value
    local real h= r * I2R(i)
    // Base duration
    local real w= 2.
    // Total Duration
    local real w2= w * i
    // Special effects
    local string s= "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.mdl"
    local string s2= "war3mapImported\\HolyArmor.MDX"
    // Attachment point
    local string a= "chest"
    local effect e
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Starting the spell effect
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Healing unit
    call SetWidgetLife(t, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, t) + h ))
    // Making unit invulnerable
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(t, true)
    // Creating special effect 
    call DestroyEffect(AddSpecialEffectTarget(s, t, a))
    // Creating special effect that will last as long as last duration
    set e=AddSpecialEffectTarget(s2, t, a)
    // Waiting for the end of duration
    call PolledWait(w2)
    // Making unit back vulnerable
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(t, false)
    // Destroying special effect
    call DestroyEffect(e)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Nulling locals
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set u=null
    set t=null
    set e=null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Holy_Blessing takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Holy_Blessing=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Holy_Blessing, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Holy_Blessing, Condition(function Trig_Holy_Blessing_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Holy_Blessing, function Trig_Holy_Blessing_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arcane Torment
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A082' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGIC)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(250.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arcane_Torment takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arcane_Torment=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Arcane_Torment, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Arcane_Torment, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Arcane_Torment, function Trig_Arcane_Torment_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Protection of the Nature
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A049', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "entanglingroots", GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction
