    set gg_trg_Protection_of_the_Nature=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Protection_of_the_Nature, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Protection_of_the_Nature, Condition(function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Protection_of_the_Nature, function Trig_Protection_of_the_Nature_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: The Dragon Slayer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_The_Dragon_Slayer_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A027' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Dragon_Slayer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\Kingdom Come_opt.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectTimeScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.50)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_7019", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 8.00, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 30.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A027', GetTriggerUnit())
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A027', true, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_The_Dragon_Slayer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_The_Dragon_Slayer=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_The_Dragon_Slayer, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_The_Dragon_Slayer, Condition(function Trig_The_Dragon_Slayer_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_The_Dragon_Slayer, function Trig_The_Dragon_Slayer_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heroic Leap Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A051' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_Points[2], PATHING_TYPE_WALKABILITY) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Func032C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_Leapers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Stores caster into variable
    set udg_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    // Finds caster's location and center of target AoE
    set udg_Points[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Caster)
    set udg_Points[2]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    // Fixes the Out-of-Boundary bugg
    if ( Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('texp', udg_Points[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Points[2])
        set udg_Points[2]=GetItemLoc(GetLastCreatedItem())
        call RemoveItem(GetLastCreatedItem())
    else
    endif
    // Stores distance-to-jump into variable
    set udg_Real[1]=DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Points[1], udg_Points[2])
    // Counts up the Distance at which Caster shall start landing
    set udg_Real[2]=( udg_Real[1] / 2.00 )
    // Counts angle at which caster shall 'jump'
    set udg_Real[3]=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Points[1], udg_Points[2])
    // Turns Caster's collision off, as we want it jump above (go through) any obstacle
    call SetUnitPathing(udg_Caster, false)
    // Makes Caster invulnerable
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_Caster, true)
    // Adds to and removes from Caster Storm Crow Form spell , allowing us to manipulate the Flying height of Caster
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Arav', udg_Caster)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Arav', udg_Caster)
    // Creates a trail SFX and instantly destroys it, fixing the leak
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Caster, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Invisibility\\InvisibilityTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // Stores all Information needed to the Hashtable
    // NOTE 1: All information is attached to caster
    // Never, EVER, make hashtable-based MUI spells, that are cast by Caster and Information is attached to the Target, as it will cause huge bugg
    call SaveRealBJ(udg_Real[1], 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
    call SaveRealBJ(udg_Real[2], 1, GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
    call SaveRealBJ(udg_Real[3], 2, GetHandleIdBJ(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
    // Checks if there is any instance of spell already in game
    // If not, then turns sliding trigger on
    if ( Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Func032C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Slide)
    else
    endif
    // Adds caster to leapers' group
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Leapers)
    // Clears the leaks
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Points[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Points[2])
    // NOTE 2: AoE, damage and stun duration are all works in Object Editor, spells Heroic Leap and Dummy Stomp
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heroic_Leap_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Cast, function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heroic Leap Slide
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Func001Func015Func023001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Real[1] > udg_Real[2] )
endfunction

function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Func001Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Real[1] >= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    // Stores Caster into variable, solely for faster code writing
    set udg_Caster=GetEnumUnit()
    // Loads distance-to-jump and reduces it by SPEED
    // NOTE 1: This reducement MUST be equal to the offset by real number in the countings of Points[2]
    set udg_Real[1]=LoadRealBJ(0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
    set udg_Real[1]=( udg_Real[1] - 33.00 )
    // Loads distance-to-rise
    set udg_Real[2]=LoadRealBJ(1, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
    // Loads jump angle
    set udg_Real[3]=LoadRealBJ(2, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
    // Finds current position of Caster and Counts the next Point-to-move
    set udg_Points[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Caster)
    set udg_Points[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Points[1], 33.00, udg_Real[3])
    // Checks if it is time to finish landing
    if ( Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Func001Func015C() ) then
        // If not, then...
        // Moves Caster to the Points[2], making it slide
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Caster, udg_Points[2])
        // Checks if the distance-to-jump is greater than distance-to-rise
        // If it is, then sets bonus jump height into positive real number, else, to negative, but equal one
        if ( (udg_Real[1] > udg_Real[2]) ) then // INLINED!!
            set udg_Real[3]=20.00
        else
            set udg_Real[3]=- 20.00
        endif
        // Increases/decreases flying height of caster, making it 'jump'
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(udg_Caster, ( GetUnitFlyHeight(udg_Caster) + udg_Real[3] ), 0.00)
        // Updates reduced distance-to-jump
        call SaveRealBJ(udg_Real[1], 0, GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
    else
        // If it is, then...
        // Fixes Caster's collision, vulnerability and flying height
        call SetUnitPathing(udg_Caster, true)
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_Caster, false)
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(udg_Caster, GetUnitDefaultFlyHeight(udg_Caster), 0.00)
        // Plays caster's slam animation
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Caster, "slam")
        // Does the AoE-stunning
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Caster), udg_Points[2], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(0.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A01O', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01O', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A051', udg_Caster))
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "stomp")
        // Clears the Hashtable
        call FlushChildHashtableBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_Hashtable)
        // Removes Caster from leapers' group
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_Caster, udg_Leapers)
    endif
    // Clears the Leaks
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Points[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Points[2])
endfunction

function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_Leapers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Leapers, function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Func001A)
    // Checks if there is any instance of spell left after this loop
    // If not, then turns this trigger off
    if ( Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heroic_Leap_Slide takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Slide=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Slide)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Slide, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Heroic_Leap_Slide, function Trig_Heroic_Leap_Slide_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Multi Shot
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Multi_Shot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A022' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multi_Shot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Owner=GetOwningPlayer(udg_Multi_Shot_Caster)
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Ability_Level=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), udg_Multi_Shot_Caster)
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Facing=GetUnitFacing(udg_Multi_Shot_Caster)
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Location=GetUnitLoc(udg_Multi_Shot_Caster)
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Location_2=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Base_Arrow_Count=10
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Total_Arrow_Count=( ( udg_Multi_Shot_Base_Arrow_Count / 2 ) * udg_Multi_Shot_Ability_Level )
    set udg_Multi_Shot_Dummy_Ability='A00Z'
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Dummy, ordering it to cast a spell
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Multi_Shot_Owner, udg_Multi_Shot_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Multi_Shot_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_Multi_Shot_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Multi_Shot_Ability_Level)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "carrionswarm", udg_Multi_Shot_Location_2)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Multi_Shot_Total_Arrow_Count
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting Loop Location
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set udg_Multi_Shot_Loop_Location=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Multi_Shot_Location, 50.00, ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Multi_Shot_Location, udg_Multi_Shot_Location_2) + ( 2.00 * I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ))
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting the Dummy, ordering it to cast a spell
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Multi_Shot_Owner, udg_Multi_Shot_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Multi_Shot_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_Multi_Shot_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Multi_Shot_Ability_Level)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "carrionswarm", udg_Multi_Shot_Loop_Location)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting Loop Location
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set udg_Multi_Shot_Loop_Location2=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Multi_Shot_Location, 50.00, ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Multi_Shot_Location, udg_Multi_Shot_Location_2) - ( 2.00 * I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ))
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting the Dummy, ordering it to cast a spell
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', udg_Multi_Shot_Owner, udg_Multi_Shot_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Multi_Shot_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(udg_Multi_Shot_Dummy_Ability, GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Multi_Shot_Ability_Level)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "carrionswarm", udg_Multi_Shot_Loop_Location2)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Clearing Leaks
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Multi_Shot_Loop_Location)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Multi_Shot_Loop_Location2)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing Leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Multi_Shot_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Multi_Shot_Location_2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Multi_Shot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Multi_Shot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Multi_Shot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Multi_Shot, Condition(function Trig_Multi_Shot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Multi_Shot, function Trig_Multi_Shot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magic Arm
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magic_Arm_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A02K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func017002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func017002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func017002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func017002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func017002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster)) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func018A takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Damaging the Area, burning mana  and creating special effects
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Ion_Canon_Total_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) - udg_Ion_Canon_Total_Mana_Burn ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Weapons\\DragonHawkMissile\\DragonHawkMissile.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Arm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Ability_Level=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), udg_Ion_Canon_Caster)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Distance=50.00
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Loop_Number=25
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Base_Damage=45.00
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Total_Damage=( udg_Ion_Canon_Base_Damage * I2R(udg_Ion_Canon_Ability_Level) )
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Base_Mana_Burn=40.00
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Total_Mana_Burn=( udg_Ion_Canon_Base_Mana_Burn * I2R(udg_Ion_Canon_Ability_Level) )
    set udg_Ion_Canon_AoE=75.00
    set udg_Ion_Canon_Location=PolarProjectionBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster), 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster))
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating and setting the dummy
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h000', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster), udg_Ion_Canon_Location, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster))
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_Ion_Canon_Loop_Number
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting a location
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set udg_Ion_Canon_Loop_Location=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Ion_Canon_Location, ( udg_Ion_Canon_Distance * I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) ), GetUnitFacing(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster))
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Creating and setting the dummy
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h01T', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster), udg_Ion_Canon_Loop_Location, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ion_Canon_Caster))
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A024', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A024', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00, 0.00)
        call SetUnitPathing(GetLastCreatedUnit(), false)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(( 0.85 - ( 0.01 * I2R(GetForLoopIndexA()) ) ), 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Setting the unit group
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        set udg_Ion_Canon_Damage_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_Ion_Canon_AoE, udg_Ion_Canon_Loop_Location, Condition(function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func017002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Ion_Canon_Damage_Group, function Trig_Magic_Arm_Func022Func018A)
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // Clearing leaks
        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        call DestroyGroup(udg_Ion_Canon_Damage_Group)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Ion_Canon_Loop_Location)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Ion_Canon_Location)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magic_Arm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magic_Arm=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magic_Arm, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Magic_Arm, Condition(function Trig_Magic_Arm_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magic_Arm, function Trig_Magic_Arm_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Beer barrel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Beer_barrel_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beer_barrel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(4.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A05T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "curse", GetTriggerUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(4.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A05U', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "slow", GetTriggerUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_7865", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 7.00, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Beer_barrel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Beer_barrel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Beer_barrel, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Beer_barrel, Condition(function Trig_Beer_barrel_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Beer_barrel, function Trig_Beer_barrel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Beast Attack
//
// Note:
// You must copy the variable and one action from initalization to your map, else knock back won't work!
// Variable and action are:
// Create hashtable 
// Knockback table
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Beast_Attack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beast_Attack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Getting the Spell constants
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Target=GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Ability_Level=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), udg_Beast_Attack_Caster)
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Location=GetUnitLoc(udg_Beast_Attack_Caster)
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Location2=GetUnitLoc(udg_Beast_Attack_Target)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Setting the Spell values
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Max_Life=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, udg_Beast_Attack_Caster)
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Damage_Splitter=8
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Atribute=GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_Beast_Attack_Caster, true)
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Life_Damage=( udg_Beast_Attack_Max_Life / I2R(udg_Beast_Attack_Damage_Splitter) )
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Atribute_Damage=( I2R(udg_Beast_Attack_Atribute) * I2R(udg_Beast_Attack_Ability_Level) )
    set udg_Beast_Attack_Total_Damage=120.00
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Knockback Setings
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    set udg_KnockbackAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Beast_Attack_Location, udg_Beast_Attack_Location2)
    set udg_KnockbackSpeed=12.00
    set udg_KnockbackDistance=300.00
    call SaveRealBJ(udg_KnockbackSpeed, StringHashBJ("speed"), GetHandleIdBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
    call SaveRealBJ(udg_KnockbackAngle, StringHashBJ("angle"), GetHandleIdBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
    call SaveRealBJ(udg_KnockbackDistance, StringHashBJ("distance"), GetHandleIdBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
    call SetUnitPathing(udg_Beast_Attack_Target, false)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_Beast_Attack_Target, udg_KnockbackUnits)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_KnockbackUnits)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Damaging the target
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Beast_Attack_Caster, udg_Beast_Attack_Target, udg_Beast_Attack_Total_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Creating nice special effect
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("hand, left", udg_Beast_Attack_Caster, "units\\human\\phoenix\\phoenix.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("hand, right", udg_Beast_Attack_Caster, "units\\human\\phoenix\\phoenix.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Crreating Floating Text
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( I2S(R2I(udg_Beast_Attack_Total_Damage)) + "!" ), udg_Beast_Attack_Caster, 0, 10, 100.00, 5.00, 5.00, 0)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 3.00)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 5.00)
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Clearing leaks
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Beast_Attack_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Beast_Attack_Location2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Beast_Attack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Beast_Attack=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Beast_Attack, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Beast_Attack, Condition(function Trig_Beast_Attack_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Beast_Attack, function Trig_Beast_Attack_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KnockbackUnits
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT05' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT07' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT06' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT04' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT09' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT11' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT10' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT08' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT00' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LT02' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'B00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTt5' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'YTpc' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'YTpb' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTg2' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTg4' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTg1' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTg3' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'B00B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'B00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'DTg6' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'DTg8' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'DTg5' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'DTg7' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTs8' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTr8' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTs6' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetDestructableTypeId(GetEnumDestructable()) != 'LTr6' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func005Func001C() ) then
        call KillDestructable(GetEnumDestructable())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func006Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_KnockbackUnits) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_Knockback_Loc2, PATHING_TYPE_WALKABILITY) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_KnockbackUnits) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_KnockbackDistance > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_KnockbackSpeed=LoadRealBJ(StringHashBJ("speed"), GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
    set udg_KnockbackAngle=LoadRealBJ(StringHashBJ("angle"), GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
    set udg_KnockbackDistance=LoadRealBJ(StringHashBJ("distance"), GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
    if ( Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Knockback_Loc1=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Knockback_Loc2=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Knockback_Loc1, udg_KnockbackSpeed, udg_KnockbackAngle)
        call EnumDestructablesInCircleBJ(175.00, udg_Knockback_Loc1, function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func005A)
        if ( Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func006C() ) then
            call SetUnitPathing(udg_Knockback_Target, true)
            call SetUnitPathing(GetEnumUnit(), true)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Knockback_Loc1)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Knockback_Loc2)
            call FlushChildHashtableBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_KnockbackUnits)
            if ( Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func006Func007C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_KnockbackUnits)
            else
            endif
        else
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Knockback_Loc2)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Weapons\\AncientProtectorMissile\\AncientProtectorMissile.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call SaveRealBJ(( udg_KnockbackDistance - udg_KnockbackSpeed ), StringHashBJ("distance"), GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Knockback_Loc1)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Knockback_Loc2)
        endif
    else
        call SetUnitPathing(udg_Knockback_Target, true)
        call SetUnitPathing(GetEnumUnit(), true)
        call FlushChildHashtableBJ(GetHandleIdBJ(GetEnumUnit()), udg_KnockbackTable)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_KnockbackUnits)
        if ( Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004Func004Func009C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_KnockbackUnits)
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    // Leave this actions as they are/// You can add change special effects but that's it
    // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_KnockbackUnits, function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Func004A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KnockbackUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KnockbackUnits=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_KnockbackUnits)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_KnockbackUnits, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KnockbackUnits, function Trig_KnockbackUnits_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Powerful Mana Burn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A043' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A044', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Powerful_Mana_Burn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Powerful_Mana_Burn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Powerful_Mana_Burn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Powerful_Mana_Burn, Condition(function Trig_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Powerful_Mana_Burn, function Trig_Powerful_Mana_Burn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Captain Sword
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Captain_Sword_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A090' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Captain_Sword_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08Z', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "carrionswarm", udg_Point2)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Captain_Sword=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Captain_Sword, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Captain_Sword, Condition(function Trig_Captain_Sword_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Captain_Sword, function Trig_Captain_Sword_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Taxes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Taxes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A093' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Taxes_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'h008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Taxes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == 'nmgv' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Taxes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Taxes_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_4991", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 10, 100, 100, 100, 0)
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(200, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetTriggerUnit(), "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl")
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 50.00, GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        if ( Trig_Taxes_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_4992", GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 10, 100, 100, 100, 0)
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 64, 90)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 4.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 2.00)
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(100, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetTriggerUnit(), "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl")
            call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_ReceiveGold, 50.00, GetTriggerUnit())
        else
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A093')
            call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 50.00 ))
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Taxes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Taxes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Taxes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Taxes, Condition(function Trig_Taxes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Taxes, function Trig_Taxes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blood Rage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blood_Rage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'h03Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09E', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Rage_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ReadIndex == udg_Write_Index ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Rage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Write_Index=( udg_Write_Index + 1 )
    set udg_RageUnit[udg_Write_Index]=GetAttackedUnitBJ()
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09E', udg_RageUnit[udg_Write_Index])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09D', udg_RageUnit[udg_Write_Index])
    call IssueImmediateOrderById(udg_RageUnit[udg_Write_Index], 852623)
    call TriggerSleepAction(( 120.00 - 0.50 ))
    set udg_ReadIndex=( udg_ReadIndex + 1 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09D', udg_RageUnit[udg_ReadIndex])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09E', udg_RageUnit[udg_ReadIndex])
    if ( Trig_Blood_Rage_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_Write_Index=0
        set udg_ReadIndex=0
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blood_Rage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blood_Rage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blood_Rage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blood_Rage, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Rage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blood_Rage, function Trig_Blood_Rage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Multishot
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Multishot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AS' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multishot_Func002002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Multishot_Func002002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Multishot_Func002002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Multishot_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ArrowVolleyV2_Portrait.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 150.00, ATTACK_TYPE_PIERCE, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Multishot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetRandomSubGroup(5, GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Multishot_Func002002002003)))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Multishot_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Multishot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Multishot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Multishot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Multishot, Condition(function Trig_Multishot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Multishot, function Trig_Multishot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shield Bash
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shield_Bash_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AV' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func006002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func006002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 150.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Shield_Bash_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AW', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "stomp")
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func006002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Shield_Bash_Func007A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shield_Bash takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shield_Bash=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Shield_Bash, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shield_Bash, Condition(function Trig_Shield_Bash_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shield_Bash, function Trig_Shield_Bash_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ice Blast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ice_Blast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0B9' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ice_Blast_Func008002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Ice_Blast_Func008002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ice_Blast_Func008002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Ice_Blast_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0B8', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "frostnova", GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Ice_Blast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\Flamestrike Mystic II.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.80)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "war3mapImported\\Pillar of Flame Blue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Ice_Blast_Func008002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Ice_Blast_Func009A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ice_Blast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ice_Blast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ice_Blast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ice_Blast, Condition(function Trig_Ice_Blast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ice_Blast, function Trig_Ice_Blast_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Sentry Turret 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sentry_Turret_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSummonedUnit()) == 'h066' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentry_Turret_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(60.00, 'BTLF', GetSummonedUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sentry_Turret_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SUMMON)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_01, Condition(function Trig_Sentry_Turret_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_01, function Trig_Sentry_Turret_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sentry Turret 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sentry_Turret_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'h066' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentry_Turret_02_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Sentry_Turret_Attack_Points == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentry_Turret_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Sentry_Turret_Attack_Points=( udg_Sentry_Turret_Attack_Points + 1 )
    if ( Trig_Sentry_Turret_02_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Sentry_Turret_Attack_Points=0
        call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0BF', GetAttacker())
        call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown(GetAttacker(), ( BlzGetUnitAttackCooldown(GetAttacker(), 0) - 0.10 ), 1)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sentry_Turret_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_02, Condition(function Trig_Sentry_Turret_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sentry_Turret_02, function Trig_Sentry_Turret_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wrath 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wrath_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AM' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wrath_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AN', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AL', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "unholyfrenzy", GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Wrath_Timer, false, 30.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Wrath_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wrath_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wrath_01, Condition(function Trig_Wrath_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wrath_01, function Trig_Wrath_01_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Wrath_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AN', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
