    set gg_trg_Wrath_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Wrath_02, udg_Wrath_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wrath_02, function Trig_Wrath_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Promote 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Promote_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A094' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Promote_01_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PromotedUnits <= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'B02Q') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Promote_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Promote_01_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A099', GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A095', GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A096', GetSpellTargetUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIsm\\AIsmTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_PromotedUnits=( udg_PromotedUnits + 1 )
        call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Promote_02, GetSpellTargetUnit(), EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    else
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A094')
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 50.00 ))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Promote_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Promote_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Promote_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Promote_01, Condition(function Trig_Promote_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Promote_01, function Trig_Promote_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Promote 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Promote_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PromotedUnits=( udg_PromotedUnits - 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Promote_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Promote_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Promote_02, function Trig_Promote_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Berserk 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Berserk_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'H069' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AI', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R031', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Berserk_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AI', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AK', GetTriggerUnit())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "resurrection")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Berserk_Timer, false, 120.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AJ', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "unholyfrenzy", GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Berserk_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Berserk_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Berserk_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Berserk_01, Condition(function Trig_Berserk_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Berserk_01, function Trig_Berserk_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Berserk 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Berserk_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Berserk_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AK', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AI', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AN', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Berserk_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Berserk_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Berserk_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Berserk_02, Condition(function Trig_Berserk_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Berserk_02, function Trig_Berserk_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Berserk 03
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Berserk_03_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AK', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AI', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Berserk_03 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Berserk_03=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Berserk_03, udg_Berserk_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Berserk_03, function Trig_Berserk_03_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unholy Fire 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unholy_Fire_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09R', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Unholy_Fire_On=true
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unholy_Fire_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_01, Condition(function Trig_Unholy_Fire_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_01, function Trig_Unholy_Fire_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unholy Fire 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'O007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Unholy_Fire_On == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire < 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire < 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=( udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire + 1 )
        else
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09R', GetAttacker())
            set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=0
            set udg_Unholy_Fire_On=false
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=( udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire + 1 )
        else
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09R', GetAttacker())
            set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=0
            set udg_Unholy_Fire_On=false
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=( udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire + 1 )
        else
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09R', GetAttacker())
            set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=0
            set udg_Unholy_Fire_On=false
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unholy_Fire_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02, Condition(function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02, function Trig_Unholy_Fire_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unholy Fire 03
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unholy_Fire_03_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Unholy_Fire_On == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fire_03_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09R', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Integer_Unholy_Fire=0
    set udg_Unholy_Fire_On=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_02)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unholy_Fire_03 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_03=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_03, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_03, Condition(function Trig_Unholy_Fire_03_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unholy_Fire_03, function Trig_Unholy_Fire_03_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Arrival 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Arrival_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A034' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Arrival_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Dark_Arrival_ON=true
    set udg_Unit_Dark_Arrival=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_01=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_02=GetSpellTargetLoc()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Arrival_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_01, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_01, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Arrival_01_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_01, function Trig_Dark_Arrival_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Arrival 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A034' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Dark_Arrival_ON=false
    set udg_Unit_Dark_Arrival=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_GroupUnits_Dark_Arrival=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point_Dark_Arrival_01, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Func003002003))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Arrival_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_02, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Arrival_02, function Trig_Dark_Arrival_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sword of Cruelty Item
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'O007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Integer_SwordOfCruelty < 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Integer_SwordOfCruelty=( udg_Integer_SwordOfCruelty + 1 )
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Point_SwordOfCruelty=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_Point_SwordOfCruelty, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09O', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "unholyfrenzy", GetAttacker())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Point_SwordOfCruelty)
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        set udg_Integer_SwordOfCruelty=0
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item, Condition(function Trig_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item, function Trig_Sword_of_Cruelty_Item_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Life Leech
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Life_Leech_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Leech_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09S', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Leech_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09S', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Leech_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09S', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Life_Leech_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Life_Leech_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 100.00 ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Life_Leech_Func002C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 200.00 ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Life_Leech_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 300.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Life_Leech takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Life_Leech=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Life_Leech, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Life_Leech, Condition(function Trig_Life_Leech_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Life_Leech, function Trig_Life_Leech_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blight_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetBlightRadiusLocBJ(true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, 300.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blight=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blight, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blight, Condition(function Trig_Blight_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blight, function Trig_Blight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Invigorate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Invigorate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A068' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Func002002003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Func002002003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00))), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A069', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A069', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A068', GetTriggerUnit()))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "rejuvination", GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GroupUnits) <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Invigorate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Invigorate_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Invigorate_Func003C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A068')
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 160.00 ))
        if udg_ErrorSound == null then
        set udg_ErrorSound=CreateSoundFromLabel("InterfaceError", false, false, false, 10, 10)
        endif
        if ( GetLocalPlayer() != udg_ErrorPlayer ) then
        call StartSound(udg_ErrorSound)
        endif
    else
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Invigorate_Func003Func002A)
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Invigorate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Invigorate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Invigorate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Invigorate, Condition(function Trig_Invigorate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Invigorate, function Trig_Invigorate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unholy Armor and Forst Armor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A031' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AUfa' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AUfu' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04B' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A031' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'BUfa') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AUfa' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AUfu' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04B' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'B01W') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('BUfa', GetSpellTargetUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('B01W', GetSpellTargetUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor, Condition(function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor, function Trig_Unholy_Armor_and_Forst_Armor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Create Corpses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Create_Corpses_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Create_Corpses_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateCorpseLocBJ('ugho', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point)
    call CreateCorpseLocBJ('ugho', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point)
    call CreateCorpseLocBJ('ugho', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point)
    call CreateCorpseLocBJ('ugho', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Create_Corpses takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Create_Corpses=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Create_Corpses, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Create_Corpses, Condition(function Trig_Create_Corpses_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Create_Corpses, function Trig_Create_Corpses_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Flesh Devorer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 'Ucrl' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_FleshDevorerLearned == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetKillingUnitBJ()) + 50 ))
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + 50.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetKillingUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Banish\\BanishTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Flesh_Devorer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer, Condition(function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer, function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Flesh Devorer Learned
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Learned_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Ucrl' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A084' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Learned_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FleshDevorerLearned=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Flesh_Devorer_Learned takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer_Learned=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer_Learned, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer_Learned, Condition(function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Learned_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Flesh_Devorer_Learned, function Trig_Flesh_Devorer_Learned_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Banshee Form
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Banshee_Form_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A080' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Banshee_Form_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathCoil\\DeathCoilSpecialArt.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIre\\AIreTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'ANba', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'ANba', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Banshee_Form takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Banshee_Form=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Banshee_Form, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Banshee_Form, Condition(function Trig_Banshee_Form_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Banshee_Form, function Trig_Banshee_Form_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unholy Fury 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(gg_unit_Nplh_1034) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Unholy_Fury_Level_Set=false
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A078', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A077', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034, 1)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A078', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A077', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034, 2)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Func001Func004C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A078', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A077', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034, 3)
        else
        endif
    else
        call SetUnitUserData(gg_unit_Nplh_1034, ( GetUnitUserData(gg_unit_Nplh_1034) + 1 ))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unholy_Fury_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unholy_Fury_01=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Unholy_Fury_01, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unholy_Fury_01, function Trig_Unholy_Fury_01_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unholy Fury 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetAttacker() == gg_unit_Nplh_1034 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitUserData(gg_unit_Nplh_1034, 0)
    if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Unholy_Fury_Level_Set=false
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003Func002C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A077', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A078', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034, 1)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003Func003C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A077', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A078', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034, 2)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Func003Func004C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A077', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A077', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A078', GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_Nplh_1034))
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034)
            call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A078', gg_unit_Nplh_1034, 3)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unholy_Fury_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unholy_Fury_02=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unholy_Fury_02, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unholy_Fury_02, Condition(function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unholy_Fury_02, function Trig_Unholy_Fury_02_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lord Strength
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lord_Strength_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A074' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lord_Strength_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 1.00, 1)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A075', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A075', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Doom\\DoomTarget.mdl")
    set udg_Lord_Strength_Effect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(40.00)
    call BlzSetUnitAttackCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 2.00, 1)
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A075', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A075', GetTriggerUnit())
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Lord_Strength_Effect)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lord_Strength takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lord_Strength=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Lord_Strength, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lord_Strength, Condition(function Trig_Lord_Strength_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lord_Strength, function Trig_Lord_Strength_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mighty Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mighty_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mighty_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06O', GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(20.00)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06O', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mighty_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mighty_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mighty_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mighty_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Mighty_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mighty_Strike, function Trig_Mighty_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dawnfall Graveyard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Northwall_Pass_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Northwall_Pass_Anti_Death_Knight, udg_Point2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_Point2, PATHING_TYPE_BUILDABILITY) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point2=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A06J')
            call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 150.00 ))
            if udg_ErrorSound == null then
            set udg_ErrorSound=CreateSoundFromLabel("InterfaceError", false, false, false, 10, 10)
            endif
            if ( GetLocalPlayer() != udg_ErrorPlayer ) then
            call StartSound(udg_ErrorSound)
            endif
        else
            call KillUnit(udg_DawnfallGraveyard)
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point2, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point2, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point2, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Charm\\CharmTarget.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h04O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point2, BlzGetLocalUnitZ(GetTriggerUnit()))
            set udg_DawnfallGraveyard=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            set udg_ResurrectionPointTyrial=GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit())
        endif
    else
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A06J')
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 150.00 ))
        if udg_ErrorSound == null then
        set udg_ErrorSound=CreateSoundFromLabel("InterfaceError", false, false, false, 10, 10)
        endif
        if ( GetLocalPlayer() != udg_ErrorPlayer ) then
        call StartSound(udg_ErrorSound)
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dawnfall_Graveyard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard, Condition(function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard, function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dawnfall Graveyard dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h04O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ResurrectionPointTyrial=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Brown_Servants)
    set udg_DawnfallGraveyard=null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies, Condition(function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies, function Trig_Dawnfall_Graveyard_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Strike_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06F', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DeathStrikeLearned == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Death_Strike_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06B', GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_DeathStrikeLearned=true
    else
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06B', GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06F', GetTriggerUnit()))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Death_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Death_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Death_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_Strike, function Trig_Death_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Regeneration
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Regeneration_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regeneration_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06E', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06E', GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A06D', GetTriggerUnit()))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "rejuvination", GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Regeneration takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Regeneration=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Regeneration, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Regeneration, Condition(function Trig_Regeneration_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Regeneration, function Trig_Regeneration_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rise of the Dead
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'h02I' )
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'h02I')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'h02I'))), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func003Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point2=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Point2, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point2, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100, 30.00, 30.00, 0)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(50.00, 'BUan', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GroupUnits) <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetRandomSubGroup(6, GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_Point, Condition(function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func002002002003)))
    if ( Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func003C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A06A')
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 200.00 ))
        if udg_ErrorSound == null then
        set udg_ErrorSound=CreateSoundFromLabel("InterfaceError", false, false, false, 10, 10)
        endif
        if ( GetLocalPlayer() != udg_ErrorPlayer ) then
        call StartSound(udg_ErrorSound)
        endif
    else
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Func003Func011A)
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rise_of_the_Dead takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rise_of_the_Dead=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Rise_of_the_Dead, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Rise_of_the_Dead, Condition(function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rise_of_the_Dead, function Trig_Rise_of_the_Dead_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti Undead Shield Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YZef', gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A04V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01N', 0, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Init, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Init, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti Undead Shield Activate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Func004002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_EnergyShieldGroup)
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'YZef', gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(true, 'A04V', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('R01N', 10, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTextToForce(udg_HumanPlayers, ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + " |cff00ff00activated his energy shield against the undead!|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield, Condition(function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Func004002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Func005002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate, Condition(function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Activate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti Undead Shield Reload mana
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Func004002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_EnergyShieldGroup)
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'YZef', gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)
    call DisplayTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[1], ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + " |cff00ff00The mana of the generator has been restored! The Anti-Undead Shield reactivated if it was not.|r" ))
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield, Condition(function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Func004002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Func005002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana, Condition(function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Reload_mana_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti Undead Shield Down
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave)
    call DisplayTextToForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[1], ( GetPlayerName(Player(1)) + " |cffff0000Your generator has no mana! The shield has deactivated!|r" ))
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YZef', gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_EnergyShieldGroup, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down_Func006A)
    call GroupClear(udg_EnergyShieldGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitManaEvent(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down, gg_unit_n00Q_0899, LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL, 0.00)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down, gg_unit_n00Q_0899, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Down_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti Undead Shield Enter
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_EnergyShieldGroup)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100, 50.00, 100, 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter, gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter, Condition(function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Enter_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti Undead Shield Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, gg_unit_n00Q_0899) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(gg_unit_n00Q_0899, GetEnumUnit(), 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_EnergyShieldGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ(gg_unit_n00Q_0899, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, gg_unit_n00Q_0899) - 1 ))
    if ( Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_EnergyShieldGroup, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Func002Func001A)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage, Condition(function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti Undead Shield Leave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_EnergyShieldGroup)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave, gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave, Condition(function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave, function Trig_Anti_Undead_Shield_Leave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Give Gold Ability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06U' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06W' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= 1000 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= 1000 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= 1000 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 1000 ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( " sent |cffffff001000 gold|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "!" ) ) ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( ( " sent |cffffff00" + ( I2S(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)) + " gold|r to " ) ) + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "!" ) ) ))
                call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 1000 ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( " sent |cffffff001000 gold|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "!" ) ) ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( ( " sent |cffffff00" + ( I2S(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)) + " gold|r to " ) ) + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "!" ) ) ))
                call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func003Func002C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 1000 ))
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( " sent |cffffff001000 gold|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "!" ) ) ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD), Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( ( " sent |cffffff00" + ( I2S(GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)) + " gold|r to " ) ) + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "!" ) ) ))
                call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 0)
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Give_Gold_Ability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Give_Gold_Ability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Give_Gold_Ability, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Give_Gold_Ability, Condition(function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Give_Gold_Ability, function Trig_Give_Gold_Ability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Give Soul Ability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A071' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06Z' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A070' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A071' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A070' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func001C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1, Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) - 1 ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( " sent |cff8080ff1 soul|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(Player(6)) + "!" ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func002C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1, Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) - 1 ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( " sent |cff8080ff1 soul|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(Player(10)) + "!" ) ) ))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Func003C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1, Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
        call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER) - 1 ))
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(udg_UndeadPlayers, 4.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( " sent |cff8080ff1 soul|r to " + ( GetPlayerName(Player(11)) + "!" ) ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Give_Soul_Ability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Give_Soul_Ability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Give_Soul_Ability, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Give_Soul_Ability, Condition(function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Give_Soul_Ability, function Trig_Give_Soul_Ability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove starts
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_starts_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A02I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_starts_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Remove_starts=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_starts, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_starts, Condition(function Trig_Remove_starts_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_starts, function Trig_Remove_starts_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove ends
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_ends_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A02I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_ends_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Remove_ends=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_ends, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_ends, Condition(function Trig_Remove_ends_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_ends, function Trig_Remove_ends_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demi Heroes Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1]=gg_unit_H017_1586
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2]=gg_unit_H01O_0359
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3]=gg_unit_H019_0246
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4]=gg_unit_H01N_0611
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5]=gg_unit_H05M_0615
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6]=gg_unit_H048_0717
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7]=gg_unit_H01P_0382
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8]=gg_unit_H02U_0610
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9]=gg_unit_H060_0104
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10]=gg_unit_H069_0210
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11]=gg_unit_H067_0648
    set udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12]=gg_unit_H06A_1722
    // -
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9])
