    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12])
    // -
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[1]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[2]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[3]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[4]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[5]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[6]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[7]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[8]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[9]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[10]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[11]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[12]=0
    // -
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Demi_Heroes_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_Init, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_Init, function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demi Heroes Kills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func001Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 10 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 15 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 20 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 25 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 30 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 35 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 40 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 45 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 50 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 55 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 60 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 65 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 70 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 75 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 80 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func020001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 85 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func021001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 90 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func022001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 95 )
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func024Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[13] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func024C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func024Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=14
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] + 1 )
            if ( Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( "Captain | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ))
            else
                call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( "Dawnfall Guardian | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ))
            endif
            call SuspendHeroXPBJ(true, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 5) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 10) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 15) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 20) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 25) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 30) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 35) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 40) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 45) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 50) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 55) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 60) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 65) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 70) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 75) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 80) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 85) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 90) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] == 95) ) then // INLINED!!
                call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( GetHeroLevel(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) + 1 ), true)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            if ( Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Func002Func001Func024C() ) then
                call BlzSetUnitMaxMana(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 0)
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Demi_Heroes_Kills takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_Kills=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_Kills, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_Kills, Condition(function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_Kills, function Trig_Demi_Heroes_Kills_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heroes Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heroes_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unit_Hero[1]=gg_unit_Hart_0340
    set udg_Unit_Hero[2]=gg_unit_H00M_0394
    set udg_Unit_Hero[3]=gg_unit_H00Y_1945
    set udg_Unit_Hero[4]=gg_unit_H00O_0407
    set udg_Unit_Hero[5]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[6]=gg_unit_Hant_1875
    set udg_Unit_Hero[7]=gg_unit_Hjai_0582
    set udg_Unit_Hero[8]=gg_unit_Hkal_0329
    set udg_Unit_Hero[9]=gg_unit_Hlgr_0252
    set udg_Unit_Hero[10]=gg_unit_H055_1185
    set udg_Unit_Hero[11]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[12]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[13]=gg_unit_Huth_0777
    set udg_Unit_Hero[14]=gg_unit_Hpb1_0910
    set udg_Unit_Hero[15]=gg_unit_H00Q_1424
    set udg_Unit_Hero[16]=gg_unit_Hhkl_0760
    set udg_Unit_Hero[17]=gg_unit_H00T_0919
    set udg_Unit_Hero[18]=gg_unit_H00K_0204
    set udg_Unit_Hero[19]=gg_unit_H00L_0459
    set udg_Unit_Hero[20]=gg_unit_H01K_0016
    set udg_Unit_Hero[21]=gg_unit_H031_0915
    set udg_Unit_Hero[22]=gg_unit_Nplh_1034
    set udg_Unit_Hero[23]=gg_unit_Ucrl_1330
    set udg_Unit_Hero[24]=gg_unit_U00I_1254
    set udg_Unit_Hero[25]=gg_unit_H00N_0006
    set udg_Unit_Hero[26]=gg_unit_H00F_0286
    set udg_Unit_Hero[27]=gg_unit_Hdgo_1723
    set udg_Unit_Hero[28]=gg_unit_Hpb2_0643
    set udg_Unit_Hero[29]=gg_unit_H00J_0201
    set udg_Unit_Hero[30]=gg_unit_Hapm_0287
    set udg_Unit_Hero[31]=gg_unit_Opgh_0247
    set udg_Unit_Hero[32]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[33]=gg_unit_Ulic_1139
    set udg_Unit_Hero[34]=gg_unit_Uear_0537
    set udg_Unit_Hero[35]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[36]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[37]=gg_unit_H014_0206
    set udg_Unit_Hero[38]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[39]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[40]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[41]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[42]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[43]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[44]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[45]=null
    set udg_Unit_Hero[46]=null
    // -
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[1]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[2]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[3]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[4]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[5]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[6]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[7]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[8]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[9]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[10]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[11]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[12]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[13]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[14]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[15]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[16]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[17]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[18]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[19]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[20]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[21]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[22]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[23]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[24]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[25]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[26]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[27]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[28]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[29]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[30]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[31]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[32]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[33]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[34]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[35]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[36]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[37]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[38]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[39]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[40]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[41]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[42]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[43]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[44]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[45]=0
    set udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[46]=0
    // -
    set udg_Name_Hero[1]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[1])
    set udg_Name_Hero[2]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[2])
    set udg_Name_Hero[3]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[3])
    set udg_Name_Hero[4]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[4])
    set udg_Name_Hero[5]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5])
    set udg_Name_Hero[6]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[6])
    set udg_Name_Hero[7]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[7])
    set udg_Name_Hero[8]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[8])
    set udg_Name_Hero[9]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[9])
    set udg_Name_Hero[10]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[10])
    set udg_Name_Hero[11]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11])
    set udg_Name_Hero[12]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12])
    set udg_Name_Hero[13]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[13])
    set udg_Name_Hero[14]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[14])
    set udg_Name_Hero[15]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[15])
    set udg_Name_Hero[16]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[16])
    set udg_Name_Hero[17]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[17])
    set udg_Name_Hero[18]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[18])
    set udg_Name_Hero[19]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[19])
    set udg_Name_Hero[20]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[20])
    set udg_Name_Hero[21]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[21])
    set udg_Name_Hero[22]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[22])
    set udg_Name_Hero[23]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[23])
    set udg_Name_Hero[24]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[24])
    set udg_Name_Hero[25]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[25])
    set udg_Name_Hero[26]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[26])
    set udg_Name_Hero[27]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[27])
    set udg_Name_Hero[28]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[28])
    set udg_Name_Hero[29]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[29])
    set udg_Name_Hero[30]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[30])
    set udg_Name_Hero[31]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[31])
    set udg_Name_Hero[32]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[32])
    set udg_Name_Hero[33]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[33])
    set udg_Name_Hero[34]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[34])
    set udg_Name_Hero[35]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[35])
    set udg_Name_Hero[36]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[36])
    set udg_Name_Hero[37]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[37])
    set udg_Name_Hero[38]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[38])
    set udg_Name_Hero[39]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[39])
    set udg_Name_Hero[40]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[40])
    set udg_Name_Hero[41]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[41])
    set udg_Name_Hero[42]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[42])
    set udg_Name_Hero[43]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[43])
    set udg_Name_Hero[44]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[44])
    set udg_Name_Hero[45]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[45])
    set udg_Name_Hero[46]=GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46])
    // -
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[1], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[1]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[2], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[2]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[3], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[3]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[4], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[4]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[5]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[6], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[6]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[7], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[7]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[8], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[8]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[9], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[9]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[10], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[10]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[11]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[12]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[13], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[13]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[14], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[14]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[15], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[15]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[16], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[16]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[17], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[17]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[18], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[18]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[19], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[19]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[20], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[20]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[21], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[21]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[22], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[22]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[23], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[23]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[24], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[24]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[25], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[25]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[26], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[26]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[27], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[27]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[28], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[28]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[29], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[29]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[30], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[30]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[31], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[31]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[32], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[32]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[33], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[33]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[34], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[34]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[35], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[35]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[36], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[36]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[37], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[37]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[38], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[38]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[39], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[39]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[40], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[40]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[41], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[41]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[42], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[42]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[43], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[43]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[44], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[44]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[45], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[45]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
    call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46], ( GetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[46]) + " | Kills : 0" ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heroes_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heroes_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Heroes_Init, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Heroes_Init, function Trig_Heroes_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heroes Kills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heroes_Kills_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() != udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heroes_Kills_Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetKillingUnitBJ() == udg_Unit_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heroes_Kills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=46
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Heroes_Kills_Func012Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Kills_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]=( udg_Kills_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] + 1 )
            call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( ( udg_Name_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()] + " | Kills: " ) + I2S(udg_Kills_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ))
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heroes_Kills takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heroes_Kills=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Heroes_Kills, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Heroes_Kills, Condition(function Trig_Heroes_Kills_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Heroes_Kills, function Trig_Heroes_Kills_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demi Heroes dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[5] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[7] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[8] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[9] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func002Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I01E' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I01B' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I01A' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I019' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I01C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I01G' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I01F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I01D' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetEnumItem()) == 'I018' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func002Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetEnumItem())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_Point, 200.00, 200.00), function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Func002A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Demi_Heroes_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_dies, Condition(function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Demi_Heroes_dies, function Trig_Demi_Heroes_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Robust Armor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func004Func009002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitColor(GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func004Func012002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitColor(GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R020' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func006Func009002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitColor(GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func006Func012002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitColor(GetEnumUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Orders_Launched == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func004001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func006001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func007001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func008001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func009001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func010001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func011001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func012001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func013001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func014001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func016001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func017001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func018001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func019001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R032' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hrif', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hrif', false, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h03I', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h03I', true, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h03I', 40, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h03I', 40, Player(7))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func002C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h00Z', false, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02R', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02R', true, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02R', 40, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02R', 40, Player(7))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func003C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hsor', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('hsor', false, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02S', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02S', true, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02S', 25, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02S', 25, Player(7))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h01M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h01M', false, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02T', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h02T', true, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02T', 20, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h02T', 20, Player(7))
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'h02T')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func004Func009002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(7), 'h02T')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func004Func012002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func005C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h04W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h04W', false, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h04V', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h04V', true, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h04V', 25, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h04V', 25, Player(7))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func006C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h05X', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h05X', false, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h05Y', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h05Y', true, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h05Y', 40, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h05Y', 40, Player(7))
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'h05Y')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func006Func009002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(7), 'h05Y')
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Robust_Armor_Func006Func012002)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func007C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h062', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h062', false, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h063', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('h063', true, Player(7))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h063', 40, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('h063', 40, Player(7))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
            if ( Trig_Robust_Armor_Func008Func001Func002C() ) then
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AB', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AF', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
                call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 'A0AF', TimerGetRemaining(udg_Orders_Timer))
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], "channel")
            else
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0AB', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AB', udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6])
            endif
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], 12.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], 18.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], 24.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[11], 30.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 10.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 16.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 22.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[6], 28.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 20.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 26.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 32.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[12], 38.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 0) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14], 3.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 1) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14], 9.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 2) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14], 15.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            if ( (GetPlayerTechCountSimple('Rhar', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == 3) ) then // INLINED!!
                call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[14], 21.00)
            else
                call DoNothing()
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=14
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                call BlzSetUnitName(udg_Unit_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()], ( "Dawnfall Guardians | Kills: " + I2S(udg_Kills_Demi_Hero[GetForLoopIndexA()]) ))
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Robust_Armor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Robust_Armor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Robust_Armor, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Robust_Armor, function Trig_Robust_Armor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Robust Armor Attachment Color
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05Y' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02T' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitColor(GetTrainedUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetTrainedUnit())))
    call SetUnitColor(GetSoldUnit(), GetPlayerColor(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit())))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color, Condition(function Trig_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color, function Trig_Robust_Armor_Attachment_Color_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spiked Carapace
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spiked_Carapace_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spiked_Carapace_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('o003', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('o003', false, Player(7))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('o00N', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ('o00N', true, Player(7))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('o00N', 2, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap('o00N', 2, Player(7))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spiked_Carapace takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spiked_Carapace=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spiked_Carapace, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spiked_Carapace, Condition(function Trig_Spiked_Carapace_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spiked_Carapace, function Trig_Spiked_Carapace_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kings Guards
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kings_Guards_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSellingUnit()) == 'h023' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSellingUnit()) == 'h00V' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Kings_Guards_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Kings_Guards_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kings_Guards_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, GetTriggerPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 500 ))
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call RemoveUnit(GetSellingUnit())
    call RemoveUnit(GetSoldUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetTriggerPlayer())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kings_Guards takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kings_Guards=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Kings_Guards, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Kings_Guards, Condition(function Trig_Kings_Guards_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kings_Guards, function Trig_Kings_Guards_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heavy Footman
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heavy_Footman_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSellingUnit()) == 'hfoo' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSellingUnit()) == 'h03X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSellingUnit()) == 'h03W' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSellingUnit()) == 'h03D' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Heavy_Footman_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Heavy_Footman_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heavy_Footman_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Point=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call RemoveUnit(GetSellingUnit())
    call RemoveUnit(GetSoldUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Point, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetTriggerPlayer())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Point)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heavy_Footman takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heavy_Footman=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Heavy_Footman, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Heavy_Footman, Condition(function Trig_Heavy_Footman_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Heavy_Footman, function Trig_Heavy_Footman_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Burning Oil at Bulwark
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetResearched() == 'R01H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_01)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_02)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_03)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_04)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_01)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_02)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_03)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'YOfs', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_04)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D03K', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_01)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D03K', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_02)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D03K', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_03)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D03K', gg_rct_Burning_Oil_04)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_RESEARCH_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark, Condition(function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark, function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Burning Oil at Bulwark Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 150.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\BreathOfFire\\BreathOfFireDamage.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 150.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\BreathOfFire\\BreathOfFireDamage.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 150.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\BreathOfFire\\BreathOfFireDamage.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 150.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\BreathOfFire\\BreathOfFireDamage.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Burning_Oil_01)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark, function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark)
    set udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Burning_Oil_02)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark, function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark)
    set udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Burning_Oil_03)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark, function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark)
    set udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Burning_Oil_04)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark, function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Func011A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits_Burning_Oil_Bulwark)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage, function Trig_Burning_Oil_at_Bulwark_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Activation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Activation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Activated == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CivilWarOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Activation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_5301")
    set udg_Overpopulation_Activated=true
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check)
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Check)
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Elendar_Keep_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Elendar_Keep_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Elendar_Keep_Check)
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Leonar_Citadel_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Leonar_Citadel_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Leonar_Citadel_Check)
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Check)
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Stormfury_Citadel_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Stormfury_Citadel_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Stormfury_Citadel_Check)
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check)
    // -------------------------
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Check)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Activation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation, Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Activation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Activation, function Trig_Overpopulation_Activation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Teredar Fortress Enter
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Func006Func001Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Func006Func001Func001001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_1428")
            set udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter, gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter, Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter, function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Enter_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Teredar Fortress Leave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09V', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09U', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004Func004Func001Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09V', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09U', GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004Func004Func001C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Func004Func004Func001Func001001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_5197")
                set udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()]=true
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave, gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave, function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Leave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Teredar Fortress Check
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Func001Func001Func005001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])) >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Teredar_Fortress, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Func001Func001Func002A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Func001Func001Func005001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_5302")
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check, function Trig_Overpopulation_Teredar_Fortress_Check_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Crystal Falcon Citadel Enter
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Func006Func001Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Func006Func001Func001001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6028")
            set udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter, gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter, Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter, function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Enter_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Crystal Falcon Citadel Leave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09V', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09U', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004Func004Func001Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09V', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09U', GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
