        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004Func004Func001C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave_Func004Func004Func001Func001001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6021")
                set udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()]=true
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Leave, gg_rct_Anti_undead_Shield)

endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false

    return true
endfunction

            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Check_Func001Func001Func002A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Crystal_Falcon_Citadel_Check_Func001Func001Func005001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_5305")

            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Leonar_Citadel, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Leonar_Citadel_Check_Func001Func001Func002A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Leonar_Citadel_Check_Func001Func001Func005001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_5307")
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Leonar_Citadel_Check, function Trig_Overpopulation_Leonar_Citadel_Check_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Golden Eagle Church Enter
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Enter_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Golden_Eagle_Church, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Enter_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Enter_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Enter_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Golden_Eagle_Church_Enter_Func006Func001Func001001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6031")
            set udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check_Func001Func001Func005001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Ganch_Keep, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])) >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Ganch_Keep, udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check_Func001Func001Func002A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
            call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check_Func001Func001Func005001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_5310")
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check, function Trig_Overpopulation_Ganch_Keep_Check_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Hammerfell Enter
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Hammerfell, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Func006Func001Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Hammerfell, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A09T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Func006Func001Func001001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6034")
            set udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()]=false
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter, gg_rct_Hammerfell)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter, Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter, function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Enter_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overpopulation Hammerfell Leave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09T', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09V', GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09U', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004Func004Func001Func001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterPlayer() == GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Hammerfell, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))) < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(21) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09V', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A09U', GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_GroupUnits=GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_Hammerfell, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_GroupUnits, function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_GroupUnits)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004Func004Func001C() ) then
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Func004Func004Func001Func001001001)), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_6027")
                set udg_Overpopulation_Warning_Allowed[GetForLoopIndexA()]=true
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave, gg_rct_Hammerfell)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave, function Trig_Overpopulation_Hammerfell_Leave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_UndeadPlayers) == false ) ) then

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Zombies Init
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Zombies_Init_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AI_Zombies_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Zombies_Init_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=19
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A00H', udg_Player[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=19
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call KillDestructable(udg_Gate[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Regular)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Zombies_Init takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Init=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Init, Condition(function Trig_AI_Zombies_Init_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Init, function Trig_AI_Zombies_Init_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Zombies Regular
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Zombies_Regular_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AI_Zombies_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Zombies_Regular_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(12), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(13), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, Player(14), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Zombies_Regular takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Regular=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Regular, Condition(function Trig_AI_Zombies_Regular_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Regular, function Trig_AI_Zombies_Regular_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AI Zombies Spawn 07
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Func004001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AI_Zombies_ON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(6), Condition(function Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Func004001001002))) < 200 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerTechCountSimple('R000', Player(6)) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Func001C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Creation=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_AI_Zombie_Point_07_01)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(6), udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Creation, bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Creation)
            set udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Attack=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Orange_2)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Attack)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Attack)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=0
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=23
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Creation=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_AI_Zombie_Point_07_01)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(6), udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Creation, bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Creation)
            set udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Attack=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Corpse_Storage_Orange_2)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Attack)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_AI_Zombie_Point_07_Attack)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07, 30.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07, Condition(function Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07, function Trig_AI_Zombies_Spawn_07_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function RunInitializationTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Settings_Variables)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Information_Quests_Menue)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_VL_Config)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Water_Mending_Config)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_ini)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unit_Event_Config)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Upgrades
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitUpgrades_Player21 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhme', 3)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhra', 3)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhar', 3)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhhb', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhgb', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhan', 4)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhac', 3)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhde', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhri', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhla', 3)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhst', 2)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhpt', 2)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhpm', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhrt', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhss', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhfl', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhse', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhlh', 2)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'R004', 3)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'R006', 3)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'R005', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhcd', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhfs', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'Rhfc', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'R010', 1)
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(21), 'R013', 4)
endfunction

function InitUpgrades takes nothing returns nothing
    call InitUpgrades_Player21()
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Players
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitCustomPlayerSlots takes nothing returns nothing

    // Player 0
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(0), ConvertPlayerColor(0))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(0), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(0), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(0), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 1
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(1), ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(1), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(1), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(1), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 2
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(2), ConvertPlayerColor(2))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(2), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(2), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(2), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 3
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(3), ConvertPlayerColor(3))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(3), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(3), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(3), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 4
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(4), ConvertPlayerColor(4))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(4), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(4), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(4), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 5
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(5), 5)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(5), 5)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(5), ConvertPlayerColor(5))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(5), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(5), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(5), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 6
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(6), 6)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(6), 6)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(6), ConvertPlayerColor(6))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(6), RACE_PREF_UNDEAD)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(6), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(6), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 7
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(7), 7)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(7), 7)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(7), ConvertPlayerColor(7))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(7), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(7), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(7), MAP_CONTROL_NEUTRAL)

    // Player 8
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(8), 8)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(8), 8)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(8), ConvertPlayerColor(8))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(8), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(8), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(8), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 9
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(9), 9)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(9), 9)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(9), ConvertPlayerColor(9))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(9), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(9), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(9), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 10
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 10)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 10)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(10), ConvertPlayerColor(10))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(10), RACE_PREF_UNDEAD)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(10), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(10), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 11
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 11)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 11)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(11), ConvertPlayerColor(11))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(11), RACE_PREF_UNDEAD)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(11), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(11), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 20
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(20), 12)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(20), 12)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(20), ConvertPlayerColor(20))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(20), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(20), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(20), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 21
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(21), 13)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(21), 13)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(21), ConvertPlayerColor(21))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(21), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(21), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(21), MAP_CONTROL_NEUTRAL)

endfunction

function InitAllyPriorities takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(0, 10)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 1, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 2, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 3, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 4, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 5, 6, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 6, 8, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 7, 9, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 8, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 9, 11, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(1, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 0, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 1, 8, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 2, 11, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 3, 12, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(2, 1)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(3, 5)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 1, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 2, 8, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 3, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 4, 12, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(4, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 0, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 1, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(6, 1)
    call SetStartLocPrio(6, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(7, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(7, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(7, 1, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(8, 3)
    call SetStartLocPrio(8, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(8, 1, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(8, 2, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(9, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(9, 0, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(9, 1, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(10, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(10, 0, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(10, 1, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(11, 1)
    call SetStartLocPrio(11, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(12, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(12, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(12, 1, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(13, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(13, 0, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(13, 1, 12, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Main Initialization
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function main takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBounds(- 9472.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), - 9728.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM), 21760.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), 22016.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), - 9472.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), 22016.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), 21760.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), - 9728.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM))
    call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronTerrain\\DNCLordaeronTerrain.mdl", "Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronUnit\\DNCLordaeronUnit.mdl")
    call SetTerrainFogEx(0, 700.0, 11000.0, 0.500, 0.804, 0.890, 1.000)
    call NewSoundEnvironment("Default")
    call SetAmbientDaySound("CityScapeDay")
    call SetAmbientNightSound("CityScapeNight")
    call SetMapMusic("Music", true, 0)
    call InitSounds()
    call CreateRegions()
    call CreateCameras()
    call InitUpgrades_Player21() // INLINED!!
    call CreateAllDestructables()
    call CreateAllItems()
    call CreateAllUnits()
    call InitBlizzard()

call ExecuteFunc("jasshelper__initstructs32870468")
call ExecuteFunc("MMD___init")

    call InitGlobals()
    call InitCustomTriggers()
    call RunInitializationTriggers()

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Configuration
//*
//***************************************************************************

function config takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMapName("TRIGSTR_007")
    call SetMapDescription("TRIGSTR_009")
    call SetPlayers(14)
    call SetTeams(14)
    call SetGamePlacement(MAP_PLACEMENT_TEAMS_TOGETHER)

    call DefineStartLocation(0, 128.0, - 896.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(1, 9600.0, 20928.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(2, 11840.0, - 6080.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(3, 12544.0, 11648.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(4, 11264.0, 5440.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(5, - 6784.0, 12288.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(6, - 8384.0, 17664.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(7, - 10176.0, - 10176.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(8, - 64.0, 8384.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(9, 19840.0, - 8640.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(10, 20288.0, 4608.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(11, 2432.0, 19904.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(12, 16704.0, 19392.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(13, - 10176.0, - 10176.0)

    // Player setup
    call InitCustomPlayerSlots()
    call InitCustomTeams()
    call InitAllyPriorities()
endfunction




//Struct method generated initializers/callers:
function sa__MMD___QueueNode_onDestroy takes nothing returns boolean
local integer this=f__arg_this
            call FlushStoredInteger(MMD___gc, MMD___M_KEY_VAL + s__MMD___QueueNode_key[this], s__MMD___QueueNode_msg[this])
            call FlushStoredInteger(MMD___gc, MMD___M_KEY_CHK + s__MMD___QueueNode_key[this], s__MMD___QueueNode_key[this])
            set s__MMD___QueueNode_msg[this]=null
            set s__MMD___QueueNode_key[this]=null
            set s__MMD___QueueNode_next[this]=0
   return true
endfunction

function jasshelper__initstructs32870468 takes nothing returns nothing
    set st__MMD___QueueNode_onDestroy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(st__MMD___QueueNode_onDestroy,Condition( function sa__MMD___QueueNode_onDestroy))


endfunction
